T02TD1660E:389a-1: sarbba buddha sa ma yo ga d'a ki n'i m'a y'a samb'a ra brittri sa ma yo g'a lam k'a ra n'a ma /
T02TD1660E:389a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog gi bgrel [?] pa mnyam sbyor gyi rgyan zhes bya ba //
T02TD1660E:389a-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1660E:389a-5: sangs rgyas kun dngos bdag nyid can //
T02TD1660E:389a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / sgyu ma bde mchog phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD1660E:389a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bshad //
T02TD1660E:389b-0: dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa bdag dang gzhan don bsgrub par ci la yang ma reg par chas pa rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i de kho na nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i @389b phyir rgyud kyi don 'di brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:389b-1: de la brjod par bya ba ni gang /
T02TD1660E:389b-4: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni gang zhe na /
T02TD1660E:389b-8: phyi ma'i phyi ma bstan pa'i don du rgyu'i rgyud dang /
T02TD1660E:389b-10: 'bras bu'i rgyud ni brjod par bya ba yin la /
T02TD1660E:389b-11: rtsa ba'i rgyud rtog pa bcu pa dang /
T02TD1660E:389b-12: phyi ma rtog pa bdun pa dang /
T02TD1660E:389b-13: phyi ma'i phyi ma rtogs pa lnga po ni rjod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1660E:389b-14: 'brel pa ni brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa ni de'i bdag nyid yin la /
T02TD1660E:389b-15: brjod bya dang dgos pa ni de las byung ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:389b-16: dgos pa ni bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:389b-18: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gang zag gis khong du chud pa'o //
T02TD1660E:389b-19: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni 'jig rten thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:389b-20: de ltar dgos pa'i don bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:389b-21: bsdus pa'i don ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rtog pa drug bsgrub pa'i yan lag dang bcas pa'i bshad pa dang /
T02TD1660E:389b-22: mchog gi don sgrub pa rgyud phyi ma rtog pa dgu pa bshad pa dang /
T02TD1660E:389b-23: dris pa dang len gyi rgyud kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma'i sgrub pa dang /
T02TD1660E:389b-24: dngos grub dang grub pa'i las rnams bshad pa'o //
T02TD1660E:389b-25: bsdus pa'i don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i thugs dang rnal 'byor ba yang dag par mnyam par sbyar bas na sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud yin no //
T02TD1660E:389b-26: bsdus pa'i don mtshan dang bcas pa bshad nas yan lag gi don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1660E:389b-27: bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro bde mchog la bstod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:389b-28: p'u dza dang phyag byas nas /
T02TD1660E:389b-29: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD1660E:389b-30: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1660E:389b-31: rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul //
T02TD1660E:389b-32: nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod //
T02TD1660E:390a-0: ces gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la bcom ldan 'das @390a * //
T02TD1660E:390a-2: sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02TD1660E:390a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02TD1660E:390a-4: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1660E:390a-6: gcig pu bdag nyid che ba'i lha //
T02TD1660E:390a-7: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:390a-8: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog / ces bya ba ston pa po nyid kyis gleng gzhi gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:390a-9: de la ston pa ni gang zhig yin /
T02TD1660E:390a-11: 'khor ni su dang lhan cig tu /
T02TD1660E:390a-13: chos ni ci zhig gsungs she na /
T02TD1660E:390a-14: de la ston pa ni sku gsum gyi bdag nyid yin te /
T02TD1660E:390a-16: sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes bya ste 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi bdag nyid can no //
T02TD1660E:390a-17: longs sku ni rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:390a-18: gnas ni gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:390a-19: 'khor ni thams cad bdag nyid do //
T02TD1660E:390a-20: dus ni rtag tu bzhugs zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1660E:390a-21: de la chos kyi sku ni /
T02TD1660E:390a-23: gcig pu bdag nyid che ba'i lha //
T02TD1660E:390a-25: sems rang rig 'od gsal gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid gcig pu che ba'i lha yin no //
T02TD1660E:390a-27: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:390a-28: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog / ces bya'o //
T02TD1660E:390a-29: phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i 'khor rnams kyi mngon sum du grub na ci'i phyir gleng gzhi gsungs she na /
T02TD1660E:390a-30: ma 'ongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams la dman pa dbyibs dang /
T02TD1660E:390a-32: mthar thug chos sgom pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang /
T02TD1660E:390a-34: 'jam dpal la gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:390a-35: don gsum po 'di ni 'khor lo bde mchog gi 'grel bar blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:390a-36: de ltar gleng gzhi gsungs nas /
T02TD1660E:390a-37: da ni le'u dang po de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu gsum gyis shes bya'i 'dug lugs bstan par bzhed nas /
T02TD1660E:390b-0: 'dod @390b chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02TD1660E:390b-1: dbu mar yang ni mi gnas so //
T02TD1660E:390b-2: zhes pa thabs kyi rgyud kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral bar bstan to //
T02TD1660E:390b-3: thabs de gang gis rtogs snyam na //
T02TD1660E:390b-4: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya //
T02TD1660E:390b-6: bud med kun ni las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1660E:390b-8: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1660E:390b-10: sgyu ma'i rgya ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du bskyed pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:390b-11: de nyid theg pa gcig pu yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:390b-12: 'di ni gnyis med theg pa mchog / ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD1660E:390b-13: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgyu rkyen gyi tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:390b-14: rgyu rkyen ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1660E:390b-15: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
T02TD1660E:390b-16: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02TD1660E:390b-17: ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis //
T02TD1660E:390b-20: sgyu ma thams cad ni tshor ba sdug bsngal gyi rgyu rkyen tshogs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:390b-22: bde ba'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las /
T02TD1660E:390b-23: phyag rgya rang bzhin 'di ni rgyu rkyen las khyad par 'phags so //
T02TD1660E:390b-24: goms pa med na ji lta bu zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du 'grub ce na /
T02TD1660E:390b-25: ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis //
T02TD1660E:390b-27: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las phyag rgya rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni gser 'gyur rtsi'i rnam pa bzhin du phyag rgya'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu las bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:390b-28: de la phyag rgya gsum gyi 'bras bu bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:390b-30: gus pa byed pa dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1660E:390b-33: dam tshig dang chos gsum gyis 'jig rten gsum gyi dri ma dang ma bral ba yin du zin kyang mngon sum gyi bde ba stong pa bskyed pa gus par byed pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:390b-34: de skad du rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD1660E:390b-35: myur du dngos grub rab bskyed de //
T02TD1660E:390b-36: 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin //
T02TD1660E:390b-38: bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya'i 'bras bu ni /
T02TD1660E:390b-39: rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis //
T02TD1660E:390b-41: rnyed pa ni dga' ba dang /
T02TD1660E:390b-42: mchog tu lus bde ba dang /
T02TD1660E:391a-0: @391a * // bde ba ni lhan cig tu skyes dga' yid bde ba'o //
T02TD1660E:391a-1: dga' ba kun gyi zhes bya ba ni dga' ba gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
T02TD1660E:391a-3: zhes pa ni dag byed dang dbang dang dpa' bo dang bkas gnang ba'i lha mo las gzhan pa'i tha ma'i bud med ngan spyod ma la 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1660E:391a-4: de ci'i phyir las dang po par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02TD1660E:391a-5: rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur na //
T02TD1660E:391a-6: bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub //
T02TD1660E:391a-8: rang gi ngo bo bsgyur ba ni ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas tha mal ba'i bud med kyi ngo bo bsgyur te ;
T02TD1660E:391a-10: m'a ma k'i gos dkar mo sgrol ma la sogs bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:391a-11: mi yi lus la ci'i phyir sangs rgyas spyan //
T02TD1660E:391a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs par brjod ce na /
T02TD1660E:391a-13: ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i mu dra 'di //
T02TD1660E:391a-14: mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdas bstan pa //
T02TD1660E:391a-17: mtshan nyid theg pa'i rgyu snyoms 'jug gi bsam gtan bzhin du mi'i bud med la ye shes sems dpa' babs nas ngo mtshar ci sgyu ma las kyi mu drar gyur pas na mkha' 'gro ma zhes sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:391a-18: de ni mkha' la 'gro ba zhes //
T02TD1660E:391a-19: khams las kun du brtags pa ste //
T02TD1660E:391a-21: d'a ki ni zhes bya ba'i sgra'i khams ni /
T02TD1660E:391a-22: de'i has ga ma zhes pa ste /
T02TD1660E:391a-24: nam mkha' ni gcig ste zhi gnas rtog med kyi nam mkha' dang /
T02TD1660E:391a-25: gzung 'dzin gcig dang bral ba lhag mthong gi nam mkha'o //
T02TD1660E:391a-26: der 'gro ba ni zhi gnas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1660E:391a-27: lhag mthong rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis 'gro bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1660E:391a-29: nam mkha' kun du spyod grub pa //
T02TD1660E:391a-30: mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags //
T02TD1660E:391a-32: ma lus thams cad phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1660E:391a-33: zhes pa las dang chos dang dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD1660E:391a-34: thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis //
T02TD1660E:391a-36: chos dang dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po'i thabs shes pa'o //
T02TD1660E:391a-37: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ma //
T02TD1660E:391b-0: zhes pa thabs bzhi dang @391b shes rab bzhi mnyam par sbyor bas zung 'jug bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-1: mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags //
T02TD1660E:391b-2: zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i stong nyid dang /
T02TD1660E:391b-3: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rlung me'i drod can dang //
T02TD1660E:391b-4: chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang /
T02TD1660E:391b-5: las kyi phyag rgya ye shes las skyes pa dang /
T02TD1660E:391b-6: sngags dang zhing las skyes pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-8: sangs rgyas khams las rab tu brtags //
T02TD1660E:391b-9: zhes gnas gtsang ma lha'i skad //
T02TD1660E:391b-10: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sems la mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-13: mu dra chen po chos kyi bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1660E:391b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-15: sham zhes bya ba bde bar bshad //
T02TD1660E:391b-16: ces pa ni zag med kyi bde ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid bde ba chen po'o ;
T02TD1660E:391b-17: ; sgyu ma thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:391b-18: mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog / ces pa zhi gnas dang /
T02TD1660E:391b-19: lhag mthong gi bde ba mngon sum du tshogs pa'i bde ba'i ye shes kyi sgyu ma zhi gnas kyi mchog tu bde ba dang /
T02TD1660E:391b-20: lhag mthong zag med kyi bde ba mchog go //
T02TD1660E:391b-21: de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba mtshan don dang ldan par bshad pas thabs kyi rgyud shes byed bstan to //
T02TD1660E:391b-22: kun du kun nas thams cad ni //
T02TD1660E:391b-23: zhes pa la sogs pa snod bcud thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i don bshad do ;
T02TD1660E:391b-24: ; kun du zhes pa ni dus thams cad du'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-25: kun nas zhes pa ni phyogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-26: thams cad ni dngos po thams cad du'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-27: rtag tu ni yul dang dus thams cad la'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-28: rnam pa kun ni gnas skabs thams cad do //
T02TD1660E:391b-29: sangs rgyas la sogs nas rtsa ba'i rig sngags bzhi'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-30: sogs zhes smos pa ni rdo rje dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rigs su'o //
T02TD1660E:391b-31: brtan pa ni gzhal yas khang dang /
T02TD1660E:391b-33: kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to //
T02TD1660E:391b-34: zhes pa bde ba chen po'i de nyid zhi ba dang srid pa las khyab par bstan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:392a-0: @392a * // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:392a-1: sems dang sems kyi ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1660E:392a-3: sems ni tshogs brgyad nyid du bgrangs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:392a-4: sems pa ni 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig tu gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1660E:392a-5: ting nge 'dzin ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o ;
T02TD1660E:392a-6: ; byang chub spyod pa tshogs nyid ni //
T02TD1660E:392a-7: lhums su zhugs pa nas byang chub spyod pa'i bar ro //
T02TD1660E:392a-8: de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal //
T02TD1660E:392a-9: zhes pa srod la bdud btul nas tho rang sangs rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1660E:392a-10: de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin //
T02TD1660E:392a-11: zhes pa thams cad la khyab pa de nyid rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1660E:392a-12: rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs so //
T02TD1660E:392a-13: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni he ru ka'i rigs so //
T02TD1660E:392a-14: padma ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi rigs so //
T02TD1660E:392a-15: padma 'chang ba ni las kyi rigs so //
T02TD1660E:392a-16: nor bu ni rdo rje rin chen gyi rigs so //
T02TD1660E:392a-17: nor bu 'dzin pa ni rnam snang gi rigs so //
T02TD1660E:392a-18: de nyid 'dod chags ni khyim pa'i gzugs can no //
T02TD1660E:392a-19: 'dod chags bral ba ni rang byung gi gzugs can no //
T02TD1660E:392a-20: 'dod pa ni 'jig rten gyi dngos grub bo //
T02TD1660E:392a-21: gol ba ni mchog gi siddhi'o //
T02TD1660E:392a-22: da ltar sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam par sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:392a-23: sems rang rig 'od gsal ma dag pa'i gnas skabs na /
T02TD1660E:392a-24: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:392a-25: dus gsum srid pa mchog gsum dang //
T02TD1660E:392a-26: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:392a-27: 'jig rten gsum ni sa bla sa 'og sa stengs so //
T02TD1660E:392a-28: khams gsum ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:392a-29: rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa //
T02TD1660E:392a-30: zhes pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad do //
T02TD1660E:392a-31: 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun //
T02TD1660E:392a-32: zhes pa 'gro ba rigs drug rnams so //
T02TD1660E:392a-35: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa snod bcud thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1660E:392a-36: chos kyi dbyings mnyam mi mnyam pa //
T02TD1660E:392a-37: zhes pa sgyu ma lta bur mi mnyam pa dang /
T02TD1660E:392b-0: nam mkha'i @392b dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa //
T02TD1660E:392b-1: zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi dngos po thams cad do //
T02TD1660E:392b-2: nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
T02TD1660E:392b-3: zhes pa phyag rgya chen po la stong pa nyid kyi gser brtol nas /
T02TD1660E:392b-4: zla ba tshes pa lta bu'am /
T02TD1660E:392b-6: skar khung lta bu aindra bh'u ti'i man ngag gis rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba /
T02TD1660E:392b-7: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mnyam pa'i mchog / ces bya'o //
T02TD1660E:392b-8: de ltar bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin par bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:392b-9: de ni de sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:392b-10: bskal pa bye ba grangs med par //
T02TD1660E:392b-12: mtshan nyid kyi theg pas bas bskal ba grangs med pas mi thob pa phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyu'i tshogs pa gang dang gang dag gis tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad par dam bca' ba gsungs pa yin na //
T02TD1660E:392b-13: sangs rgyas bdag nyid bde ba'i mchog / ces bya bas phyag rgya gsum las zhi gnas bde ba mngon sum du byas te /
T02TD1660E:392b-14: phyag rgya chen po bde ba stong pa nyid shin tu bsgrubs pa las /
T02TD1660E:392b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid sa bcu gcig pa'i bde ba'i mchog thob pa'o //
T02TD1660E:392b-16: de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:392b-17: bskyed pa'i rim pa bshad pa ni //
T02TD1660E:392b-18: rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems //
T02TD1660E:392b-21: so so'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sems //
T02TD1660E:392b-22: lha la dmigs par byed pa dag / ces pa dbugs dbyung ba drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'o //
T02TD1660E:392b-23: rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te //
T02TD1660E:392b-24: zhes pa sprul sku'i gzugs brnyan rjes 'jug gi rnal 'byor gyis lugs ma la sems dpa'i skur bsgoms na /
T02TD1660E:392b-25: mthong ba dang thos pa dang reg pa'i mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:392b-26: de ltar las dang po'i rnal 'byor bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:392b-27: mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02TD1660E:392b-28: yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD1660E:392b-29: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:392b-30: mtshan ma thob pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor bas sprul sku lha la dmigs par byed pa dag / rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi dam tshig gi sbyor bas /
T02TD1660E:393a-2: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393a-3: gzugs 'ba' zhig bsgoms pa las mchog gi dngos grub tu cis mi 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1660E:393a-4: gzugs brnyan gzugs la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:393a-5: rnal 'byor 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i lha'i de kho na nyid rab tu rtsom pa de la rnal 'byor pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393a-6: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ste //
T02TD1660E:393a-7: zhes pa sems 'od gsal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje ste /
T02TD1660E:393a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin pa de bas na rnal 'byor pa thams cad lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin du sbyor bas kyang sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393a-9: de ltar bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:393a-10: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD1660E:393a-11: dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no //
T02TD1660E:393a-12: zhes pa sems 'od gsal gyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dpa' bo sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin no //
T02TD1660E:393a-13: de bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas //
T02TD1660E:393a-14: zhes pas sgyu ma dang stong pa ro gcig pa'i lha'i rang bzhin du sbyor bas bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin du sbyor bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:393a-15: rgyu mtshan des na phung po lnga sangs rgyas thams cad dang dpa' bo rnams sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD1660E:393a-16: longs sku rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393a-19: // / de ltar de kho na nyid gco bor bstan pa'i rtog pa bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:393a-20: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin thabs mang po bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:393a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:393a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pa bshad zin to //
T02TD1660E:393a-24: rnal 'byor de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1660E:393a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas //
T02TD1660E:393a-28: bdag gis rtog pa drug gis lhar bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas sku gsung thugs thams cad kyi ye shes phab na /
T02TD1660E:393a-29: gser 'gyur rtsi'i rnam pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393b-0: de bas na byin rlabs kyi lam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam @393b par sbyor ba /
T02TD1660E:393b-1: 'dis rgyu'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po thabs kyi rgyud kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi lam gyis bde ba nyid kyis 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas kyi bde ba kun thob pa'o //
T02TD1660E:393b-2: de ltar bsgom pa bshad nas //
T02TD1660E:393b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:393b-6: mnyam par sbyor ba'i spyod pa bsgoms nas thabs kyi rnal 'byor 'di la khrus dang sdom pa la sogs pa mi dgos so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:393b-8: spyod pa bshad nas brtul zhugs bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:393b-9: langs pa dang ni 'dug pa dang //
T02TD1660E:393b-10: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:393b-11: spyod lam bzhi la rnal 'byor pa rnams rtog pa drug gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis rgyas btab nas lha'i brtul zhugs spyod pa ni mdun gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs kyang /
T02TD1660E:393b-12: rang gi lha'i bdag nyid du bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393b-13: de ltar brtul zhugs gsungs nas de kho na nyid bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:393b-16: chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las dbang bzhi pa thob nas /
T02TD1660E:393b-17: de kho na nyid bsgom pa ni rnal 'byor pa spros med kyi spyod pas dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du sgrub par byed pa ni nyes pa thams cad kyis gtses par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393b-18: mtshan nyid theg pas bskal pa grangs med pa'i sa mi thob pa yang /
T02TD1660E:393b-19: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyis mngon sum gyi phyag rgya chen po gang gis bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393b-20: de kho na nyid bsgom pa bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:393b-21: da ni gdong rgyan gyon nas sgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:393b-22: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:393b-23: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:393b-24: sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs dang mnyam par sbyor ba gdong rgyan gyon nas /
T02TD1660E:393b-25: rtog pa drug gis lha'i 'khor lo bsgrubs nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rlob cing 'du bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393b-26: de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:393b-27: gdong rgyan gyon pa bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:393b-28: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:393b-29: gang gis ldem dgongs 'di mthong nas //
T02TD1660E:394a-1: pa kun du mchod byed na //
T02TD1660E:394a-2: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:394a-3: bcos ma'i rnal 'byor gyi gzugs brnyan dang bcas pas rtog pa rang gi lha'i 'khor lo bsgom zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rnam pa kun du dad par byed pa na /
T02TD1660E:394a-4: rnal 'byor pa ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad par byas na des sangs rgyas mthong zhing /
T02TD1660E:394a-6: 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD1660E:394a-7: zhes pa rnal 'byor pa 'di dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la mthong ba gzugs dang /
T02TD1660E:394a-10: myong ba ro dang reg bya la sogs pas p'u dza byas pas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs kyang bde ba sa dang po'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:394a-11: de'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:394a-12: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang /
T02TD1660E:394a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:394a-14: 'gro ba'i lam pa'i rnal 'byor bas dgod pa dang bltas pa dang /
T02TD1660E:394a-15: lag bcangs kyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:394a-16: chags pa'i lam gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:394a-17: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD1660E:394a-18: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:394a-19: 'di ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02TD1660E:394a-20: sangs rgyas thams cad la zhes pa ye shes sems dpa' dang rnal 'byor mnyam par sbyor bas dag byed kyi lha mo dang /
T02TD1660E:394a-23: bkas gnang ba'i lha mo dag kyang rnam par grol zhing byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:394a-24: de ltar chags pa'i lam bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:394a-25: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i spyod pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:394a-26: kun du kun nas thams cad du //
T02TD1660E:394a-27: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:394a-28: spyod lam bzhi la lha'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i dngos gzhi dang /
T02TD1660E:394a-29: mthun par mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor bas gnas thams cad dang dus thams cad kyi tshe dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid rtag par bsgoms nas /
T02TD1660E:394a-30: thams cad kyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:394b-0: rnal @394b 'byor bzhi bsgom pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:394b-1: 'di yi bdag nyid kun gnas pas //
T02TD1660E:394b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:394b-3: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD1660E:394b-4: gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba rnam pa gsum dang /
T02TD1660E:394b-5: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya yid du 'ong ba gsum lha mor bskyed pa'i p'u dza'i sprin thams cad kyi p'u dza na bde ba'i mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:394b-6: de ltar rnal 'byor ba'i dgos pa bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:394b-7: thams cad kyi rnal 'byor bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:394b-8: rnal 'byor thams cad nyer sbyor bas //
T02TD1660E:394b-9: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:394b-10: khams gsum pa thams cad lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed la /
T02TD1660E:394b-11: rnal 'byor ma kun gyis longs spyod pa 'khyud pa dang /
T02TD1660E:394b-12: 'o byed pa la sogs pa'i bde bas rab tu p'u dza bya'o //
T02TD1660E:394b-13: rjes su rnal 'byor thabs kyi 'khor lo dang shes rab kyi 'khor lo mnyam par sbyor ba bde bas p'u dza na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:394b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD1660E:394b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:394b-17: bde ba la stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas /
T02TD1660E:394b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ra sa ya na'i bde ba sgrub pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba'i mchog 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:394b-21: // / de ltar thabs mang ba bshad pa nas /
T02TD1660E:394b-23: rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1660E:394b-24: zab pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1660E:394b-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD1660E:394b-26: zhes bya ba'i rgyu'i rgyud dang /
T02TD1660E:394b-27: dpal ldan rab kyi dam tshig dge / zhes pa phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor bas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du bskyed pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:394b-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1660E:394b-29: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:395a-0: gti mug gi rigs can gyi phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor bas rten 'brel tshogs pa'i mthu nyid kyis @395a * //
T02TD1660E:395a-1: bde ba chen po so so rang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:395a-2: he ru ka'i dam tshig gi bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:395a-3: kun du bzang mo'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1660E:395a-4: phyag rgya bzhi rten 'brel gyi mthu nyid kyi mu dra bzhi so so la bde ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab na bde ba stong pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:395a-5: padma gar dbang gi dam tshig gi bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:395a-6: gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba stong nyid so sor bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:395a-7: rdo rje nyi ma'i dam tshig bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:395a-8: m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya bzhi la stong nyid kyis rgyas btab pas bde ba chen po so sor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:395a-9: rta mchog gi dam tshig bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:395a-10: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba bsam gtan dang zag med kyi sdom pa mngon sum du bskyed pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa'i mthu nyid kyis sgrol ma'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya gnyis las bde ba chen po so sor grub nas 'jig rten gyi dngos grub drug rjes su yi rang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:395a-11: de ltar lha so so'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:395a-12: rigs drug thun mong gi chos kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:395a-13: de yi dam tshig de 'byung ba //
T02TD1660E:395a-15: thabs drug po gang yin pa de'i dam tshig shes rab kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1660E:395a-16: sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang //
T02TD1660E:395a-17: zhes bya ba sdug pa ni lha mo'o //
T02TD1660E:395a-18: dam tshig ni rang snang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:395a-19: bdag rjes su 'brang zhes pa thabs dang sku mdog mthun pa'o ;
T02TD1660E:395a-20: / shin tu sbyor ba ni sgyu ma lta bur shes pa'o //
T02TD1660E:395a-21: sbyor ba chen po ni 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du shes pa'o //
T02TD1660E:395a-22: thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog / ces bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can rang snang gi lha mo drug go //
T02TD1660E:395a-23: gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa //
T02TD1660E:395a-24: zhes pa bsnyen sgrub bzhis lha dang lha mor bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1660E:395a-25: lhan cig spyod pa ni dga' ba gnyis so //
T02TD1660E:395a-26: rjes su sdug ces pas mchog dga'o //
T02TD1660E:395a-28: zhes pa lhan cig skyes dga'o //
T02TD1660E:395b-0: thams cad dga' ba @395b ma lus pa'i //
T02TD1660E:395b-1: phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che //
T02TD1660E:395b-3: bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
T02TD1660E:395b-4: rtog pa dam tshig lha mo'i zhes pa sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa bud med kyi gzugs can gyi sprul sku'o //
T02TD1660E:395b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba dang //
T02TD1660E:395b-6: zhes pa rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba gsum dang /
T02TD1660E:395b-7: bde ba stong pa nyid du shes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:395b-8: lha mo thams cad 'dus pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo'o //
T02TD1660E:395b-9: ma lus skal ba bzang po kun //
T02TD1660E:395b-10: zhes pa ye shes las skyes pa dang /
T02TD1660E:395b-11: zhing skyes pa dang sngags las skyes pa'o //
T02TD1660E:395b-12: bde ba so sor rjes 'grub pa //
T02TD1660E:395b-13: zhes pa lha mo de rnams la zhi gnas lhag mthong mngon sum du bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1660E:395b-14: de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:395b-15: phyag rgya chen po bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:395b-16: phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas //
T02TD1660E:395b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi mu dra la bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab nas bsgoms na nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa'i lha mo thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:395b-20: thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos //
T02TD1660E:395b-22: skal ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad la ye shes bsam pa'i bde bas myos nas snyoms par zhugs kyang sdig pa med cing //
T02TD1660E:395b-23: stobs kyi ngo mthon du zhes bya ba ni de'i mthus mngon sum du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1660E:395b-24: rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral bas & sdig pa med cing zhi gnas dang /
T02TD1660E:395b-25: lhag mthong mngon sum du skye bas na ngo mthong du'o //
T02TD1660E:395b-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bas mchog gi dngos grub thob nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi dngos grub kyi las byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:395b-27: rnam snang gi phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i phan yon ni /
T02TD1660E:395b-28: dbang po kun las byung ba yi //
T02TD1660E:395b-29: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:395b-30: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas p'u dza bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:395b-31: he ru ka'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02TD1660E:396a-2: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:396a-3: bde ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas he ru ka chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bor ro gcig pa'i dbang bskur ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:396a-4: he ni bde chen las byung ba //
T02TD1660E:396a-5: ru ni rin chen chags dang bral //
T02TD1660E:396a-6: ka ni rab tu rmongs pa sbyangs //
T02TD1660E:396a-7: bde ba kun gyi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1660E:396a-9: padma gar dbang gi phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02TD1660E:396a-10: lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la //
T02TD1660E:396a-12: zhing dang sngags dang las las skyes pa'i lha mo'o //
T02TD1660E:396a-13: de rnams la dga' ba bzhi'i tshul gyis ji lta bar bstan nas de stong pa nyid du bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:396a-14: rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02TD1660E:396a-15: rnal 'byor thams cad dang bde ba'i //
T02TD1660E:396a-17: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i spyod pas bde ba chen po kun du rnal 'byor gnyis kyi tshul gyis myong bar byed do ;
T02TD1660E:396a-18: ; rta mchog gi phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02TD1660E:396a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1660E:396a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:396a-21: dga' ba bzhi'i ra sa ya na'i bde ba des rdo rje sems dpa' grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:396a-22: de ltar phyag rgya chen po drug bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:396a-23: de rnams kyi 'dir gsungs pa ni sku dang gsungs dang thugs dang p'u dza dang yon tan dang lnga ste /
T02TD1660E:396a-24: lnga po de mdor bsdu na rdo rje 'dzin pa thugs dang /
T02TD1660E:396a-26: rin chen dbang phyug sku'i bdag nyid yin no //
T02TD1660E:396a-27: de dag dang ni dga' spyad na //
T02TD1660E:396a-28: zhes pa rigs lnga'am gsum gyi lha mo de rnams dang dga' ba gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin spyod na /
T02TD1660E:396a-29: 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro lding zhes pa lha'i rgyal po'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD1660E:396a-30: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mi mnyam pa zhes pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'di nyid la thob pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:396a-31: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD1660E:396a-32: bskyed rim rdul tshon gyi mandala mtshan ma thob nas dngos grub len pa'am /
T02TD1660E:396a-33: rdzogs rim lus dang bha ga dang chos kyi dbyings kyi mandala tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1660E:396b-0: pho nya'i gtsang sbra @396b gnyis kyis dngos grub sgrub pa na sgrub pa'i thabs ni lam dang po de nyid snang ba gnyis pa thabs mang ba /
T02TD1660E:396b-1: gsum pa zab pas dngos grub 'di blangs nas sems can gyi don phrin las zhes bya bar gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:396b-5: // / de ltar zab pa bstan nas dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa mchog gi dngos grub bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:396b-7: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:396b-8: dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde mchog yin no //
T02TD1660E:396b-9: lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:396b-10: zhes pa phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:396b-11: skal pa bzang mchog 'dod pa ste //
T02TD1660E:396b-12: zhes dbang bskur ba'i gang zag gi dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:396b-13: yang dag sbyor bas bde myong ba //
T02TD1660E:396b-14: zhes pa rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin zag med kyi bde ba myong ba'o //
T02TD1660E:396b-15: 'dod chags ther zug rtag pa can //
T02TD1660E:396b-16: zhes pa 'dod chags ni zag med kyi bde ba'o //
T02TD1660E:396b-17: ther zug ni mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i don de ltar 'ba' zhig rtogs pa 'das pa dang /
T02TD1660E:396b-19: ma byung ba med pas na rtag pa'o //
T02TD1660E:396b-20: de'i spyod pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:396b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen du //
T02TD1660E:396b-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:396b-23: zag med kyi gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya la spyod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:396b-24: sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa //
T02TD1660E:396b-25: zhes pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang gzungs dang sa rnams kyis bskal pa gsum gyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na /
T02TD1660E:396b-26: lha dang mi'i ris su skyes pa'i skal ba bzang po'i ye shes las skyes pa'i sngags dang zhing skyes las lta smos kyang ci dgos //
T02TD1660E:396b-27: lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang //
T02TD1660E:396b-28: zhes pa'i 'jig rten gyi dngos grub /
T02TD1660E:396b-29: sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po //
T02TD1660E:396b-30: zhes pa ma chag gi dngos grub /
T02TD1660E:396b-31: skal pa bzang po bde ba stong zhes pa /
T02TD1660E:397a-0: zag med kyi bde ba 'dod pas phyag rgya'i bde ba so sor des zag pa @397a * //
T02TD1660E:397a-1: med pa'i ye shes grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:397a-2: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:397a-3: las dang po pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:397a-4: dngos po thams cad las byung ba //
T02TD1660E:397a-5: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:397a-6: kun du bzang po'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-7: he ru ka yi spyod pa ni //
T02TD1660E:397a-8: rdo rje can gyis mchog grub dang //
T02TD1660E:397a-9: zhes pa ni khro bo dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi dang zag med kyi bde ba bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-10: padma gar dbang gi spyod pa ni /
T02TD1660E:397a-11: 'jig rten dbang po mchog gi dpa' //
T02TD1660E:397a-13: gos dkar mo dang mthun pa phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-14: rnam snang gi spyod pa ni sangs rgyas dag la bde ba dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:397a-15: sangs rgyas phyag rgya'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-16: rdo rje nyi ma'i spyod pa ni /
T02TD1660E:397a-17: khams gsum dag na ma lus pa //
T02TD1660E:397a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:397a-19: m'a ma k'i'i rigs dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-20: rta mchog gi spyod pa ni /
T02TD1660E:397a-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po //
T02TD1660E:397a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:397a-23: sgrol ma dang mthun pa'i phyag rgya bzhi la bde ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-24: de ltar mchog gi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi lha mo bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:397a-25: 'jig rten gyi dngos grub kyi bsam gtan gyi lha mo bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:397a-26: mthu chen la ni bkra shis brtan //
T02TD1660E:397a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:397a-29: bkra shis brtan ni de'i chung ma'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-30: 'phrog las ni dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-31: grub pa ni lha mo au ma'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-32: ngan pa las ni 'dod pa'o lha'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-33: dga' ba zhes pa de'i chung ma'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-34: ngo mthon stobs kyis phrogs nas zhes pa mngon sum du bkug nas bdag nyid longs spyod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:397a-37: tshogs 'khor byed pa'i dad pa la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:397a-38: de ltar btsun mo rin po che bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:397b-1: ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid //
T02TD1660E:397b-2: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:397b-3: khams gsum gyi bdag po la longs spyod thams cad phrogs nas bdag nyid kyang longs spyod cing dad pa la sbyin par byed do //
T02TD1660E:397b-4: rgyal srid bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:397b-6: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen gyi //
T02TD1660E:397b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:397b-8: lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi bdag po phrogs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing dad pa la yang sbyin par byed do //
T02TD1660E:397b-9: des 'jig rten gyi dngos grub bstan nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub ni /
T02TD1660E:397b-10: sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun //
T02TD1660E:397b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:397b-12: bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab nas /
T02TD1660E:397b-13: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba las mi bya ba gang yang med do //
T02TD1660E:397b-14: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sngags kyang rgyud dang yantra'i thabs gsum gyis phrogs nas gzhan la sbyin par byed na /
T02TD1660E:397b-15: 'jig rten gyi dngos grub lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD1660E:397b-16: bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa'i mthus dngos grub mchog thob pa dang /
T02TD1660E:397b-18: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dngos grub chen po dang /
T02TD1660E:397b-19: 'khor los sgyur ba yang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:397b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba bzhugs pa bstan pa ni la lar byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:397b-21: gdul bya btul ba'i thabs 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:397b-22: longs sku'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni 'dis /
T02TD1660E:397b-23: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:397b-24: bsam gtan bzhi ba'i lha'i gzugs dang bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su bsgyur ba sku'i tshe dang /
T02TD1660E:397b-25: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD1660E:397b-26: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i kha dog dang /
T02TD1660E:397b-27: stobs bcu la sogs pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD1660E:398a-0: zag med kyi snang ba rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin @398a * //
T02TD1660E:398a-2: 'gro ba bzang po thams cad kyi bsnyen pa bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:398a-3: longs sku de yang gcig tu nges pa ci yin snyam na /
T02TD1660E:398a-4: lha mo bzhi ka'i dbus na rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:398a-5: rigs drug 'khor lo'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgyas 'debs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:398a-6: 'jig rten gyi lha dang nges par legs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sems can rnams la sbyin par byed pa dang /
T02TD1660E:398a-7: 'khor ba ji srid par gnas kyi bar du bskal ba mang por sems can gyi don du srid pa la rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:398a-8: brtag pa bzhi pa'i 'grel ba rdzogs so /
T02TD1660E:398a-10: // / de ltar rtog pa thams cad thun mong du sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:398a-13: dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:398a-14: da ni gdul bya so so'i bye brag gi rtog pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:398a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:398a-17: 'dod chags chen po'i gang zag 'dul ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje dngos grub rtog pa lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog gis gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:398a-19: sngon 'dzam bu gling du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i skur bshad pa dang /
T02TD1660E:398a-20: rjes 'jug rnal 'byor ba'i dbang du byas na /
T02TD1660E:398a-21: gzugs brnyan gyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas /
T02TD1660E:398a-22: las dang po pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD1660E:398a-23: mchog tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ba dngos grub len pa dang /
T02TD1660E:398a-24: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gang zag la dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:398a-25: sngon 'dzam bu gling du byung ba'i sprul sku'i lugs kyi rim pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:398a-26: yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid //
T02TD1660E:398a-28: 'og min du byang chub pas chos kyi sku brnyes pa'o //
T02TD1660E:398a-29: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar //
T02TD1660E:398b-0: zhes pa byang chub pa lnga ba @398b la longs sku'i rgyu rdo rje sems dpa' 'am /
T02TD1660E:398b-5: rgyu'i rta mchog tu snang ba'i rtog pa'i tshogs thams cad la'o //
T02TD1660E:398b-6: grub pa dam pa mchog gi chos //
T02TD1660E:398b-7: zhes pas sngon sangs rgyas kyi lam du grub pa zag med dam pa mchog gi lam ni de nyid du gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:398b-8: kha sbyor thig le nas 'byung ba bzhin du zla ba dang /
T02TD1660E:398b-12: sku gyur pas rtog pa drug po thams cad la 'og min du byang chub pa'i tshe bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:398b-13: sna tshogs lam gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1660E:398b-14: zhes bya bas 'og min du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bzhugs nas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:398b-18: cho ga sna tshogs pa 'dod pa'i //
T02TD1660E:398b-19: sems can rnam par gdul ba dang //
T02TD1660E:398b-20: zhes pa rtog pa drug gi gdul bya 'dod chags chen po dang /
T02TD1660E:398b-24: ser sna dang le lo chen po can 'dul ba'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:398b-25: ye shes drug gi bde ba bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:398b-26: bha ga w'an sngon bde ba can du sprul sku'i 'bras bu ni /
T02TD1660E:398b-27: rdo rje 'chang drug pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul sems can gyi don du sprul nas /
T02TD1660E:398b-28: phyag rgya bzhi la mos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:398b-29: de yang thabs gang gis myur ba yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:398b-30: byin rlabs kyi lam gyis ye shes sems dpa' bcug pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:398b-31: de ltar sngon byung ba sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad nas rjes su 'jug pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:398b-32: nyin re'am yang na zla re'am //
T02TD1660E:398b-33: yang na de bzhin lo re na //
T02TD1660E:398b-34: ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang //
T02TD1660E:398b-35: sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:398b-37: bsnyen sgrub bzhi bsgoms pas bsnyen pa byas nas zhag gcig 'jog pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'am /
T02TD1660E:399a-2: ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes pa dkyil 'khor byed pa'i rnal 'byor bas bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i rim pas 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bskyed na p'u dza byas la sangs rgyas bde mchog gi zlos gar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:399a-3: yang na ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par mi 'dod na cha lugs byas nas bsgrub pa bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:399a-4: khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang //
T02TD1660E:399a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:399a-6: gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:399a-7: de bzhin srog dang rtsa las byung //
T02TD1660E:399a-8: zhes pa srog chags las byung ba'i ba so dang rva las byas pa dang /
T02TD1660E:399a-9: rtsva las byung ba'i shing la 'bur du brkos nas rang gi lha'i cha lugs su bya'o //
T02TD1660E:399a-10: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1660E:399a-11: sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rang tu zhes pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:399a-18: dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bstan pa //
T02TD1660E:399a-19: sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis //
T02TD1660E:399a-21: rigs drug gi rnal 'byor ba khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba'am skyes pa'am bud med kyi rtog pa drug gi 'khor lo gang dang gang ston pa'o //
T02TD1660E:399a-22: de yang gang zhig dang lhan cig bsgom zhe na /
T02TD1660E:399a-23: slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der //
T02TD1660E:399a-24: mchod pa byas nas de bsgrubs so //
T02TD1660E:399a-25: zhes bya bas dbang bskur ba'i slob ma'i tshogs dang /
T02TD1660E:399a-26: gdong rgyan gyon la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:399a-27: de ltar sngon byung dang rjes 'jug gi rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:399a-28: da ni rtog pa thams cad kyi sngon byung gi gleng gzhi gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:399a-29: de nas gzhan yang rtog kun gyi //
T02TD1660E:399a-30: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sprul pa'i rigs drug sprul par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:399a-31: gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya //
T02TD1660E:399b-0: de yang ston pa su zhig la gnas gang zhig tu su zhig dang lhan cig tu @399b dus nam gyi tshe thos she na /
T02TD1660E:399b-1: ston pa sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02TD1660E:399b-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba'i mchog / ces bya ba ste longs sku dang sprul sku'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1660E:399b-3: gnas ni gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o //
T02TD1660E:399b-4: 'khor ni thams cad bdag nyid do //
T02TD1660E:399b-5: dus ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:399b-6: der bzhugs pa'i chos sku'i ngo bo ni /
T02TD1660E:399b-8: rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste //
T02TD1660E:399b-9: rtag tu da ltar byung ba bzhin //
T02TD1660E:399b-10: ngo bo nyid kyis 'da' dka' ba //
T02TD1660E:399b-13: cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la //
T02TD1660E:399b-14: las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD1660E:399b-15: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs //
T02TD1660E:399b-16: gdul bya'i phyir ni byas pa yin //
T02TD1660E:399b-17: zhes pa rigs drug gi 'khor lo'i gzugs kyi rnam rtog sprul ba dang /
T02TD1660E:399b-19: sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g-yo kun //
T02TD1660E:399b-21: zhes bya bas snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang dang /
T02TD1660E:399b-22: bcud kyi 'jig rten lhar bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1660E:399b-23: sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams //
T02TD1660E:399b-25: ces bya ba phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi sems can gyi don du sprul par bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:399b-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel ba'o /
T02TD1660E:399b-28: // / de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD1660E:399b-29: de ltar sprul sku mi yul du babs pa'i thabs nyams su blang ba'i rim pa bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:399b-30: da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1660E:399b-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i yan lag gi don dang /
T02TD1660E:399b-32: brtag pa drug gi nyams su blang ba'i cho ga bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:399b-33: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbugs dbyung yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1660E:399b-34: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
T02TD1660E:399b-35: zhes bya ba sngon sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku'i mdzad pa bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1660E:399b-36: spro ba dang bsdu ba dang /
T02TD1660E:400a-0: @400a * // gnas pa dang brten pa'i tshul lo //
T02TD1660E:400a-1: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa'o //
T02TD1660E:400a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las //
T02TD1660E:400a-4: sngon bcom ldan 'das rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi tshe /
T02TD1660E:400a-5: bsam gtan bzhi'i yang thog tu /
T02TD1660E:400a-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul gyis sbyor nas dpal mchog la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:400a-7: de bstan pas sems can rnams gzugs sku la sogs par zhen pa sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1660E:400a-10: 'od srungs la sogs pas dbu ma'i theg pa bstan pas sgro 'dogs bsal bar mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:400a-11: de la sems can rmongs pas stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig la zhen pas sgro 'dogs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:400a-12: skur pa 'debs pa las bzlog pa'i phyir thabs kyi bla na med pa dang /
T02TD1660E:400a-13: shes rab kyi bla na med pa'i rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:400a-14: de yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i le'u dang po las go rims ji bzhin bshad pas the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD1660E:400a-15: shes rab kyis bla na med pa'i mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud stong phrag bco brgyad pa'i dbang du byas nas bdag nyid chen po rtag pa chos kyi sku las /
T02TD1660E:400a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi ngor rgyu'i rnam snang gis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:400a-19: phrin las mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:400a-20: sngon rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi bskal pa dang po la bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yang thog dang /
T02TD1660E:400a-21: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas dang /
T02TD1660E:400a-22: ri rab ri'i rtse mor dpal mchog de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'dul ba'i don de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab kyi 'khor lo 'gro ba lha'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pa sngon byung ba dang 'dzam bu'i gling du bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub dang /
T02TD1660E:400a-23: 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba dang mthun par rab byung gi tshul du sngon byung nas sde snod gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:400b-0: de tshe sems can thams cad shin tu stong @400b pa nyid la sogs pas ye shes rgyun chad 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bar shes pa'i rgyun 'gags nas phung po lhag ma med pas mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:400b-1: dor bar bya ba'i rnal 'byor de nyid mkhyen pas /
T02TD1660E:400b-2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba stong pa nyid phyogs gcig la zhen pa de dag stong nyid las 'grol zhing /
T02TD1660E:400b-3: phung po lhag med kyi mya ngan las 'das pa bzlog pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:400b-4: rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngal skyes kyi dkyil 'khor skyed par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:400b-5: bee ro'i dkyil 'khor des lta ba lhag na ci zhig ston snyam na /
T02TD1660E:400b-6: stong pa'ang ma yin mi stong pa'ang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:400b-7: don dam par sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02TD1660E:400b-8: rab tu mi gnas pa lta bu'i stong pa yang ma yin zhing /
T02TD1660E:400b-9: rnam bcas dang rnam med lta bu'i mi stong pa yang ma yin la /
T02TD1660E:400b-10: gnyis su med pa'i zung du 'jug pa dbu mar yang mi dmigs pas /
T02TD1660E:400b-11: shes rab stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD1660E:400b-12: thabs snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi chos sku rtog med las dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes su yongs su brtags pa'o //
T02TD1660E:400b-13: rnam par mi rtog pa la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa la mos pa yang lha'i 'khor lo thams cad brag ca'am sgra brnyan gyi tshul gyis brtag par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:400b-14: 'gro ba rmongs pa lha'i sku la zhen pas sgro 'dogs dang skur 'debs mi bya'o zhes pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:400b-15: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang lha'i de nyid gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD1660E:400b-16: ma 'ongs pa'i sgo gsum sngags kyi sgo / nas spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi tshe /
T02TD1660E:400b-17: theg pa chen po yon tan rgyas pa'i glus dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:400b-18: de yang mnyam nyid mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1660E:400b-20: mchog chos can zhes pa'i bar gyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:401a-1: shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:401a-2: nges par gsol gyi par gyis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:401a-3: rtag tu dri med thugs zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD1660E:401a-4: rtag tu rnam par zhes bya ba'i bar gyis so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:401a-5: tshad med tshad dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas yong mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bya ba na na tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:401a-6: ae ma'o shin tu bzang po zhes pa nas bdag la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:401a-7: slob dpon klu sgrub ni bsnyen pa'i dus su phra mo'i sa m'a dhi la snyoms par zhugs pa na /
T02TD1660E:401a-8: lha mo rnams kyi glus bskul bar bzhed do //
T02TD1660E:401a-9: aindra bh'u ti rgyu'i rnam snang zhu ba las 'bras bu'i bee ro bskyed pa'i phyir lha mo bzhi'i glus bskul bar bzhed /
T02TD1660E:401a-11: kun dga' snying po ni dkyil 'khor sgom pa rdzogs nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba nas bskul par 'dod do //
T02TD1660E:401a-12: ye shes zhabs ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog la bstod par the tshom mi za'o //
T02TD1660E:401a-13: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1660E:401a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02TD1660E:401a-15: de nas de yi sgrub pa dang //
T02TD1660E:401a-16: zhes bya bas rjes 'jug gi don bshad pa yin te /
T02TD1660E:401a-17: sgrub pa ni mtshan ma thob kyi bar du bsnyen sgrub gnyis lha'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:401a-18: shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub pa dang /
T02TD1660E:401a-19: ces pa mtshan ma thob nas /
T02TD1660E:401a-20: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:401a-21: gang gi srid pa 'di nyid la //
T02TD1660E:401a-22: dngos grub shin tu rtag pa 'thob //
T02TD1660E:401a-24: mchog gi dngos grub tuddha bo dhi'i ye shes grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:401a-25: de sgrub pa'i thabs gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:401a-26: rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis //
T02TD1660E:401a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1660E:401a-29: bee ro'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa byin gyi rlabs kyis lam ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa'o //
T02TD1660E:401a-30: thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis //
T02TD1660E:401a-31: thal mo lan gsum nges par brdab //
T02TD1660E:401b-0: ces pa ye shes sems dpa' byon pa la phyag byas nas snying gar bcug ste dbang bskur ba'i mthar pheg brdabs mnyes @401b par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:401b-1: dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur //
T02TD1660E:401b-2: de dang de yi ngo bor bya //
T02TD1660E:401b-3: zhes pa buddha'i dbang po dang rang gi mnyam par sbyor bar ro gcig par bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:401b-4: ji ltar mos pa chags pa dang //
T02TD1660E:401b-5: zhes pa lha la dang ba'i dad par mos par bsgoms na sha dza ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po dang /
T02TD1660E:401b-6: sngags kyi glu len cing bstod par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:401b-9: thams cad ni rnam pa'i bye brag go / bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun //
T02TD1660E:401b-11: sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub 'dzin //
T02TD1660E:401b-12: rab tu mthong zhing dngos grub po //
T02TD1660E:401b-13: zhes bya ba rang gi lus dang lha tha mi dad mthong ba dang reg pa dang /
T02TD1660E:401b-14: thos pa'i mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:401b-15: gang gi tshe dngos grub ma thob na bskyar chos gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:401b-16: sngar bshad pa'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas mtshan thog thag lha la bstod na de kho na nyid bskul ba yin pa dngos grub grub par gdon mi za'o //
T02TD1660E:401b-17: bee ro'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o //
T02TD1660E:401b-18: de ltar bee ro'i dbugs dbyung ba bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:401b-19: he ru ka yi dbugs dbyung ni //
T02TD1660E:401b-20: 'das pa'i dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:401b-21: 'das pa'i dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs bshad zin to //
T02TD1660E:401b-22: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD1660E:401b-23: zhes bya ba 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes la sems can thams cad gdug cing gtum par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:401b-24: gdug par 'gyur du zad mod nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1660E:401b-25: shin tu khro zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:401b-26: de'i rnam smin gyis du 'bod du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:401b-27: de nas tshe 'phos nas 'byung bo gtogs 'dod can gyi bu 'byung po dge ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:401b-28: de legs ldan byed nag por gyur nas /
T02TD1660E:401b-29: des grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:401b-30: rims dug dbyig dug la sogs pa log 'dren gyi las byed pa dang /
T02TD1660E:401b-31: 'jig rten gsum po 'jig par byed cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po rnams la 'tshe ba dang /
T02TD1660E:401b-32: lha la sogs pa tshe 'pho bar byed pa dang /
T02TD1660E:401b-33: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'jig par byed do //
T02TD1660E:402a-0: de'i tshe drag po 'jigs byed kyis gdug pa de ma bzod nas dbang po dang @402a * //
T02TD1660E:402a-1: bcas pa'i lha tshangs pa la skyabs su song po //
T02TD1660E:402a-2: tshangs pa yang khyab 'jug la skyabs su song ngo //
T02TD1660E:402a-3: khyab 'jug kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu chen po la skyabs su song ngo //
T02TD1660E:402a-4: lha chen po des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'cham ba'i rang bzhin shes nas de nyid la skyabs su song ngo //
T02TD1660E:402a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba de nyid kyis rdo rje se gol brda bas nas rdo rje bsdu ba mdzad de /
T02TD1660E:402a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin gang bar gyur to //
T02TD1660E:402a-7: rdo rje sems dpas gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can la zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur bar gzigs nas /
T02TD1660E:402a-8: shes rab thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD1660E:402a-9: thabs shes rab kyi snying po h'um gsungs pas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khros nas khro bo'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:402a-11: khro bo'i ched du brjod pa ni /
T02TD1660E:402a-12: khro bo'i tshul can khros pas ni //
T02TD1660E:402a-13: 'jig rten gsum yang sreg byed na //
T02TD1660E:402a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis //
T02TD1660E:402a-15: khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos //
T02TD1660E:402a-16: de nas sna yi rtse mo la //
T02TD1660E:402a-17: yid ni yang dag brtan par gzung //
T02TD1660E:402a-18: zhes pa dpal he ru ka yab yum thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i yab yum gyi mkha' gsang du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhu ba'i thig le yi ge h'um gyi gzugs su snang ba la sems bzung nas /
T02TD1660E:402a-19: gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse'i dbugs yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ring zhing dro bar gyur pa las he ru ka'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya goo r'i ma la sogs pa mngal skyes kyis byung bar gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:402a-20: de nyid ma 'ongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mngal skyes kyi rim pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:402a-21: bcom ldan 'das de nyid rnal 'byor pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:402a-22: bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mdog ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02TD1660E:402a-23: sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:402a-24: zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa /
T02TD1660E:402a-28: rgyab ma rmongs par mdzad pa ser po //
T02TD1660E:402a-29: phyag dang po gnyis na rdo rje dang dril bu //
T02TD1660E:402b-0: 'og ma @402b gnyis na 'jigs byed kyi pags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1660E:402b-1: gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu /
T02TD1660E:402b-2: bzhi pa gnyis na mdung dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1660E:402b-3: yang na zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1660E:402b-4: des phrin las ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02TD1660E:402b-5: 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag / ces pa nas /
T02TD1660E:402b-6: thams cad pha ma nas slang yang ni //
T02TD1660E:402b-7: thal bar gyur pa 'tsho bar byed pa'i phar gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:402b-8: ma rungs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad la sdug bsngal phab nas slar yang shi bas thal bar gyur pa las slar 'tsho bar mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:402b-9: slar yang ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02TD1660E:402b-12: rang gi nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar ba las byung ba'i dur khrod kyi zhing skyong du sprul nas /
T02TD1660E:402b-13: grib ma bzhin du sprul pa'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:402b-14: de nas ma lus pa'i bdud las grags pa /
T02TD1660E:402b-15: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i bar du gcod pa'i gdug pa la sogs pa'i khrag za bar nus pa dur khrod kyi rgyal po he ru ka dang lhan cig rol pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:402b-16: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyangs nas 'gro ba thams cad byang chub la bkod de /
T02TD1660E:402b-17: sems can gyi khams thams cad sbyangs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:402b-18: he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1660E:402b-20: // / de ltar he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:402b-21: da ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyung bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1660E:402b-22: 'das pa'i dus nas sngon byung ba //
T02TD1660E:402b-23: zhes pa nas 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba'i bar du bshad zin to //
T02TD1660E:402b-24: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD1660E:402b-25: zhes pa sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes la sems can thams cad rmongs pa'i dbang gis log par lta ba can du gyur to //
T02TD1660E:402b-26: de nas chags pa'i dbang gis du 'bod chen por skyes par gyur to //
T02TD1660E:402b-27: log lta can gyi shes rab de nyid sbyang ba'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:402b-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis ji ltar padma dmar po 'di 'dam las skyes kyang 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos pa bzhin te /
T02TD1660E:402b-29: khams gsum pa'i sems can 'od gsal glo bur gyi dri ma'i nyes pas ma gos pa gzigs nas spyan ras gzigs kyi skur bskyed pa yin //
T02TD1660E:402b-30: de yang su zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:402b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:403a-1: drug gi dkyil 'khor dang rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rtsa ba'i sprul sku yin zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:403a-2: de bas na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des log lta las byung ba'i 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:403a-3: so sor rtog pa 'dod chags dag pa'i mchod sbyin te /
T02TD1660E:403a-4: padma gar gyi dbang phyug thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba'i mngal skyes kyi rim pas padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis sna tshogs pa 'dul ba la kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po snang ba mtha' yas su gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:403a-5: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1660E:403a-7: // / de ltar gar gyi dbang phyug gi 'grel pa bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:403a-8: da ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dbugs dbyung ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1660E:403a-9: 'das pa'i dus nas sngon byung ba'i tshigs bcad gcig bshad zin to //
T02TD1660E:403a-10: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD1660E:403a-11: zhes bya ba ni buddha 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes la ser sna'i sems kyis 'dug cing nor la shas cher bsgom par gyur pa dang /
T02TD1660E:403a-12: shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa'i dbang gis yi dags kyi gnas su lhung bar gyur to //
T02TD1660E:403a-13: de nas tshe 'phos nas mi dbul bor skyes nas bkres pa dang skom pa dang /
T02TD1660E:403a-14: phan tshun gsod par gyur pa dang /
T02TD1660E:403a-15: shin tu gdug pa'i ser sna can gyi rnal 'byor de nyid sbyang ba'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:403a-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mnyam pa nyid kyi nor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas rdo rje nyi ma'i gzugs su mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:403a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje nyi ma des phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bud med rin po che la sogs pa'i char phab bas /
T02TD1660E:403a-18: sems can thams cad la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid ster ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:403a-19: gang gi phyir gdug cing ser sna can gyi nga rgyal gyis khro ba la zhi bas phan phar mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:403a-20: shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje nyi ma las /
T02TD1660E:403a-21: mngal skyes kyi rim pas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis ser sna can rnams rab tu gdungs nas ser sna med pa'i lhar bsgrubs so bya ba dang zhes bya ba lus ngag sems kyi dbang du bya ba'o //
T02TD1660E:403b-0: zlog pa dang zhes @403b bya ba srog dang rnam shes thim pa'o //
T02TD1660E:403b-1: dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du //
T02TD1660E:403b-2: zhes pa btsun mo la longs spyad pa dang /
T02TD1660E:403b-3: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la longs spyad pa'o //
T02TD1660E:403b-4: de ltar gzhan las rgyal bar byas te /
T02TD1660E:403b-5: sa 'og sa bla sa stengs kyi gnas gsum po mtha' dag gi rang dbang yod pa'i nor gyi tshogs thams cad kun du sdud par byed cing 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:403b-6: rdo rje nyi ma'i dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1660E:403b-8: // / da ni rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung ba bshad de /
T02TD1660E:403b-9: 'das pa'i dus na zhes pa'i shloka ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1660E:403b-10: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD1660E:403b-11: zhes pa 'od srungs kyi bstan pa'i rjes la'o //
T02TD1660E:403b-12: brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar gyur pa shes pa /
T02TD1660E:403b-13: le lo dang phrag dog dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1660E:403b-14: le lo des cir 'gyur snyam na /
T02TD1660E:403b-15: mnar med pa yi dmyal bar lhung //
T02TD1660E:403b-17: mnar med pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste brgyad do //
T02TD1660E:403b-18: de nas shi 'phos te mir skyes kyang byi po dang /
T02TD1660E:403b-20: rkun bos dge ba'i phyogs la bar du gcod pa'i las byed pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:403b-21: rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mkhyen nas bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin drag shul gyi sbyor ba'i tshul rta mchog gi tshul du skyed par byed pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:403b-22: gdul bya sems can thams cad dag par mos pas sdig pa med pa'i thugs rje'i stobs kyis mngon sum kho nar ro //
T02TD1660E:403b-23: pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis //
T02TD1660E:403b-24: zhes pa dbang bya ba dang longs spyad pa thim pa'i mdzad pas zil gyis non par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1660E:403b-25: ji ltar zil gyis non snyam na rta mchog yab yum mnyam par sbyor ba mngal skyes kyi rim pas shin tu le los gdug cing phrag dog gis gtum pa'i sems can rnam pa mang po'i 'jig rten thams cad 'jig par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sprul pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:403b-26: des ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02TD1660E:403b-27: byi bo chom po rkun po yis //
T02TD1660E:403b-29: byi bo ni gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1660E:403b-30: rkun po ni ma mthong bar nor 'phrog pa'o //
T02TD1660E:403b-31: chom po ni mngon sum du nor 'phrog pa'o //
T02TD1660E:403b-32: brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang //
T02TD1660E:404a-2: sgyu ni rang gi nyes pa 'chab pa'i thabs sems gya gyu ba'o //
T02TD1660E:404a-3: thams cad rnam par sbyor bar byed //
T02TD1660E:404a-5: gdul bya de dag sprul pa'i 'khor los sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:404a-6: ngo mthon stobs kyis de bzhin du //
T02TD1660E:404a-7: zhes pa mngon sum du brtson 'grus kyi sto pas kyis dbang du bya ba longs spyod pa thim pa'o //
T02TD1660E:404a-8: dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni //
T02TD1660E:404a-10: rdo rje ral gri mda' gzhu mdung rtse gcig pa be con gyis btul nas /
T02TD1660E:404a-11: de'i tshe 'jig rten kun las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:404a-12: de nas dbus kyi gtso bo rta mchog gi dbang du byas nas gdul bya rnams 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis rang gi rgyal srid skyong ba zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:404a-13: khams kyi rta mchog gnyis kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02TD1660E:404a-14: g-yem pa rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1660E:404a-15: g-yem pa'i dbang gis sku dang khro bo rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:404a-16: khro ba mngon spyod kyi sku dang /
T02TD1660E:404a-17: zhi ba 'dul ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sku dang /
T02TD1660E:404a-18: drag shul can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir drag po rgyas pa'i sku bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:404a-19: rta mchog de bzhir gang btul ba yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:404a-20: sdig pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis mngon sum du mnan nas lha mo byi ma 'phrogs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:404a-21: mthu'i tshe khyab 'jug mnan nas lha mo drug ma ni 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:404a-22: skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa mnan nas lha mo rab tu zhi ba 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:404a-23: 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas mi'i dbang phyug ma 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:404a-24: de ltar sngon byung gi dus sum rungs pa thams cad mnan nas lus ngag sems dbang du byas te /
T02TD1660E:404a-25: lha mo dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad 'phrogs nas longs spyod pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:404a-26: de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa 'gags nas srog thim pa dang /
T02TD1660E:404a-27: mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes nas ye shes thim pas na /
T02TD1660E:404a-28: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa nas /
T02TD1660E:404a-29: rdo rje las chen rnam ston pa //
T02TD1660E:404a-30: zhes pa'i bar du sprul pa'i skus sems can gyi don bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:404a-31: sems can de dag 'dul bar mdzad pa ni gang /
T02TD1660E:404a-32: thabs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1660E:404a-33: 'bras bu ni gang thob snyam na /
T02TD1660E:404b-0: nam mkha' @404b kun gyi skabs na dpal //
T02TD1660E:404b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas //
T02TD1660E:404b-3: thabs dang rtsal gyis sgrub pa yis //
T02TD1660E:404b-4: zhes pa dbang du bya ba'i thabs dang longs spyod pa'i rtsal gyis mngon spyod kyi sbyor ba'i stobs kyis bsgrubs pas khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid ma lus pa la dbang ba rta mchog gi gzugs su rdo rje 'dzin pa de yis thob par mdzad nas mngal skyes kyi rim pas rigs bsdus pa'i 'khor bzhis bskor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:404b-5: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mchog sprul nas mngon spyod kyi drag shul gyi sbyor bas sgrub par mdzad pa ni thabs yin no //
T02TD1660E:404b-7: thams cad rnam dag mos pa'i sa //
T02TD1660E:404b-9: sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel //
T02TD1660E:404b-10: zhes pa'i bar gyis mchog gi dngos grub dang /
T02TD1660E:404b-11: lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang //
T02TD1660E:404b-12: zhes pa nas 'jig rten gyi siddhi grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:404b-13: sangs rgyas byang chub bde ba che //
T02TD1660E:404b-15: rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas /
T02TD1660E:404b-16: shes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi sku bstan /
T02TD1660E:404b-17: sems can thams cad dri ma dag / ces pa nas /
T02TD1660E:404b-18: sems can khams la bstan par sbyin //
T02TD1660E:404b-19: zhes pa'i bar gyis longs sku bstan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:404b-20: rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yin //
T02TD1660E:404b-21: zhes pa nas sems can gyi don yang byed ces bya ba'i bar gyis sprul sku bstan to //
T02TD1660E:404b-22: rta mchog gi dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa'o /
T02TD1660E:404b-24: // / de ltar dbugs dbyung drug bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:404b-25: de rnams kyi mjug bsdu ba ni //
T02TD1660E:404b-26: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:404b-27: dbang bskur ba'i 'khor lo ni rnam pa drug yin la /
T02TD1660E:404b-28: dngos grub len pa'i 'khor lo ni lha brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02TD1660E:404b-29: yang na dpa' bo gcig pu'i brgya rtsa brgyad sprul nas /
T02TD1660E:404b-30: sngon byung gdul bya btul ba rnams rang byung gi gtam dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:404b-31: dkyil 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad po de rnams dang po sbyor ba'i rtsa ba'i lha gang gis sprul zhe na /
T02TD1660E:404b-32: nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
T02TD1660E:404b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' kun du gnas //
T02TD1660E:404b-35: dngos grub len pa'i rnal 'byor ba brgya rtsa brgyad kyang grub pa'i dbang phyug rab tu grub pa ste /
T02TD1660E:405a-0: 'jig rten thun mong dang mchog gi @405a * //
T02TD1660E:405a-2: thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed //
T02TD1660E:405a-3: ces pa dngos grub thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba phrin las thams cad la 'jug par byed do //
T02TD1660E:405a-4: gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa bskal pa dang po dpal mchog gi lo rgyus dang /
T02TD1660E:405a-5: bar gyi bskal ba sangs rgyas gsum gyi lo rgyus dang /
T02TD1660E:405a-6: bskal ba tha mar mnyam sbyor gyi dbugs dbyung dkyil 'khor drug gi brtag pa sprul pa dang /
T02TD1660E:405a-7: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa drug gi rjes 'jug bsgom pa gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:405a-10: // / de ltar sngon byung dang rjes 'jug gi dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor drug bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:405a-11: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i tshogs skal ba dang ldan par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:405a-12: de nas gzhan yang thams cad du //
T02TD1660E:405a-13: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:405a-14: gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba med na dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir //
T02TD1660E:405a-15: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad //
T02TD1660E:405a-16: ces bya bar sbyor ba gzhan yang zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor snga ma drug la ltos nas skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams smin par bya ba ni gzhan yang ngo //
T02TD1660E:405a-17: thams cad du zhes pa phyogs thams cad du skal ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag rtog pa drug pa la mos pa la'o //
T02TD1660E:405a-18: rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa ni rigs drug gi 'khor lo bshad pas gdul bya rnams btul ba'o //
T02TD1660E:405a-19: de thabs gang gis yin snyam na /
T02TD1660E:405a-20: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:405a-21: mkha' 'gro sgyur ma bde ba'i mchog / ces smos te /
T02TD1660E:405a-22: rigs drug gi sangs rgyas zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1660E:405a-23: so so'i skye bo'i rnal 'byor pa glo bur gyi dri ma dang bcas pa rnams mnyam par sbyar bas zhig nas dang lhag mthong gi mkha' 'gro ma'i sgyu ma'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa ste /
T02TD1660E:405a-24: de yang zhi gnas bde ba dang /
T02TD1660E:405a-25: lhag mthong stong pa nyid rgyu rkyen tshogs pas bde mchog ste /
T02TD1660E:405a-26: zag med kyi bde ba sgyu ma'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:405a-27: bde mchog de gnas gang du sgrub //
T02TD1660E:405a-28: dngos po gang zhig / sgrub thabs ji lta bu zhig gis sgrub snyam na dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:405a-29: de'i gnas ni phyi dang nang gcig yin la /
T02TD1660E:405b-0: phyi'i @405b gnas yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'am /
T02TD1660E:405b-2: bha ga dang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gsum la yin no //
T02TD1660E:405b-3: phyi rol gyi gnas yid du 'ong bar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bres nas bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ni brtag pa bdun pa las ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:405b-4: 'dir ni mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du mdzad nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1660E:405b-5: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1660E:405b-6: chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bzhi pa bskur ba gsum bshad pa bya'o //
T02TD1660E:405b-7: de la lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang bha ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bshed nas /
T02TD1660E:405b-8: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02TD1660E:405b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' bde byung ba //
T02TD1660E:405b-10: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pas na //
T02TD1660E:405b-11: zhes pas gnas gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:405b-12: zhi gnas bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /
T02TD1660E:405b-13: lhag mthong zag med kyi bde ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1660E:405b-14: bde ba de 'byung ba'i gnas ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor bha ga'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o //
T02TD1660E:405b-15: sarbba bdag nyid ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang lan pa'i bdag nyid rlung gnyis 'gog pa'i dus su dga' ba bzhi'i dus na rtag tu bzhugs so //
T02TD1660E:405b-16: de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni ye shes lnga thams cad kyi bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus rtag tu bzhugs so zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD1660E:405b-17: bsgrub pa'i dngos po gang zhe na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'da' bar mi bya ba ni dpal stong pa nyid dang sgyu ma lta bu ro gcig pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' der snang ba'i bde ba'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1660E:405b-18: thams cad kyi khyad par ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bzhi'i dpung rgyan do shal la sogs pas brgyan zhing spras pa'o //
T02TD1660E:405b-20: dri sbyangs me tog spos kyis brgyan //
T02TD1660E:405b-21: shing tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol //
T02TD1660E:405b-23: rdo rje dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa //
T02TD1660E:406a-0: @406a * // zhes pa ni dmangs rigs kyi bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa'i dpyid kyi dus kyi re ta dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:406a-1: bla re dam pa bres pa na //
T02TD1660E:406a-2: zhes pa gos sar pa bgos pa'o //
T02TD1660E:406a-3: rdo rje tshig dang mchod pa la sogs so //
T02TD1660E:406a-4: zhes pa brda dang 'khyud pa dang /
T02TD1660E:406a-5: 'o byed pa la sogs pa ka ra na'i mchod pas mchod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:406a-6: glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul //
T02TD1660E:406a-7: zhes pa glu bzhi len cing gling bu dang pi wang la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad bcus bskor ba'i gnas so //
T02TD1660E:406a-8: yang na sgra ji bzhin bshad pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD1660E:406a-9: me tog bdug pa mar me dri lha bshos la sogs pas brgyan zhing gnas su lus dang bha ga'i dkyil 'khor la sgyu ma'i bde mchog bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:406a-10: yang na bde ba'i gnas skyed mos tshal la sogs par rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas gdan nyi shu rtsa gcig pa bshams te /
T02TD1660E:406a-11: nang tshangs dang bcas pa'i 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i stan tshogs padmas brgyan pa'i ras kyis g-yogs la de thams cad kyi gdan la bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i rim pa dang po rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed la phyis rten de thams cad las 'khor gyi lha sprul bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:406a-12: de yang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma nyi shu tham pa mngal skyes kyi rim pas so sor rang gi lha sgom du gzhug go //
T02TD1660E:406a-13: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gzhal yas khang du ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
T02TD1660E:406a-14: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1660E:406a-16: sgo srung dang ni ldan par bya //
T02TD1660E:406a-17: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:406a-18: de rnams kha dog dang dbyibs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1660E:406a-19: rang gi lha dang 'dra ba'i zhes gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:406a-20: bud med rnams ni legs pa zhes pa bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas /
T02TD1660E:406a-21: rang rang gi lha mo bsgom pa'am /
T02TD1660E:406a-22: gdong rgyan dang do shal dang bcas pas rang gi mu dras mtshan ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtag par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:406a-23: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rdzas ni /
T02TD1660E:406a-24: mi yi mtshal ni grub pa la //
T02TD1660E:406a-25: dmar chen zhes bya bar bshad ces gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:406a-28: ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang //
T02TD1660E:406a-29: rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:406b-0: gtso @406b bo rtsa ba dang tshe 'phel bar byed pa ka ma ta tva dang /
T02TD1660E:406b-1: be sh'an ta tva zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dang /
T02TD1660E:406b-2: de'i rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba bzhi rtog pa med pa ni ni ranydza tattva zhes pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:406b-3: de ji ltar myang snyam na /
T02TD1660E:406b-4: rdo rje chu dang rdo rjer bcas //
T02TD1660E:406b-6: dri chen dri chu bcas pas /
T02TD1660E:406b-7: byang chub sems dpa' dang mtshal chen po ste sha dang bcas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga rang bzhin gyi mthus nus pa dang ldan pa thod pa'i snod du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ro rdo rje ma la sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:406b-8: de ni gang zag gcig gis ma yin par //
T02TD1660E:406b-9: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis myang bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:406b-10: zhi ba'i btung ba bstan pa ni //
T02TD1660E:406b-11: de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang //
T02TD1660E:406b-13: mtshal ni rang byung gi me tog go //
T02TD1660E:406b-14: khu ba ni sa bon no //
T02TD1660E:406b-15: mtshal chen po sgrub pa ni bdud rtsi sgrub pa'o//
T02TD1660E:406b-17: bdud rtsi lnga la mtshal chen po //
T02TD1660E:406b-18: zhes khyad par gyi ming gang gis gdags she na /
T02TD1660E:406b-19: bde ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i chags pa chen po las byung bas na dmar chen zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:406b-21: tsandan dmar po ste sha chen bcas pa tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pas lha thams cad kyis myong ba'i ra sa ya na shi ba slong pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:406b-23: rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pa //
T02TD1660E:406b-25: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas srin lag dang /
T02TD1660E:406b-26: mthe bo'i rtse mos zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na rtag par zag med kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:406b-27: de yang rdo rje gdan bzhi las /
T02TD1660E:406b-28: mthe bos gzhir bskyed nas srin lag ri rab tu bsams te /
T02TD1660E:406b-29: bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por bsgoms dkrugs te sprul pa /
T02TD1660E:406b-30: ri bo ba di ra las btus pa'i rtsva so ma ni zhes pa gi wang yod pa'i ba ser mo'i ko bar rig byed kyi sngags zlos shing brdungs nas 'thungs pas sdig pa dag par 'dod pa de bzhin du myang bar bya zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:406b-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te //
T02TD1660E:407a-0: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te go @407a * //
T02TD1660E:407a-2: / de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:407a-3: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:407a-4: de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus //
