T02TD1660E:407a-6: khrus byas shing lus dri zhim pos byugs la ci 'byor ba'i gos dang rgyan btags te /
T02TD1660E:407a-7: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing kha dri zhim pos bkang la rigs sna tshogs pa'i bud med skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:407a-8: aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgo sbyar nas reg bya'i bde ba la stong pa nyid kyi ye shes pa skyes nas /
T02TD1660E:407a-9: sngon po gnyid log pa'i tshul du gnas pa la dkyil 'khor gyi lha mos ye shes phab nas rnam rtog nub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na slob dpon gyis 'og nas 'byung ba'i shi ba slong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis blang zhing /
T02TD1660E:407a-10: btsun mo yum gyi bha ga'i gos kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje dga' ba'i sbyor bas bdag gi byang chub kyi sems bskul bar bya ste /
T02TD1660E:407a-11: thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka'i nam mkha'i rtsa'i dbus su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma zla ba zhes bya ba thabs shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems 'khor lo bzhi'i ri las 'das nas dung can ma'i nam mkha'i dbus su shar ba dag bla ma'i man ngag gi stobs kyis nges shes drangs nas ma bying zhing nyams su myong bas /
T02TD1660E:407a-12: sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur zhing bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:407a-13: de nyid rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:407a-14: nges pa'i lam zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:407a-15: nges pa'i lam ni kun dang ldan //
T02TD1660E:407a-16: zhes pa zhi gnas bde ba rtog med par nges pa lhag mthong bde ba stong pa nyid du nges pa'i lam dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:407a-17: rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1660E:407a-18: zhes pa rang bzhin brgyad cu las 'das pas na dga' ba bzhis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:407a-19: de ltar na bde ba chen po grub pa de las slong bar byed pa ni kun nas slong pa zhes bya ba ni shi ba slong ba'i glu gsungs pas sad par byas pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:407a-21: stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD1660E:407a-23: dpal khyod bdag ces pa'i bar du bstan to //
T02TD1660E:407a-25: 'di dag nyid glur blangs pa nas //
T02TD1660E:407b-0: ci @407b zhig smos zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:407b-1: slob ma shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob pa de lam dus dang ldan pa yin snyam na /
T02TD1660E:407b-2: lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pas //
T02TD1660E:407b-3: rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas //
T02TD1660E:407b-5: dga' ba'i dus su stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:407b-6: mchog dga'i dus su shin tu stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:407b-7: lhan cig skyes dga'i dus su chen po'i stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:407b-8: 'od gsal ba'i dus su rnam pa thams cad kyi stong pa nyid dang ldan pa ni lam bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:407b-9: de yang rang bzhin brgyad cu las 'das pas gnyis su med pa dang gnyis su brtags pa nub nas /
T02TD1660E:407b-11: gzhan dbang gi rtog pa dang bral te gnyis su med pa rang bzhin du mdzes par byas pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:407b-13: mchod pa de bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1660E:407b-14: dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi //
T02TD1660E:407b-18: sems snang ba rnam pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'jug par gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:407b-19: 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las kyang /
T02TD1660E:407b-20: sems can bsod nams cher 'phags shing //
T02TD1660E:407b-21: rnam gnyis mi g-yo de nyid bdag / sems kyi 'du byed g-yo ba ste //
T02TD1660E:407b-22: 'dus byas thams cad nyid du snang //
T02TD1660E:407b-24: dga' ba bzhi'i dus bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:407b-25: sna tshogs 'brang ba shin tu grub //
T02TD1660E:407b-27: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar rnam par smin pa dang /
T02TD1660E:407b-30: 'jig rten gsum ni rab grub pa //
T02TD1660E:407b-32: sems snang ba gsum 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:407b-33: 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1660E:407b-35: ji ltar tshul [*chu la?] chu bzhag dang //
T02TD1660E:407b-36: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02TD1660E:407b-37: rang gis rang gi ye shes ni //
T02TD1660E:407b-40: 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po ni sems kyi de kho na shes na /
T02TD1660E:407b-41: chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:408a-2: zhes pa shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag lus ngag sems bde ba'o //
T02TD1660E:408a-3: 'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrub //
T02TD1660E:408a-5: thams cad 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:408a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor ba //
T02TD1660E:408a-7: lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yin //
T02TD1660E:408a-8: sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po //
T02TD1660E:408a-11: chags lam pa las kyi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1660E:408a-12: grol lam chos dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sbyor bas dga' ba gsum gyi rol pa aa ra li kun du grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:408a-13: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
T02TD1660E:408a-14: lha mo kun dang bde mos pas //
T02TD1660E:408a-15: zhes pa phyag rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa dgu stong nyid kyi lha mo dang /
T02TD1660E:408a-16: sgyu ma lta bu ci bde ba ro gcig par mos pas zag pa med pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:408a-17: shes rab kyi ye shes dang dbang bzhi pas lan cig nyams su myong nas dus thams cad du stong pa nyid ji ltar shes par 'gyur snyam nas /
T02TD1660E:408a-18: nyi ma gsal bar 'char ba yi //
T02TD1660E:408a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1660E:408a-21: 'khor lo bzhi la byang chub sems nyi zla'i tshul du gsal nas aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgor 'char ba'i tshe /
T02TD1660E:408a-22: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gsungs //
T02TD1660E:408a-24: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi mkha' 'gro ma bde ba stong pa nyid kyi sgyu ma'i tshogs pa 'byung ba la /
T02TD1660E:408a-25: lan cig bla ma'i man ngag gi stobs kyis nges pa drangs shing dmigs pa la dus phyis dus thams cad dang /
T02TD1660E:408a-27: rnam pa thams cad la bde ba'i dngos grub kun gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:408a-28: gal te bde ba stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig la dmigs nas srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud nas brtan zhing grub par 'gyur ba'i tshe ji ltar bya snyam na slong bar byed ces gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:408a-32: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i glu gandha rbha ste /
T02TD1660E:408a-33: dri za can zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1660E:408b-0: sardza ste drug ldan zhes bya ba'i 'og nas 'byung ba'i glu blangs pas bde ba @408b chen po'i ting nge 'dzin slong ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:408b-1: de nas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las ye shes phab nas nye bar bsdu ba bzhin du 'dir yang blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:408b-2: rjes su chags pa rnam mang zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:408b-3: bde ba grub par mdzod ces pa'i bar du me long lta bu'i zung 'jug bshad do //
T02TD1660E:408b-4: kye mchog ces pa nas rol cig ho zhes pa'i bar du mnyam pa nyid kyi zung 'jug bshad do //
T02TD1660E:408b-5: kye mchog tu gsang ba zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:408b-6: gsal bar mkhyen zhes pa'i bar du so sor rtog pa'i zung 'jug bshad do //
T02TD1660E:408b-7: dam tshig thams cad ces pa nas /
T02TD1660E:408b-8: rab tu bsgrubs la ston pa zhes pa'i bar du bya ba nan tan gyi zung 'jug bshad do //
T02TD1660E:408b-9: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:408b-10: aa la la ho zhes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi zung 'jug bshad do //
T02TD1660E:408b-11: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du sgra brnyan na lta bu'i glus bskul nas rnam par shes pa'i 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin dbang bzhi pa 'jug pa yin pa de bas na /
T02TD1660E:408b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis slob ma gzhug par gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:408b-13: de ltar sgra brnyan lta bu'i glus bskul nas chos kyi dbyings dbang bzhi pas rang gi sems kyi chos nyid rtogs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:408b-14: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs nas bde ba chen pos rgyas gdab pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:408b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam 'phrul ma lus shing lus pa med par snang ba zhes bya ba glu'i rgyal po gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:408b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi gnas ;
T02TD1660E:408b-18: sems 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
T02TD1660E:408b-19: sgyu ma kun gyi bde mchog ces pa /
T02TD1660E:408b-20: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgyu ma las snang srid lha'i 'khor lor rtogs pa'i bde mchog dang /
T02TD1660E:408b-21: lus kyi dkyil 'khor las gsang ba'i dbang gi sgyu ma las snang srid sgyu mar rtogs pa'i bde mchog dang /
T02TD1660E:408b-22: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor du shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi sgyu ma las yum gyi stong pa nyid kyi bde mchog rtogs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:409a-0: rang gi sems kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang bzhi pa'i sgyu ma las rnam par mi rtog pa zag pa med pa'i bde mchog rtogs pa @409a * //
T02TD1660E:409a-2: da ni chos thams cad la khyab pa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i kun du 'gro ba'i bde mchog ston pa'i glu ni rnam pa mang po 'dod chags rgyud kyi zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:409a-3: te na te te h'um zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid me long lta ba'i zur du 'jug pa'i ye shes bstan pa yin no ;
T02TD1660E:409a-4: / rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud //
T02TD1660E:409a-6: h'um h'um h'um zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid mnyam pa nyid kyi zung 'jug pa'i ye shes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:409a-7: rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud //
T02TD1660E:409a-9: ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo h'um zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi zung 'jug bstan to //
T02TD1660E:409a-10: rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud //
T02TD1660E:409a-12: h'um shi ya a'a be sha h'um zhes pa'i bar gyis snang srid thams cad bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi zung 'jug bstan to //
T02TD1660E:409a-13: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i skad kyis me long lta bu'i chos nyid ni 'dod chags kyi rgyud yin la /
T02TD1660E:409a-14: mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid ni rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud yin zhing /
T02TD1660E:409a-15: so sor rtog pa'i chos nyid ni khro bo'i rgyud yin te /
T02TD1660E:409a-16: bya ba grub pa'i chos nyid ni srog gi rgyud ces bya ba /
T02TD1660E:409a-17: rang byung thams cad kyi la glu'i mu dra zhes grags so //
T02TD1660E:409a-18: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa'i sgra brnyan lta bu'i glu mtha' yas pas gdul bya mtha' yas pa 'grub pa'i dbang phyug sems 'od gsal grub nas /
T02TD1660E:409a-19: snang srid thams cad 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin du grub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:409a-20: lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas //
T02TD1660E:409a-21: zhes pa sngar bshad pa'i glu gnyis so //
T02TD1660E:409a-22: de dag nyid bde mchog ma dang /
T02TD1660E:409a-25: slob ma mo dang bzhis glus bskul ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:409a-26: de ltar rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyis gsang ba shes rab ye shes dbang bzhi pa thob nas /
T02TD1660E:409a-27: da ni slob ma rnams la dkyil 'khor drug gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo mi 'dra ba drug mdzad nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1660E:409a-28: bha ga chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor drug la slob ma drug dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:409b-0: dbang po kun las phyung ba'i zhes smos @409b te ;
T02TD1660E:409b-1: rgyu'i he ru ka drug gi thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i mkha' gsang las byung ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo gling bu ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:409b-2: me tog ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi bkod pas bdag nyid yab yum mchod la /
T02TD1660E:409b-3: bha ga dang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1660E:409b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog rigs bzhi'i dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid kyi lus su snang srid thams cad ma lus par 'grub pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:409b-5: de ltar rigs drug gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa mdor bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:409b-7: ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis //
T02TD1660E:409b-9: rigs drug gi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bskyed la ye shes phab nas bsnyen sgrub bzhis bud med dag lha mor bsgrubs la /
T02TD1660E:409b-10: rdo rje 'khor lo thod pa rin po che /
T02TD1660E:409b-11: sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams ba'i lha mor 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:409b-12: de dag kyang rang gi lha mo 'dra bar ye shes phab nas bsgrubs na ye shes babs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:409b-13: sngon ma byung ba'i rol mo sil snyan gar dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:409b-14: ye shes babs na sngon ma byung ba'i lha'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i bde ba gang yin pa yid la mos par rang nyid lhar mthong ba'i tshe mchod par byad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:409b-15: lha'i mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:409b-16: zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i rtog med skal ba bzang po mchog gi bde pa stong pa'i 'dod chags can /
T02TD1660E:409b-17: slob ma kun la skal ba bzang po'i bde ba sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02TD1660E:409b-18: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis sgyu ma'i byin gyis brlabs pas zag med kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba dang mnyam par sbyor ba rtog pa drug gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi bde ba rnams /
T02TD1660E:410a-0: dkyil 'khor drug gi mthong ba las dga' ba bzhi'i bde ba myong ba'i mthu nyid kyis dkyil 'khor drug gi lha brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor skal ba bzang po brgya rtsa brgyad rang rang gi lha'i lus ngag yid kyi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub pa yin @410a * //
T02TD1660E:410a-2: / tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i dga' bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bstan nas tshogs kyi yul chos kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:410a-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs can dang //
T02TD1660E:410a-5: lha'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i yid du 'ong ba'i bdag nyid la dga' ba bzhi'i bde ba bsgoms pas dngos grub ma lus pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:410a-6: de ltar tshogs 'khor rdzogs pa'i tshe /
T02TD1660E:410a-7: rnal 'byor pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyi ched du brjod pa ni /
T02TD1660E:410a-8: aom sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1660E:410a-9: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog gsang //
T02TD1660E:410a-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar //
T02TD1660E:410a-11: rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang //
T02TD1660E:410a-13: de nas rang rang gi yum bzhi'i glus 'khor lo drug la bstod pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:410a-14: de nas yang dag rab bsang ba //
T02TD1660E:410a-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la bde mchog ma dang /
T02TD1660E:410a-19: slob ma mo'i bud med bzhis bstod par bsam mo //
T02TD1660E:410a-24: mig gzang ma dang bzhis bstod par bsam mo //
T02TD1660E:410a-29: be t'a l'is bstod par bsam mo //
T02TD1660E:410a-34: khro gnyer ma bzhis bskul bar bsam mo //
T02TD1660E:410a-35: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ma /
T02TD1660E:410a-38: las mchog ma bzhis bstod par bsam mo //
T02TD1660E:410a-40: zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod kyi lha mo bzhis bskul bar bsam mo //
T02TD1660E:410a-42: rab tu dga' ba zhes pa nas thams cad 'grub par mdzod ces pa'i bar gyis bshad do //
T02TD1660E:410a-43: glu de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02TD1660E:410a-44: glu'i phyag rgya 'di yis las rab 'byam la 'byor ba'i yang bstod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:410a-45: dngos grub 'grub par ma gyur ba'i tshe bstod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:410a-46: yo byad ma 'byor ba'i tshes byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:410b-0: yang slob ma 'jug pa'i tshe @410b glu'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang /
T02TD1660E:410b-1: sngar bshad pa'i lha mo bzhi po dag gis me tog la sogs pa lag tu thogs nas slob ma thams cad dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD1660E:410b-2: de ltar tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor drug ni slob dpon gyi cho bshad nas //
T02TD1660E:410b-3: da ni slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad de /
T02TD1660E:410b-4: mchog tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa dngos grub 'dod pa'i rgyun bshags dang /
T02TD1660E:410b-6: sems bskyed pa phyi rol du las thams cad ba'i bum pas dbang bskur nas ci rigs par rigs drug gi snyems pa'i gar kun nas bskor zhing spyod pa 'ching du bcug la /
T02TD1660E:410b-7: rigs drug gi kha dog gi ras kyis gdong g-yogs la gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:410b-8: de ltar dngos grub thob par 'dod pa'i slob ma la ye shes phab nas phreng ba dor zhing bcing ba dang /
T02TD1660E:410b-11: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs te /
T02TD1660E:410b-13: cod pan rdo rje dril bu ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:410b-14: de ltar bum pa'i dbang bskur nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD1660E:410b-15: dmar chen po dang ga bur bcas //
T02TD1660E:410b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:410b-18: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD1660E:410b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:410b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:410b-21: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i tshogs kyi bha ga'i dkyil 'khor lo ;
T02TD1660E:410b-22: / des kyang rgyas mi 'debs pa ni bde ba rtog med la rang bzhin brgyad cu'i zil gyis gnon pa'o //
T02TD1660E:410b-23: rmongs pa ni bde ba stong pa nyid rtog pa la gzung 'dzin gyi dri mas mi rmongs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:410b-24: de la gnon par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1660E:410b-25: zhes pas sems kyi stong pa nyid dbang bzhi pa rtogs pa la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1660E:410b-26: de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i rjes la /
T02TD1660E:410b-27: dbang bzhi ba'i man ngag bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:410b-28: de nas man ngag ni bsgrag par bya zhes pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:410b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa'i zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:411a-0: snying la khrag chen 'phung ba zhig / ces pa'i bar @411a * //
T02TD1660E:411a-1: du man ngag bsgrags pa bstan to //
T02TD1660E:411a-2: dbugs dbyung ba bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:411a-3: sems can khams ni ma lus don //
T02TD1660E:411a-5: rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal te //
T02TD1660E:411a-6: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:411a-7: de nas rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ston pa las /
T02TD1660E:411a-8: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni //
T02TD1660E:411a-9: rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i //
T02TD1660E:411a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:411a-11: rnal 'byor bcas pa ni tshogs 'khor ro //
T02TD1660E:411a-12: gsang bcas ni zhi ba'i btung ba'o //
T02TD1660E:411a-13: bdag gis phyag rgya sgrub ces pa pho nya'i gtsang sbra'o //
T02TD1660E:411a-14: lha yi tshul bzhin gar byed pas //
T02TD1660E:411a-15: slob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin //
T02TD1660E:411a-16: zhes pa gtsang sbra gsum gyi man ngag bstan to //
T02TD1660E:411a-17: slob ma mchog gi rnal 'byor ba de /
T02TD1660E:411a-18: de phyin chad sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i phyag rgya bzung nas /
T02TD1660E:411a-19: rnam snang dang sangs rgyas spyan bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:411a-20: de nas ro dang zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:411a-21: bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgur mchod //
T02TD1660E:411a-22: ces pa'i bar gyis gal te bdag nyid dga' bral du song na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:411a-24: rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1660E:411a-25: byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya /
T02TD1660E:411a-27: de nas bdag nyid gtsang sbra gsum bsgrubs nas kun gyi slob dpon du rab tu gnas nas rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba rtog med kyi bde ba stong pa nyid la ji lta bu'i tshul gyis slob ma 'jug pa la bden pa'i chos zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:411a-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsang sbra gsum gyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1660E:411a-29: da ni rnam snang gi gtsang sbra gsum gyi phyag rgya sgrub pa ni /
T02TD1660E:411a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul //
T02TD1660E:411a-32: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsang sbra gsum gyi bsgrub cing rtog pa kun gyi lhar sgom pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po byed par 'dod pas bsnyen sgrub bzhi sna tshogs kyi las kyi sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1660E:411a-33: chags lam grol lam gyis 'dul ba'i bdag nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs pas /
T02TD1660E:411b-0: @411b sems can gyi mos pa mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de las gzhan pa rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02TD1660E:411b-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyis zhi ba'i skus 'dul ba'i thar ba thams cad sbyangs nas /
T02TD1660E:411b-2: grol ba'i mkha' 'gro rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas rnal 'byor pho mo rang gi lha dang 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1660E:411b-3: mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD1660E:411b-4: rang gi phyag rgya dang ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i tshogs 'khor dang /
T02TD1660E:411b-5: zhi ba'i btung ba pho nya'i gtsang sbra bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:411b-6: he ru ka'i gtsang sbra gsum bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:411b-9: zhe sdang sbyang ba'i phyir he ru ka'i gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:411b-10: padma gar gyi gtsang sbra ni /
T02TD1660E:411b-11: gzhan ni shun tu rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1660E:411b-12: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:411b-13: log ltas kun nas bslang ba'i 'dod chags sbyong ba'i phyir skal pa bzang po mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ba la padma gar dbang gi gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:411b-14: rdo rje nyi ma'i gtsang sgra gsum gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:411b-17: ser sna can sbyang ba'i phyir rdo rje nyi ma'i gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:411b-18: rta mchog gi gtsang sbra ni /
T02TD1660E:411b-21: drag shul can gyi gang zag sbyang ba'i phyir rta mchog gi gtsang sbra gsum gsungs pa yin no ;
T02TD1660E:411b-22: / de ltar gtsang sbra bshad nas rtag pa drug gi rnal 'byor pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dpa' bo gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bsgoms la rang gi las kyi phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad byin gyis brlabs nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:411b-23: rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis //
T02TD1660E:411b-24: rang gi byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa //
T02TD1660E:411b-25: gzugs brnyan ngo bo sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1660E:411b-26: sangs rgyas sbyor ba gar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:411b-28: lha brgya rtsa brgyad kyi nga rgyal byas nas rang gi lha brgya rtsa brgyad byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1660E:412a-0: tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhi ba btung ba pho nya'i gtsang sgra'i dam tshig rnam pa sna @412a * //
T02TD1660E:412a-1: tshogs kyis de ltar dga' bzhi spyad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:412a-2: rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'dod pas dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor shar du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD1660E:412a-3: nub tu padma gar dbang gi / lhor rdo rje nyi ma'i /
T02TD1660E:412a-4: byang du rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhag la sgrub pa'am /
T02TD1660E:412a-7: rdo rje nyi ma gzhag par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:412a-8: kun du kun nas thams cad du //
T02TD1660E:412a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:412a-10: gnas kun du dus thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'khor thams cad bdag nyid thams cad kyi sgo nas rnam pa kun du sangs rgyas la so sor 'khor lo rten gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1660E:412a-11: g-yo ba lha'i rang bzhin gyis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1660E:412a-12: mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni dbus su rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gzhag pa ni /
T02TD1660E:412a-13: dbus su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1660E:412a-14: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:412a-15: rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis so //
T02TD1660E:412a-16: lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba'i rnam snang gi bdag nyid kyi rnam 'phrul ston pa dang /
T02TD1660E:412a-17: 'khor gyi lha mo gling bu ma dang /
T02TD1660E:412a-18: me tog ma la sogs pa /
T02TD1660E:412a-19: rta gdong ma la sogs pa lha mo bcu gnyis kyis phyi rol gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa sangs rgyas sprul pa 'grub par byed pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:412a-20: de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku ma rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba bzhag la /
T02TD1660E:412a-21: 'khor gyi lha mo bcu gnyis ni thun mong du gzhag pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:412a-22: de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su padma gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni /
T02TD1660E:412a-24: zhes pa la sogs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:412b-0: lho phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni khams @412b gsum pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:412b-1: byang phyogs kyi ka ba'i dbus su rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni /
T02TD1660E:412b-2: khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che //
T02TD1660E:412b-3: bdag gdul spyod pas zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:412b-4: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad gang rung dbus su gtso bor byas pa ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:412b-5: dpal dgyes rol pa'i rnam 'phrul ba //
T02TD1660E:412b-6: zhes pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas sprul pa'o //
T02TD1660E:412b-7: sna tshogs kun gyis rnam par rol //
T02TD1660E:412b-8: zhes pa 'dul byed kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:412b-9: rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02TD1660E:412b-10: zhes pa gdul bya sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:412b-11: rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis //
T02TD1660E:412b-12: zhes gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:412b-13: gdul bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD1660E:412b-14: sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrubs //
T02TD1660E:412b-15: zhes pas mchog tu grub pa'i rnam 'byor pa mtha' yas pas rtog med du bsgrubs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:412b-16: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa bla ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rim pas rtog pa drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1660E:412b-17: dpa' bo re re bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1660E:412b-18: rtog pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa bsgoms pas thams cad kyi bdag nyid grub pa gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:412b-21: // / de ltar gleng gzhi de kho na nyid snang ba'i yul la 'jug pas zhes pas gnas lugs bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:412b-24: dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'i le'u gsum gyi bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD1660E:412b-25: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i thabs kyis mtshan ma thob par byas nas /
T02TD1660E:412b-26: dbugs dbyung ba rtog pa drug gi sngon byung sangs rgyas kyi sprul sku'i mdzad pa dang mthun par /
T02TD1660E:412b-27: rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms la /
T02TD1660E:412b-28: las dang po pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'ang rung /
T02TD1660E:412b-29: mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang rung /
T02TD1660E:412b-30: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'ang rung ste /
T02TD1660E:412b-31: dbugs dbyung drug gi grangs dang /
T02TD1660E:413a-1: mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa bya ba bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:413a-2: bsnyen pa grub pa'i rjes la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang /
T02TD1660E:413a-3: rnal 'byor ma lha'i cha byang du byas pas las bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD1660E:413a-5: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:413a-6: da ni gzugs brnyan lugs su blugs pa'am /
T02TD1660E:413a-7: 'bur du brkos pa'am ri mor bris pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la mos pa'i ngor dbyugs dbyung pa drug gi bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD1660E:413a-8: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:413a-9: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02TD1660E:413a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:413a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' sna tshogs kun gyi mchog gi 'khor lo drug gi gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bzhed pas /
T02TD1660E:413a-12: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa rdul tshon gyi bdag nyid du bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:413a-13: gsang ba dpal he ru ka mchog ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug dgyes pa rdo rje nyi ma ste /
T02TD1660E:413a-14: bdag gi rta mchog gi brtag pa rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1660E:413a-15: rjes su bsgrub pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gsungs pas /
T02TD1660E:413a-16: rdul tshon drug gi bsgrub pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:413a-17: de la yang bye brag gi rigs gnas gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:413a-19: ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1660E:413a-20: zhes bya bas rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:413a-21: rten dang dgon pa zhes pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi gnas gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:413a-22: dur khrod ces pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'i gnas gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:413a-23: padma zhes pa nas grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis padma gar dbang gi gnas gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:413a-24: rgyal po zhes pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje nyi ma'i gnas gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:413a-25: 'khor ni zhes pa nas bsgrub par bya zhes pa'i bar gyis rta mchog gi gnas gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:413a-26: de ltar dkyil 'khor bzhi'i gnas bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:413a-27: rnal 'byor ba'i cha lugs dang rdzas bsags pa bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:413a-29: rta mchog rdo rje can gyis so //
T02TD1660E:413a-30: zhes pa'i bar gyis ston to //
T02TD1660E:413b-0: zhes pa gnas kyi rten gyi 'khor lo drug @413b go ;
T02TD1660E:413b-1: /'khor gyi rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor ba rigs su bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ma byas na rigs drug la lha brgya rtsa brgyad yin no //
T02TD1660E:413b-2: rigs bsdus byas na phyogs bzhir gtso bo dgu dgu sum cu rtsa drug yin la /
T02TD1660E:413b-3: 'khor gling bu ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:413b-4: me tog ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:413b-5: rta gdong ma la sogs pa bzhi yang drug drug dgod pas lha bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha brgya rtsa brgyad 'phel ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:413b-6: phrin las bzhi ni rta mchog dang /
T02TD1660E:413b-7: yab yum gsum so sor bgrangs pa'i brtsi bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1660E:413b-8: bkod pa ni dbyibs yin te /
T02TD1660E:413b-9: gzhal yas khang gi dbyibs dang lha'i sku mdog dang /
T02TD1660E:413b-10: phyag mtshan gyi dbyibs yin no //
T02TD1660E:413b-11: bkod pa rigs drug gi gtso bo ste ci 'dra ba zhes pa dang sbyar na bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:413b-12: 'khor nas ni sngon byung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1660E:413b-13: de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog mdzad ces pa gzugs brnyan bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa'o //
T02TD1660E:413b-14: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo sprul pa'i sku mthong ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par bris pa'i dkyil 'khor yang bsod nams su 'gyur zhes pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dgos pa bshad pa'o //
T02TD1660E:413b-15: de ltar dgos pa bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:413b-17: dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:413b-18: gang gis gdab ce na dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab ces gsungs te drug gi'o //
T02TD1660E:413b-21: / ji ltar bsam pas she na /
T02TD1660E:413b-22: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pas so //
T02TD1660E:413b-23: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cha du bya zhe na /
T02TD1660E:413b-24: shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor //
T02TD1660E:413b-25: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02TD1660E:413b-27: ka ba brgyad kyi thig btab pas /
T02TD1660E:413b-28: cha brgyad dang dbus ma dang dgur 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:413b-29: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji tsam zhe na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i snang pa sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ni ci 'dra ba yin pa brtag par mi nus so //
T02TD1660E:414a-0: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor drug ni rang gi lha yang mang nyung gi bye brag gis @414a * //
T02TD1660E:414a-1: de ni tshad kyi dkyil 'khor mos pas brtags na yang 'grub po //
T02TD1660E:414a-2: dkyil 'khor lhag ma dang ma tshang pa ji ltar dag par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1660E:414a-3: bdag nyid ces pa nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis ston te /
T02TD1660E:414a-4: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02TD1660E:414a-6: kun du sna tshogs 'khor lo can //
T02TD1660E:414a-7: zhes pa thabs kyi rgyud do //
T02TD1660E:414a-8: kun du sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1660E:414a-9: zhes pa nas mar tshigs bcad phyed 'bras bu'i rgyud bstan /
T02TD1660E:414a-10: phyi'i dkyil 'khor la khyad med kyang nang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1660E:414a-11: rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor dkar po /
T02TD1660E:414a-12: ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa rdo rje phreng pa zlum pos bskor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:414a-13: he ru ka'i nag po zla gam dgus bskor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:414a-14: padma gar dbang gi padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi bar du padma'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa /
T02TD1660E:414a-15: kha dog dmar po la padma'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:414a-16: rdo rje nyi ma ni rin po che'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa zur brgyad pa rtse mo rin po che'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:414a-17: rta mchog gi ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje'i ka brgyad dang ldan pa sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:414a-18: ji ltar 'dod pa'i rta mchog dpa' bo gcig pu'am /
T02TD1660E:414a-19: lha bcu dgu pa'am bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor lha brgya bco ldan pa bri'o //
T02TD1660E:414a-20: ci 'byor pa ni rdzas dang yo byad che chung ngo //
T02TD1660E:414a-21: ji lta bu'i dus zhes bya ba /
T02TD1660E:414a-22: zhi ba tho rangs kyi dus su zhi ba'i rta mchog dbus su gzhag pa dang /
T02TD1660E:414a-23: rgyas pa snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i rta mchog gzhag pa dang /
T02TD1660E:414a-24: mngon spyod nyi ma phyed na mngon /
T02TD1660E:414a-25: spyod kyi rta mchog gzhag pa dang /
T02TD1660E:414a-26: dbang srod la dkyil 'khor dbus su dbang gi rta mchog go //
T02TD1660E:414a-27: ci bde bar zhes pa snga ma bzhin bsnyen sgrub bzhir bsgoms la /
T02TD1660E:414a-28: bdag nyid rta mchog tu byang chub pas bskyed nas /
T02TD1660E:414a-29: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor skad cig bskyed de p'u dza la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD1660E:414a-30: dkyil 'khor kun du gnas zhes pa bsdus pa'i rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1660E:414a-31: de ltar dkyil 'khor thig btab cing bris nas rdzas btags te /
T02TD1660E:414a-33: bum pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas bcug ste /
T02TD1660E:414b-0: tshogs 'khor du zhugs pa bzhin du @414b bdag nyid zhugs nas /
T02TD1660E:414b-1: phyis 'byung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas ye shes sems dpa' bcug la sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:414b-2: dbang bskur te mchod pa rgyas pa byas pas slob dpon gyi las rdzogs nas da ni slob ma'i las bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:414b-3: dor bar bya ba'i rten gyi gang zag ni tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:414b-4: tshigs bcad gcig gis dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan to //
T02TD1660E:414b-5: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02TD1660E:414b-7: thub pa thams cad skal ngan pa /
T02TD1660E:414b-8: zhes pa tshigs bcad bzhi yis blang bya'i rten gyi gang zag drug bshad do //
T02TD1660E:414b-9: bde ba thams cad ces pa nas grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad gnyis kyis dngos grub len pa'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad do //
T02TD1660E:414b-10: dngos grub len pa'i slob ma'i mchog ni /
T02TD1660E:414b-11: kun gyi slob dpon zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:414b-12: kun gyi slob dpon la gnas pas //
T02TD1660E:414b-13: zhes pa dkyil 'khor drug gi gtso bor bsgoms pa'o //
T02TD1660E:414b-14: slob dpon 'khor lor 'jug par byed pa na //
T02TD1660E:414b-15: zhes pa slob ma drug go //
T02TD1660E:414b-16: de'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i slob ma la dkyil 'khor drug gi /'jig rten dang thun mong dang /
T02TD1660E:414b-17: mchog gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba yang dag pa mtha' yas mchog tu ci la dga' zhes slob ma la dri bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:414b-18: slob mas kyang 'dod ces smra bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:414b-19: mchog tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pas gsang ba bzhi'i mtshan ma yang dag par shes na dngos grub 'di su ji ltar 'dod pa la rab tu 'jug go //
T02TD1660E:414b-20: de ltar mchog tu gyur ba'i slob ma'i cho ga bshad nas las dang po pa'i cho ga bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:414b-21: gsang ba yang dag mi shes na //
T02TD1660E:414b-22: yon phul nas ni 'jug par bya //
T02TD1660E:414b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:414b-24: slob mas gsol ba btab nas /
T02TD1660E:414b-27: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1660E:414b-29: phyi rol bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ba'i rjes la slob dpon la yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:415a-0: de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas zhes pa nas rta mchog gi yon yin no zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcus yon dbul @415a * //
T02TD1660E:415a-1: ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan to //
T02TD1660E:415a-2: de ltar sgo nas zhugs nas lha'i dam tshig bsgrags pa dang /
T02TD1660E:415a-3: slob dpon gyi dam tshigs bsgrags pa dang /
T02TD1660E:415a-7: dkyil 'khor blta ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa bzhin byas la /
T02TD1660E:415a-8: bsnyen sgrub bzhis slob ma lhar bskyed nas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD1660E:415a-9: khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang //
T02TD1660E:415a-10: zhes pa gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i cod pan bzhi'o //
T02TD1660E:415a-11: srog ni ba so dang rus pa la sogs pa las byas pa'o //
T02TD1660E:415a-12: rtsa ba ni tsandan dang rgya shug la sogs pa las byas pa'o //
T02TD1660E:415a-13: thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1660E:415a-14: zhes pa rin po che'i dbu rgyan la thod pa'i phra bkod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:415a-15: sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag / ces pa spyi gtsug tu rnam sang byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:415a-16: kun du sna tshogs bla ma ni //
T02TD1660E:415a-17: zhes pa rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur na dkyil 'khor drug gi slob dpon du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:415a-18: kun gyi slob dpon ni dkyil 'khor drug gi'o //
T02TD1660E:415a-19: kun la zhes pa gtso mo bsgom pa la /
T02TD1660E:415a-20: rigs lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyal srid ces pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'o //
T02TD1660E:415a-21: yang na gang la me tog phog pa bde mchog ma la sogs pa 'khor gyi lhar bsgom pa'i tshe'o //
T02TD1660E:415a-22: rin po che yi ngo mtshar gcig las byas //
T02TD1660E:415a-23: zhes pa gser la sogs pa las byas pa thob pa spongs pa'i rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur la ;
T02TD1660E:415a-24: de'i steng du rdo rje rin po che padma sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1660E:415a-25: shar phyogs pa la sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD1660E:415a-26: lho phyogs pa la rin po che dang /
T02TD1660E:415a-27: nub phyogs pa la padma dang /
T02TD1660E:415a-28: byang phyogs pa la sna tshogs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar bya ba yin pas na /
T02TD1660E:415a-29: de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras //
T02TD1660E:415a-30: sangs rgyas padmo dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1660E:415a-31: slob ma thams cad dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1660E:415a-32: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ba bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:415a-33: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ba bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:415b-0: rin po che'i rdo rje phyed pas @415b mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-1: he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang ni khro bo'i rdo rje lnga'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-2: lte ba la sangs rgyas lnga bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-3: padma gar dbang gi ni padma 'dab ma gnyis kyi dbus su snang ba mtha' yas pa bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-4: rdo rje nyi ma'i ni rin po che chu'i'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-5: rta mchog gi ni sangs rgyas rin po che padma rdo rje nor bu'i phreng ba lngas slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-6: rdo rje dril bu'i dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD1660E:415b-7: brdungs pa'i byas pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:415b-9: mtshan ma thob nas dngos grub len pa'i dkyil 'khor drug gi lha rnams kyi phyag mtshan bzung nas sgrub pa dang gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la yang phyag rgya chen po 'di ltar bri bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:415b-10: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02TD1660E:415b-11: rang 'byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya //
T02TD1660E:415b-12: zhes pa dngos grub len pa'i slob ma dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha dang /
T02TD1660E:415b-13: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1660E:415b-14: rang 'byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya //
T02TD1660E:415b-15: rang 'byung rnams kyi lag na 'dug / sna tshogs skal ba bzang gis bcings //
T02TD1660E:415b-16: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02TD1660E:415b-17: zhes pas lta thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-18: de su'i phyag rgya yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:415b-19: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
T02TD1660E:415b-20: lha mo thams cad bde ba'i mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:415b-21: mda' dang gzhu ni bde mchog ma'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-22: skal bzangs de bzhin skal ba bzang ;
T02TD1660E:415b-24: rdo rje ngo mtshar ba de ba ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-25: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD1660E:415b-29: tshe dpag med kyi sku ni slob ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-30: mda' gzhu dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo bzhi ni sangs rgyas byang chub ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-31: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-32: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang tri sh'u la ni khams gsum rnam rgyal ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-33: dpag bsam shing ddang lcug ma ni 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i'o //
T02TD1660E:415b-36: mnyam pa'i lcags kyu 'phang mtho ba ni rta gdong ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-0: phag gi mche ba ni zhags @416a * //
T02TD1660E:416a-2: nyi zlas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog ni lcags sgrog ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-3: sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu dang thod pa'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi sku lnga bzhu ba'i bcud kyis len pa ni dril bu ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-5: pi wang ni lho nub po //
T02TD1660E:416a-6: mu kun da ni nub byang ngo //
T02TD1660E:416a-7: mu ra dza ni byang shar ro //
T02TD1660E:416a-8: me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi ni phyi'i mtshams bzhir ro //
T02TD1660E:416a-9: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog ni 'khor gtso bo byas nas /
T02TD1660E:416a-10: dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur pa la dgongs so //
T02TD1660E:416a-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gyi brtul zhugs bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:416a-12: rnam snang gi phyag mtshan gyi brtul zhugs ni /
T02TD1660E:416a-13: chos gos lhung bzed 'khar gsil glegs bam bzhi ni gtso bo'i phyag mtshan gyi brtul zhugs so //
T02TD1660E:416a-14: kun snying ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la phyogs bzhir dgod ces zer ro //
T02TD1660E:416a-16: cha lang ni dpa' bo ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-17: rdo rje ni kun bzang ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-18: mi bskyod pa'i gzugs brnyen [*brnyan?] ni skur ldan ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-19: me long dang rlung yab ni zhal bzangs ma'i 'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-20: rdo rje ser ba ni sgron sprin ma'i 'od zer ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-21: mig ni nam mkha'i spyan ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtul zhugs bshad nas he ru ka'i brtul zhugs ni g-yas na rdo rje 'bar ba /
T02TD1660E:416a-23: g-yon na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa ni he ru ka'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-24: dmar chen snying chen po yang thod pa'i nang du gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi'o zhes kun snying zer ro //
T02TD1660E:416a-26: 'dren pa'i lcags kyu ni tsoo r'i /
T02TD1660E:416a-30: rlung gis bskyod pa'i ras sar pa tsanda l'i /
T02TD1660E:416a-31: me'i snod 'bar ba bsnams pa ghasma r'i /
T02TD1660E:416a-32: he ru ka'i phyag mtshan dang 'dra ba ni dombi n'i ste /
T02TD1660E:416a-33: nges brjod las phyag mtshan mthun pas he ru kar snang ba ma zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:416a-34: padma gar dbang gi brtul zhugs bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:416a-35: padma kha dog sna tshogs pa ni bha ga can gyi'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-36: padma snying po ni rnam gzigs ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-37: chos 'byung gru gsum ni sgrol ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-39: gsal shing ni khro gnyer ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416a-40: rdo rje nyi ma'i brtul zhugs ni /
T02TD1660E:416b-0: mda' gzhu ral @416b gri 'bar ba me bzhi ni gtso bo'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416b-1: dbu rgyan ni dbang bskur ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416b-3: rgyal mtshan ni rtog ldan ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416b-4: me tog gi mchod pa ni mtshang chen ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416b-5: rta mchog gi brtul zhugs ni sna tshogs padma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:416b-6: rdo rje rgya gram gcig gnyis kyis rgyal srid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'thob par yum ral gri'i phyag mtshan yang rdo rje dang padma yin no //
T02TD1660E:416b-7: bzhi pa rtog pa bdun pa'i 'grel ba'o /
T02TD1660E:416b-9: // / de ltar rdul tshon gyi 'khor lo dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi cho ga bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:416b-10: da ni dkyil 'khor bzhi la mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:416b-11: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02TD1660E:416b-12: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:416b-13: las dang po ba'i rnal 'byor bas bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu bha ga w'an rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs drug gi rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad sprul par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:416b-14: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:416b-15: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag dang //
T02TD1660E:416b-16: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:416b-17: lag pa g-yas g-yon gyi mthe chung gnyis mthe bos mnan nas lus 'gying ba dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i mig gis blta zhing gar byas la bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud pa ni /
T02TD1660E:416b-21: rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs dang /
T02TD1660E:416b-22: las kyi rigs rnams la phyag bya ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:416b-23: de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i lha drag po ma h'a de ba dang /
T02TD1660E:416b-26: nyi zla dang gshin rje la sogs pa phyogs skyong rnams dang /
T02TD1660E:416b-27: tshangs pa la sogs pa la thal mo sbyar te phyag byas pas zhi ba /
T02TD1660E:416b-28: rgyas pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:416b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo ni /
T02TD1660E:416b-30: rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo sbyor //
T02TD1660E:416b-31: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:416b-32: rdo rje thal mo bcings la gar byas te /
T02TD1660E:416b-33: snying gar bzhag la dpal bsal gtug par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:416b-34: he ru ka'i phyag 'tshal ba'i rdo rje thal mo ni gar byas la /
T02TD1660E:417a-0: @417a * // smin ma g-yo ba zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417a-1: 'degs shing ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo h'um zhes dgod pa dang bcas pas phyag bya'o //
T02TD1660E:417a-2: padma gar dbang gi phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo ni /
T02TD1660E:417a-3: thal mo padma kha dbye 'bus bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417a-4: thal mo padma kha 'bus pa bzhin byas pa las mthe bo mthe chung bzhi bsnyams nas phyag bya'o //
T02TD1660E:417a-5: rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag 'tshal ba'i rdo rje thal mo ni /
T02TD1660E:417a-6: lus kyi yan lag thams cad ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417a-7: lus kyi yan lag thams cad sa la bsnyal nas phyag bya'o //
T02TD1660E:417a-8: rta mchog gi phyag bya ba'i thal mo ni /
T02TD1660E:417a-9: dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'i thal mo zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417a-10: 'dzum pa'i mig gis blta zhing gar byas la phyag bya'o //
T02TD1660E:417a-11: thams cad kyi thun mong gi phyag 'tshal ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD1660E:417a-16: de ltar phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:417a-17: gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pas gar byas nas mchod pa bya ba bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:417a-18: gar gyi nyams dgu ji snyed dang //
T02TD1660E:417a-19: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417a-20: sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung bas sku'i nyams /
T02TD1660E:417a-21: dgod pa gshe ba rngam pa gsung gi nyams /
T02TD1660E:417a-22: snying rje zhi ba ngo mtshar ba thugs kyi nyams so //
T02TD1660E:417a-23: de yang 'gying ba'i nyams dang bcas pas gar bskor nas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:417a-24: de ltar gtso bo'i gar bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:417a-26: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gis //
T02TD1660E:417a-27: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417a-28: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g-yas pa ba dan gsum par byas la gar bya ba ni bde mchog ma dang /
T02TD1660E:417a-31: slob ma mo rnams kyi nyams kyi tshul du gar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:417a-32: gling bu ma la sogs pa'i gar bya ba ni /
T02TD1660E:417a-33: snyems 'dzin chen mo bcangs pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417a-34: snyems pa dang bcas pas gar byas la thal mo 'gram pa gnyis dang spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02TD1660E:417a-35: de yang phab nas gling bu ma nas thal byed ma'i bar gyi lha mo bcu gnyis gar bya ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:417a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gar ni /
T02TD1660E:417b-0: g-yas dang g-yon gyi lag @417b pa yis //
T02TD1660E:417b-1: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bcings la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi gar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:417b-4: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gis //
T02TD1660E:417b-5: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417b-6: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis gar byas la rdo rje thal mo gyen du phye nas bkrol te /
T02TD1660E:417b-7: he ru ka'i lha thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya gar gyi tshul du byas pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:417b-8: padma gar dbang gi gar ni /
T02TD1660E:417b-9: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gis //
T02TD1660E:417b-10: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417b-11: padmo'i khu tshur gnyis kyis gar byas la padma'i thal mo bskor nas gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi p'u dza'i phyag rgyas gar gyis bya ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:417b-12: rdo rje nyi ma'i gar ni /
T02TD1660E:417b-13: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gis //
T02TD1660E:417b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:417b-15: rin po che'i khu tshur bcings nas gar bya ste /
T02TD1660E:417b-16: rin po che'i thal mo bskor la rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis gar gyi mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD1660E:417b-17: rta mchog ni las kyi khu tshur las byung ba'i gar byas la las kyi thal mo bskor bas gar gyi phyag rgyas bya ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:417b-18: dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i lha mo rnams kyi gar ni gyen du 'thor ba me tog ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:417b-19: thur du 'debs pa ni bdug pa ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:417b-22: lag pa gang yang rung ba ston pa na me tog la sogs ci 'byor pas lag pa bkang ste /
T02TD1660E:417b-23: rang gi lha'i dam tshig dang mnyam par gar gyi sgrub pas mchod pa byas na mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:417b-24: phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings na ni //
T02TD1660E:417b-25: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gis phyag rgya bcings pa'i bar gyi phan yon bstan to //
T02TD1660E:417b-26: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T02TD1660E:417b-28: de yis mi 'grub gang yang med //
T02TD1660E:417b-29: ces pa'i bar gyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas mchod pa byas na /
T02TD1660E:417b-30: des dngos grub gsum po mi 'grub pa gang yang med do //
T02TD1660E:417b-32: ji ltar chu la chu gzhag dang //
T02TD1660E:417b-33: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02TD1660E:418a-0: rang gis rang gi ye shes @418a * //
T02TD1660E:418a-2: / legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin //
T02TD1660E:418a-6: // / de ltar las dang po pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:418a-7: da ni mchog tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma thob pa ye shes cung zad tsam la dbang ba /
T02TD1660E:418a-8: 'jig rten gyi dngos grub 'gro ba rigs drug gi yon tan dang /
T02TD1660E:418a-9: thun mong gi dngos grub bsam gtan dang /
T02TD1660E:418a-10: gzugs med kyi yon tan brgyad dang /
T02TD1660E:418a-11: mchog gi dngos grub bcu gcig pa bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:418a-12: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02TD1660E:418a-13: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:418a-14: bsgrub pa'i yan lag thabs nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag gi ston pa po gang /
T02TD1660E:418a-16: 'khor ni su dang lhan cig / dus ni nam gyi tshe /
T02TD1660E:418a-17: dam pa'i chos ni ci zhig bshad ce na /
T02TD1660E:418a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:418a-19: bde ba che zhes pa'i bar gyis ston pa pos bstan to //
T02TD1660E:418a-20: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa zhes pas gnas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:418a-21: thams cad bdag nyid ces pas 'khor bstan to //
T02TD1660E:418a-22: rtag tu zhugs zhes pas dus bstan to //
T02TD1660E:418a-23: bde ba kun la chags pa dang //
T02TD1660E:418a-24: zhes pa la sogs pas chos bstan to //
T02TD1660E:418a-25: bde ba kun zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor lha'i skul zhen pa'o //
T02TD1660E:418a-26: dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir ni stong pa nyid kyis btab na bde ba chen po rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:418a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces gsungs te ;
T02TD1660E:418a-29: bde ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1660E:418a-30: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:418a-31: zla ba ltar dkar rtsa dmar sku //
T02TD1660E:418a-32: zhes pa nas dbu rgyan gyi dam pas mdzes zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i sku phyag rgya chen po cod pan dang bcas pa bstan to //
T02TD1660E:418a-33: gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa //
T02TD1660E:418a-34: zhes pa gzhan gyi nor ma yin pa ni thod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:418a-35: mi 'phrogs pa ni gzhan la nye bar mi mkho bas so //
T02TD1660E:418a-36: thod pa'i snod kyi nang gang gi lha'i chu dag pa dang bcas pa ste zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:418b-0: de grub pa po'i zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad gcig gis chu'i dbang @418b bskur ba'i rtags phyogs bzhir thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD1660E:418b-1: spyi gtsug tu sangs rgyas kyis gzhag pa ni /
T02TD1660E:418b-2: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten stong sum bcu gsum pa mi mjed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:418b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi //
T02TD1660E:418b-6: ces pa'i bar shlo ka gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa' lha mos bskor ba bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:418b-7: sangs rgyas dang rdo rje dang padma dang nyi ma khams gsum pa'i gdul bya rnams rgyas btab pas dbang byas pa dang /
T02TD1660E:418b-8: rmongs pas longs spyod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:418b-9: thim pas blangs nas slar gsol te /
T02TD1660E:418b-10: srog byin nas las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:418b-11: de ltar mdzad pa su zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:418b-12: phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni /
T02TD1660E:418b-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku lha mos bskor ba'i sprul skus gdul bya la rgyas btab nas /
T02TD1660E:418b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:418b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' rkang pa yis //
T02TD1660E:418b-17: phyag rgyas bcings nas dngos grub 'grub pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:418b-18: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1660E:418b-20: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis so //
T02TD1660E:418b-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bshad pa nas /
T02TD1660E:418b-22: yum bzhi'i phyag rgya chen po bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:418b-23: zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal //
T02TD1660E:418b-25: mi mjed la sogs brgyan pa bzhin //
T02TD1660E:418b-26: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:418b-27: de bye brag tu bde mchog ma'i phyag rgya bya ba ni sgeg pa'o //
T02TD1660E:418b-30: lhag par mdzad pa ni gar gyi nyams gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:418b-31: bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1660E:418b-32: yan lag thams cad phrog pa 'grub //
T02TD1660E:418b-34: sgrub pa po'i 'khrud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur te mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1660E:418b-35: rnam pa sna tshogs zhes pa nas //
T02TD1660E:418b-36: rol pa zhes bya'i phyag rgya bzhin //
T02TD1660E:418b-37: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bdag dang lingga 'khyud pa'i ngo mtshar bde ba mo'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:418b-38: se ral kha yi tshul dag tu //
T02TD1660E:418b-40: bde mchog grol pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:419a-1: bar gyis g-yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje g-yon pa kha tv'am ga bsnams pa /
T02TD1660E:419a-2: snang mdzad pa'i phyag rgyas so //
T02TD1660E:419a-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi kham phor 'grub ces pa nas phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis g-yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje dang g-yon pa kham phor bsnams pa slob ma mo'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419a-4: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / ces pa lha mo de rnams kyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1660E:419a-7: ngag gi phyag rgya la sogs pa mtha' yas kyang /
T02TD1660E:419a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid kyis ye shes phab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:419a-9: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo yin pas rtsa ba zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:419a-10: gtsug lag ji ltar rjes mthun srog / ces pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas byang chub kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:419a-11: rkang pa bteg cing phab pa dang //
T02TD1660E:419a-12: zhes pa la sogs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma'i phyag gya chen po gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:419a-13: bya ba dang ni zlog pa dang /
T02TD1660E:419a-14: zhes pa la sogs pas khams gsum rnam rgyal ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:419a-15: lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas //
T02TD1660E:419a-16: zhes pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:419a-17: myang ba rngub pa ltar byas pas //
T02TD1660E:419a-18: zhes pa la sogs pas rta mchog gi phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:419a-19: sna yi myang bas rngub pa yis //
T02TD1660E:419a-20: zhes pa la sogs pas phag gdong ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:419a-21: mig tshur zhen par lta ba yis ;
T02TD1660E:419a-22: / zhes pa la sogs pa lcags sgrog ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:419a-23: thams cad bdag nyid myang ba'o //
T02TD1660E:419a-24: zhes pa la sogs pas thal byed ma'i phyag rgya gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:419a-28: rdza rnga ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ni ming gis gsal bar bstan te /
T02TD1660E:419a-29: phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis //
T02TD1660E:419a-31: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
T02TD1660E:419a-32: ces pa'i bar gyis shloka gcig gis me tog mar me dri chab ma rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419a-33: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byas //
T02TD1660E:419a-34: zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD1660E:419b-0: @419b zhes pa'i bar gyis lha mo de rnams kyi phyag rgya'i phan yon bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-1: de ltar dngos grub len pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:419b-2: da ni lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gi thun mong gi glu bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:419b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:419b-5: bla na med pa'i dngos grub thob //
T02TD1660E:419b-6: ces pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi glu bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-7: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa shloka gcig gis phrin las 'grub pa'i phan yon bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-8: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen zhes pa nas gzung du gsol zhes pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi blu bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:419b-11: thun mong gi sgrub pa'i phan yon gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:419b-12: de ltar na rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya dang glu bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:419b-13: da ni rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:419b-14: rnal 'byor de nyid bha ga w'an //
T02TD1660E:419b-16: dpal dam tshig shes pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis chos gos lhung bzed gseg shang bsnams pa'i phyag rgya chen po bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-17: de yi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1660E:419b-18: g-yas pa'i yan lag 'dus pa yis //
T02TD1660E:419b-19: zhes pa la sogs pas rnam snang gi sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-20: rnam snang gi phyag rgya bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:419b-21: sangs rgyas dbyangs ma'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02TD1660E:419b-22: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su //
T02TD1660E:419b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-24: dpa' bo ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:419b-25: de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka / zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-26: kun du bzang mo'i phyag rgya ni padma bud med ces pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-27: zad med pa yi phyag rgyas ni //
T02TD1660E:419b-28: rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang //
T02TD1660E:419b-29: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-30: skur ldan ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:419b-31: sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su //
T02TD1660E:419b-32: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-33: mdzes pa'i phyag rgya ni padma'i bud med kyi phyag rgya bcings nas zhes pa la sogs pa bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-34: sprin chen ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:419b-35: rta mchog dpal gyi khu tshur yang //
T02TD1660E:419b-36: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:419b-37: nam mkha' spyan ma'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:420a-2: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:420a-3: de nas thun mong du mtshan brgyad gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:420a-4: dang po sangs rgyas kun bla ma //
T02TD1660E:420a-5: zhes pa la sogs pa'i shloka gnyis kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:420a-6: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02TD1660E:420a-7: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu glu gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:420a-8: phyag rgya zhes pa 'di dag gi / zhes pa la sogs pas tshigs bcad gnyis kyis glu blang ba'i thabs 'bras bu dang bcas pas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:420a-9: de las rdza ni drug ldan no //
T02TD1660E:420a-10: de ba ta zhes pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha mo til mchog dang rim pa'i glu'o //
T02TD1660E:420a-11: sems can khams mang zhes pa nas di ring 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi lha mo thams cad kyi thun mong gi glu gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:420a-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i glu dang /
T02TD1660E:420a-13: rnam snang gi lha mo'i glus ni bdag mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa la lha'i sku bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:420a-15: zhugs par mdzod ces pa'i don yin no //
T02TD1660E:420a-16: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
T02TD1660E:420a-17: zhes pa nas gdon mi za zhes pa'i bar gyis sgrub pa'i phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:420a-18: de las bud med bzhi rnams zhes pa ni gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1660E:420a-19: me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1660E:420a-20: rta gdong ma la sogs pa bzhi'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis mchod cing /
T02TD1660E:420a-21: dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1660E:420a-22: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:420a-23: da ni he ru ka'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po bstan pa ni rnal 'byor de nyid bha ga w'an //
T02TD1660E:420a-25: rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug gi / zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:420a-27: dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyas gnas //
T02TD1660E:420a-28: zhes pa rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:420a-29: gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis chu'i dbang bskur ba bstan to //
T02TD1660E:420a-30: gos chen po ni mi lpags so //
T02TD1660E:420a-31: dbang bskur chen po ni thod pa'i cod pan lnga'o //
T02TD1660E:420a-32: sha chen dang sbrang rtsi chen po ni /
T02TD1660E:420a-33: phyag g-yon na bsnams pa'i sbrang rtsi ste /
T02TD1660E:420a-34: sha chen po dang khrag gis gang ba'o //
T02TD1660E:420a-35: ci'i phyir bha ga w'an de lta bu bsnams she na /
T02TD1660E:420b-0: dur khrod @420b brgyad kyi 'byung bo rnams gdul ba'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:420b-1: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD1660E:420b-2: thod pa'i phreng ba dang mi bskyod pas gtsug gi nor bu byas pa'o //
T02TD1660E:420b-3: kha tv'am bcas zhes pas phyag mtshan bstan to //
T02TD1660E:420b-4: phyag mtshan des ci zhig byed snyam nas /
T02TD1660E:420b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul bya dang //
T02TD1660E:420b-6: rdo rje padma nor bu sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdul bya rnams dbang du bya ba gsum gyis rgyas btab pa dang /
T02TD1660E:420b-7: btsun mo la longs spyod pas rmongs par byas pa dang /
T02TD1660E:420b-8: tshogs 'khor la longs spyod pas zab pa dang /
T02TD1660E:420b-9: srog thim pas thal bar gyur ba'o //
T02TD1660E:420b-10: de ltar zhal bzhi phyag brgyad bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:420b-11: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1660E:420b-12: se ra la kha'i tshul dag ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:420b-13: lag pa g-yon par thod pa thogs nas /
T02TD1660E:420b-14: mchan khung g-yon par kha tv'am ga se ral khar bsnams pa /
T02TD1660E:420b-15: g-yas par ba dan gsum pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ba'o //
T02TD1660E:420b-16: bud med la sogs rin chen mchog / ces pa btsun mo rin po che la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun sprul nas longs spyod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:420b-17: dbang po drag po nye dbang bsad //
T02TD1660E:420b-19: phyogs skyong thams cad bsad nas za bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1660E:420b-20: dbang po gcig phu dang zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa gnyis ka'i thun mong gi gar gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:420b-21: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1660E:420b-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:420b-23: lag pa gnyis kyis gar byed cing sems dpa'i phyed krung dang langs pas drag po la sogs pa'i bdud thams cad dbang du byas shing longs spyad nas gsol bar mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:420b-24: de nyid kyi sbyor ba yis zhes pa la sogs pa skyil krung phyed pa'i gar bshig nas g-yas brkyang byas te /
T02TD1660E:420b-25: bskal pa bzang po'i lha mo rnams kyi bud med kun la longs spyod pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:420b-26: rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo sa la btsugs nas g-yon pa brla'i steng du bzhag nas rab tu brkyang ba ste /
T02TD1660E:420b-27: bskyod pa dang btang ba ni byang chub sems bzlog pa ste /
T02TD1660E:420b-29: lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis lha dang mi rnams la longs spyod pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:421a-1: he ru ka'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po bstan to //
T02TD1660E:421a-2: de'i 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:421a-3: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02TD1660E:421a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:421a-5: dpal ldan he ru ka dbab pa /
T02TD1660E:421a-7: tshogs 'khor ram gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes phab nas /
T02TD1660E:421a-8: gdul bya ji ltar mos pa'i sgyu ma sna tshogs gnas pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:421a-12: rmongs pa ni phra mo h'a'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-13: dga' ba ni be t'a l'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-14: gar byed sgyur ba ni pukka s'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-16: shi ba bshad pa ni ghasma r'i'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-17: bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas pa ni do bi n'i'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-18: gzhan yang zhi ba'i mig dang ldan pa ni goo r'i'i 'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-19: drag po'i mig dang ldan pa ni coo r'i'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-20: rmongs pa'i mig dang ldan pa ni be t'a l'i'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-21: gyen du lta ba ni pukka s'i'i 'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-22: chags pa'i lta ba ni pra mo h'a'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-23: gar byed pas lta ba ni tsanda l'i'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-24: khro bo'i lta ba ni ghasma r'i'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-25: byams pa'i lta ba ni dngos grub mchog ster tom bi n'i'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-34: grub pas 'khyud pa ni dom bi n'i'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-35: de rnams kyi sems kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:421a-36: rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1660E:421a-37: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:421a-38: rtse gcig pas bde ba rgyas 'debs pa ni goo r'i ste dang po'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-39: lag pa gnyis mngon par bstod nas se gol brdabs shing dbugs gyen du 'byin pas g-yon du lta zhing lag pa snying 'dren pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-40: 'o byed pas 'khyud cing gar byed pas rmongs pa ni gsum pa'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-41: bsgrub bya za ba'i bsam pas lus 'degs pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-42: tshangs pa'i mgo bo'i nang du bdud rtsi rnams 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i gar byed pa ni lnga'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-43: de bzhin sa las 'dren pas snying phug nas rang gi phyag rgya tshul du ston pa ni bdun pa gsod byed ma'o //
T02TD1660E:421a-44: klu'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub par bya ba'i zhal du gsol ba ni za ba mo'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421b-0: rab tu 'jigs pa'i mes @421b bsreg pa ni he ru ka dang dom bi n'i'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:421b-1: de nas phyag rgya'i lan gyis dngos grub sgrub pa'i lan bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:421b-2: de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyis //
T02TD1660E:421b-3: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:421b-4: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dus su slob dpon gyis goo r'i'i phyag rgya byed pa'i tshe slob mas dom bi n'i'i phyag rgya'o ;
T02TD1660E:421b-5: / slob dpon gyis tsoo r'i slob mas ghasma r'i /
T02TD1660E:421b-6: slob dpon gyis phra mo h'a /
T02TD1660E:421b-8: slob dpon gyis be t'a l'i /
T02TD1660E:421b-9: slob mas pukka s'i'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:421b-10: de ltar gar dang gar gyi lan phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid nyon mongs 'joms pa'i bdag nyid phyag rgya'i khyad par bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:421b-11: dpal ldan rdo rje padmo slong //
T02TD1660E:421b-13: dang po lag pa gnyis padmo kha bye ba lta bu'i phyag rgya byas pas rgyas btab pa dang /
T02TD1660E:421b-16: thal bar bsgrub pa dang 'tsho bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1660E:421b-17: las lnga phyag rgya'i lan brgyad kyis sgrub par byed pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:421b-18: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:421b-19: he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:421b-20: de nas phyag rgya shes pa'i zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:421b-21: khyad par du ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1660E:421b-22: zhes pa'i bar gyis dam bca' ba bstan to //
T02TD1660E:421b-23: gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:421b-24: gsal bar mdzod ces pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'i dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:421b-25: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
T02TD1660E:421b-26: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis phan yon bstan to //
T02TD1660E:421b-27: he ru ka'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:421b-28: da ni padma gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:421b-29: rnal 'byor de nyid bha ga w'an //
T02TD1660E:421b-30: zhes pa nas phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis padma gar dbang gi phyag rgya chen po gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:421b-31: g-yas pa g-yon pa sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1660E:421b-32: zhes pa rkang pa'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:421b-33: 'khor gyi lha mo'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:421b-34: snyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02TD1660E:421b-35: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:421b-36: g-yon pa snyems pas padma bzung nas g-yas pas kha 'byed pa rnam par gzigs ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421b-37: g-yon pa snyems pas padma rnon po bzung nas g-yas pa snying gar 'dren pa sgrol ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:421b-38: g-yon snyems pas padma bzung nas g-yas pas sa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni sa 'dzin ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:422a-1: pa snyems pas padma'i thang ka bzung nas g-yas pa ba dan gsum pa gar byed pa khro gnyer ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:422a-2: g-yon pa snyems pas padma ser po ci bder bzung bas g-yas pa chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas 'dzin pa gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:422a-3: g-yon pa padma dmar po bzung nas g-yas pas snying gar 'dren pa sna tshogs padma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:422a-4: sna tshogs padma'am padma dmar skya 'dzin pa padma nas za ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:422a-5: padma dkar sngo g-yon pas bzung nas g-yas pas snying gar 'byed pa rdo rje dbang phyug ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:422a-6: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:422a-7: sku'i phyag rgya chen po bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:422a-8: rnam dag gzigs ma zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:422a-9: lha mo chen mo rnams so zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:422a-10: phyag rgya bshad nas dngos grub len pa'i glu bshad par dam bca' ba ni /
T02TD1660E:422a-11: de nas phyag rgya zhes pa shloka gcig gis gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:422a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis so //
T02TD1660E:422a-14: gar mdzod cig ces pa'i bar gyis padma gar dbang gi dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:422a-15: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yin //
T02TD1660E:422a-16: zhes pa shloka gcig gis phan yon yin no //
T02TD1660E:422a-17: de ltar padma gar dbang gi phyag rgya dang glu bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:422a-18: da ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dngos grub len pa'i phyag rgya chen po gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:422a-19: mnyam sbyor de nyid bha ga w'an //
T02TD1660E:422a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:422a-21: shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la //
T02TD1660E:422a-22: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1660E:422a-24: rdo rje nyi ma cung zhig khro bo'i nyams dang bcas pa /
T02TD1660E:422a-27: khro bo'i tshul dang gzi brjid chen po ston pa lha'i nyi ma'i gzugs can no //
T02TD1660E:422a-29: rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings nas //
T02TD1660E:422a-30: zhes pa shloka gcig gis rkang pa'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:422a-31: gtso bo bstan nas 'khor gyi ni dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1660E:422a-32: gter dag dang zhes pa la sogs te /
T02TD1660E:422a-37: mchod tshe zhes bya bas mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa gcig dang /
T02TD1660E:422a-38: gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1660E:422b-0: me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi @422b dang ;
T02TD1660E:422b-1: bcu gnyis mchod pa che zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:422b-2: ji lta'i tshul du ston pa dag / ces bya bas rta gdong ma la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:422b-3: phyag rgya bshad nas glu bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:422b-4: de nas phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs pa la la shloka gcig ni dam bca' pa'o //
T02TD1660E:422b-5: khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid ces pa nas thams cad 'gro zhes pa'i bar gyis dngos grub len pa'i glu gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:422b-6: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
T02TD1660E:422b-7: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:422b-8: rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:422b-9: rta mchog gi phyag rgya gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:422b-11: rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis sku phyag rgya chen po bstan to //
T02TD1660E:422b-12: de yi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1660E:422b-13: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1660E:422b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:422b-15: rkang pa bzhis brkyang bskum gnyis su gnas pa ni /
T02TD1660E:422b-17: de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni sla ba la dgongs nas ma gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:422b-18: de ltar phyag rgya bshad nas dngos grub kyi glu gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:422b-19: de nas phyag rgya ni zhes pa 'di shloka gcig gis dam bca' ba gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:422b-20: myos byed stong pa zhes pa tshig rkang gcig gis dbang gi sku bstan to //
T02TD1660E:422b-21: stod ni gshin rje stong pas zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig gis mngon spyod kyi sku bstan to //
T02TD1660E:422b-22: tshangs pa stong las zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig gis zhi ba'i sku bstan to //
T02TD1660E:422b-23: dkyil 'khor zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig gis rgyas pa'i sku bstan to //
T02TD1660E:422b-24: de bstan nas ci mdzad ce na /
T02TD1660E:422b-25: phrin las bzhi mdzad pa yin te /
T02TD1660E:422b-26: thams cad rnam par dag par mos pa'i gdul bya bzhi la /
T02TD1660E:422b-27: ngo mthon stobs kyis mnan nas yi ge hi bzhis mngon sum gyi lam bstan to //
T02TD1660E:422b-28: de yang su yin zhe na dbang phyug thams cad shig zhig pas lha bzhi pa brgyal du bcug pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:422b-29: de yang hu lu hu lu'i sgras dbang phyug chen po mnan nas gsum grub ma phrogs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:422b-30: ma ta ma ta'i sgras mthu bo che /
T02TD1660E:422b-31: mnan nas dpal mo phrogs so //
T02TD1660E:422b-32: sma na ta'i sgras tshangs pa mnan nas dbang mo phrogs pa dang 'dod lha mnan nas dga' ba mo phrogs so //
T02TD1660E:423a-0: @423a * // rta mchog gi phrin las bzhi bstan pa nas /
T02TD1660E:423a-1: lha mo bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor bas aa la la ho zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:423a-2: ma 'ongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyang khro zhing gtum pa'i stobs kyis bdag po rnams mnan nas lha mo rnams dang sbyor ba'i tshe aa la la ho zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:423a-3: rjes 'jug rnal 'byor bas bdag po bzhi brgyal du bzhugs pa'i sngags ni aom sam bha ni zhes pa nas h'um phat ces pa'i bar gyis gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:423a-4: de ltar mngon spyod kyis sgrol ba dang /
T02TD1660E:423a-5: 'dod chags kyi sgyor bas ji ltar sangs rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1660E:423a-6: mdza' bo mi la bya'am mi bya ba //
T02TD1660E:423a-7: de dag yongs su rtog pa med kyang sla //
T02TD1660E:423a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:423a-9: rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral bas gzung 'dzin med pa'i ye shes skyes pa na /
T02TD1660E:423a-10: sgyu ma lta bur nges pas mdza' ba dang /
T02TD1660E:423a-11: mi mdza' ba su zhig kyang med do //
T02TD1660E:423a-12: de zhin du rgol ba rnams sgyu ma lta bur shes nas dgra bo bya ba su yang med do //
T02TD1660E:423a-13: glu 'di blangs pa'i zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis phan yon bstan to //
T02TD1660E:423a-14: de ltar phyag rgya chen po bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:423a-15: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:423a-16: 'dzum mo mthe bo mnan nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:423a-17: rdo rje thal mo sbyar la /
T02TD1660E:423a-18: mdzub mo dang mthe bo'i tshigs kyi rtse mo mnan la gung mo'i rtse mo ni dpal grub pa'i spyan zhes bya ste /
T02TD1660E:423a-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:423a-20: rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:423a-21: rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la //
T02TD1660E:423a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:423a-23: rdo rje thal mo gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste /
T02TD1660E:423a-24: mthe bo'i rtse mor sbyar la thal mo'i mthe bong ste du bya'o //
T02TD1660E:423a-25: he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:423a-26: rdo rje thal mo gyen du phye nas /
T02TD1660E:423a-27: mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo bkug la mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan te /
T02TD1660E:423a-29: dpal mo zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin ma phrogs nas 'ongs te /
T02TD1660E:423a-30: dga' ba bzhi bskyed pas bya'o //
T02TD1660E:423a-31: padma gar dbang gi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:423b-0: rdo rje thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas gung mo brkyang la mthe bo mthe chung gnyis padma bzhi ba'i tshul du @423b ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:423b-1: rdo rje thal mo mnyam par sbyar la /
T02TD1660E:423b-3: mthe bos bkab pa ni dpal gyi nor bu zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:423b-4: rta mchog gi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:423b-5: rdo rje thal mo sbyar la /
T02TD1660E:423b-6: mthe chung dang srin lag gzhi bas nas brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo bkug pa ni phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:423b-7: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:423b-8: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bsgom pa ni /
T02TD1660E:423b-9: lus ngag sems ni rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:423b-10: rnal 'byor ba'i lus ngag sems rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhar bsgoms la /
T02TD1660E:423b-11: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bzung nas bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i tshul gyis thams cad gsung gi lha'i sbyor bas bskyed la bdag nyid lhar bsgoms par bya ste /
T02TD1660E:423b-12: dkyil 'khor drug gi lha so so rang rang gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:423b-13: ci'i phyir dam tshig ces bya zhe na /
T02TD1660E:423b-14: sku gsung thugs la stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas /
T02TD1660E:423b-15: sgyu ma dang stong pa nyid kyi chos kyi dbyings las mi 'da' bas dam tshig chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:423b-16: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig chen po bshad pa ni //
T02TD1660E:423b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:423b-18: lha'i gzugs dang cha byad dang ldan par bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:423b-19: bde ba gnyid kyis kun gyi bdag / ces pa lhan cig skyed dga'i bde ba gnyid kyis 'dod yon kun gyi bde ba'i bdag nyid du 'dod yon lnga la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:423b-20: de ji ltar dam tshig chen po yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:423b-21: chags pa med cing ma chags med //
T02TD1660E:423b-22: dbu ma yang ni dmigs su med //
T02TD1660E:423b-23: ces pa yul dang yul can gyi stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:423b-24: yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min //
T02TD1660E:423b-25: dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med //
T02TD1660E:423b-26: ces pa sems kyi stong pa nyid bsgoms pa dbang bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur bas ;
T02TD1660E:423b-27: rnam snang gi sku 'od gsal lta bu bsgoms pas /
T02TD1660E:423b-28: rnam snang gi sbyor ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:423b-29: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD1660E:423b-30: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD1660E:423b-31: ces pa la sogs pas 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1660E:424a-0: he ru ka'i gzugs su bsgoms nas sngags @424a * //
T02TD1660E:424a-1: skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes bud med rin po che la sogs pa la longs spyod pa 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:424a-2: he ru ka yi sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:424a-4: zhes pa la sogs pas 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin gyi padma gar dbang gi sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:424a-5: shin tu gdu ga cing drag po la //
T02TD1660E:424a-6: zhes pa la sogs pas 'do gsal gyi snang ba ste rdo rje glu ma'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:424a-7: thams cad dag par mos pa yi //
T02TD1660E:424a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin rdo rje nyi ma dang rta mchog gi gzugs su bsgom pa ste /
T02TD1660E:424a-9: rta mchog gi sbyor ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
T02TD1660E:424a-10: de ltar dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu brgya da las phyag rgya chen po dam tshig rdul tshon bsgom pa'i dam tshig chen po'o //
T02TD1660E:424a-11: tshogs 'khor gyi lha bsgom pa'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes gsungs pa yin no /
T02TD1660E:424a-13: // / da ni thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:424a-14: sbyor ba ji snyed yod pa kun //
T02TD1660E:424a-15: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:424a-16: dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsnyen sgrub bzhis ji ltar ba bzhin bsgoms nas phrin las bzhi'i dbye ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor drug gi / zhi ba dkar /
T02TD1660E:424a-19: mngon spyod nag po'i gdong rgyan dang bcas pa bgos gar mkhan gyi stong pa bzhin du /
T02TD1660E:424a-20: lha rnams bsgom pa'i tshe cha byad spong zhing sgom pa na /
T02TD1660E:424a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:424a-22: bya ba dang ni zlog pa dang /
