T02TD1660E:424a-23: zhes pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor drug gi shin tu sbyor ba'i phrin las kyi dngos grub pa stan te /
T02TD1660E:424a-24: bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa dang zlog pa tshar chod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:424a-25: khyad par du 'phrog pa ni dbang phyug la sogs mnan nas lha mo rnams 'phrog pa'o //
T02TD1660E:424a-26: yan lag kun du byed pa yis //
T02TD1660E:424a-27: zhes pa lus ngag yid gsum dbang du byed pa'i yan lag gi nor yang 'phrog pa'o //
T02TD1660E:424a-28: longs spyod pa ni 'o byed pa dang 'khyud pa la sogs pas khams gsum pa la rgyas 'debs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:424b-0: @424b thim pa ni ye shes thim pas thar pa dang /
T02TD1660E:424b-1: srog thim pas gsod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:424b-2: shi ba las de ma thag slong bar byed pa'o /
T02TD1660E:424b-3: de ltar dkyil 'khor drug gi phyag rgya bshad pa'o //
T02TD1660E:424b-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mdzes pa dang /
T02TD1660E:424b-6: bud med kun gyi sgyu mche //
T02TD1660E:424b-8: bde mchog ma la sogs pa lha mo nyi shu'i sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:424b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:424b-10: sangs thas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:424b-11: rab tu dga' bas lta zhing 'dzum //
T02TD1660E:424b-13: he ru ka'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya ni dgu / sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
T02TD1660E:424b-15: padma gar dbang gi bzhin gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:424b-16: sgeg pa'i lta bas gar byed cing //
T02TD1660E:424b-17: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:424b-19: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i kha //
T02TD1660E:424b-20: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:424b-22: 'dod chags mos pas g-yem spyo ba //
T02TD1660E:424b-23: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:424b-24: bzhin gyi phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:424b-26: lha mo kun gyi bde ba mchog / ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:424b-27: bde mchog ma'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:424b-28: 'dod chags bde bas g-yem spyo ba //
T02TD1660E:424b-31: sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog / ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:424b-33: sha chen ro ni myong ba yis //
T02TD1660E:424b-36: bde ba kun gyi ro myong zhing //
T02TD1660E:424b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga'i ni /
T02TD1660E:424b-40: khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed //
T02TD1660E:424b-41: ces pa la sogs pa shloka phyed dang gnyis kyis thun mong du gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:424b-42: lta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni /
T02TD1660E:424b-43: bde ba stong pas rab 'byor ba //
T02TD1660E:424b-44: zhes pa nas 'tsho ba byed ces pa'i bar gyis rdo rje sems dpa' lta ba bstan to //
T02TD1660E:424b-45: bud med mkhas pa zhes shloka gcig bde mchog ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:424b-46: sangs rgyas gsang ba mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:425a-1: sogs pa shloka gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02TD1660E:425a-2: smin mtshams khro gnyer zhes pa shloka gcig gis he ru ka'i lta ba bshad do //
T02TD1660E:425a-3: khro zhing 'gyur zhes pa shloka gcig gis rdo rje nyi ma dang rta mchog thun mong gi lta ba bshad do //
T02TD1660E:425a-4: brdeg pa la sogs pa zhes pa lta bu shloka gcig gis padma gar dbang gi bstan to //
T02TD1660E:425a-5: de ltar na thams cad sbyor ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1660E:425a-6: bzhin gyi 'dzum pa'i lta ba'i phyag rgya ste rnam pa brgyad do //
T02TD1660E:425a-8: ma sku thams cad bu dre bya //
T02TD1660E:425a-9: zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:425a-10: ru ru sphu ru zhes pa la sogs pa rnam snang gi'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-11: su ba ga ste zhes pa la sogs pa dpal chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-12: aom t'a re zhes pa la sogs pa sgrol ma'i sngags padma gar dbang gi'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-13: tram ba ba ta zhes pa la sogs pa m'a ma k'i'i sngags ni rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-14: shr'i badzra padma bha ba ta mu kha zhes pa la sogs pa rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-15: dkyil 'khor drug gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
T02TD1660E:425a-16: glu'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni /
T02TD1660E:425a-17: skad kyi gsang ni mthon dman du //
T02TD1660E:425a-18: zhes pa la sogs h'um h'um zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgras yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad du 'don pa'i ka ka la zhes pa dbyangs snyan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:425a-19: sha rdza ba zhes pa la sogs pa rdza rnga la sogs pa brdung zhes blang ngo //
T02TD1660E:425a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-21: aom gyi glu yi phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1660E:425a-23: tshangs pa'i dbyangs aom yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis su 'don //
T02TD1660E:425a-24: glu blangs shing rnga rings la sogs pa brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-26: rdo rje dra mo gad mo che //
T02TD1660E:425a-27: zhes pa la sogs pa ru lu ru lu'i sgra hi dang /
T02TD1660E:425a-28: h'um gcig dang bcas pas glu len cing rnga bo che brdung ba he ru ka'i'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-29: te na te zhes pa la sogs pa glu'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1660E:425a-30: rnga rda ba can brdung pa padma gar dbang gi'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-31: hi zhes bya ba yi ge bcu drug gi tshad du 'don to //
T02TD1660E:425a-32: rnga zlum brdung ba'i glu'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje nyi ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:425a-33: ham zhes pa rta mchog gi bslang ngo //
T02TD1660E:425a-34: ka ka zhes pas 'gre 'gyur sum brtsegs yod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:425b-0: ka @425b gnyis zhes pa 'gre 'gyur mi mthun pa yod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:425b-1: rab la zhes pa zangs dung bzhin rgya glu len pa'o //
T02TD1660E:425b-2: dkyil 'khor drug gi glu'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni /
T02TD1660E:425b-3: sil snyan gyi phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:425b-4: gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig ni //
T02TD1660E:425b-5: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:425b-6: gling bu ni bu ga bcu'am khams lnga dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1660E:425b-8: rgyud mangs ni dgu po rgyud mngas so //
T02TD1660E:425b-9: rgyud stug po ni rgyud nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o //
T02TD1660E:425b-10: sil snyan ni pi wang rdza rnga ste /
T02TD1660E:425b-11: dkyil 'khor drug gi lha'i cha byad bzung nas lha'i zlos gar bzhin du sil snyan brdung zhing glu blangs na dngos grub zla ba bzhis 'grub pa'am zla ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:425b-12: snying po ni rigs bzhi'i gtso bo'i rdzogs so //
T02TD1660E:425b-13: phyag rgya ni lha mo rnams kyi sngags so //
T02TD1660E:425b-14: sngags ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1660E:425b-15: rig pa ni mchod pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1660E:425b-16: bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs ni /
T02TD1660E:425b-19: mig gi blta ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1660E:425b-20: rnam par sel la sogs pa'i thabs ni /
T02TD1660E:425b-23: 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i thabs so //
T02TD1660E:425b-24: de ltar thun mong gi sil snyan gyi phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:425b-26: dza: h'um bam ho: rut ces pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD1660E:425b-27: rgyun gyi nga'o zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnga brdung ba'i glu'i'o //
T02TD1660E:425b-28: aam aam zhes pa nas dam tshig gsum gyi rnga'o zhes ba'i bar gyis rnam snang gi glu'o //
T02TD1660E:425b-29: de 'ong zhes pa nas he ru ka'i rnga'i phyag rgya'i zhes pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'i'o //
T02TD1660E:425b-30: padma padma tri zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:425b-31: thal mo brdeb pa'i rnga'o zhes pa'i bar gyis padma gar dbang gi'o //
T02TD1660E:425b-32: tram tram zhes pa nas rgyal po'i rnga'o zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02TD1660E:425b-33: ta ki h'um zhes pa nas myur ba'i rnga'o zhes pa'i bar gyis rta mchog gi zhi ba'i 'gros dang /
T02TD1660E:425b-35: dbang dang mngon spyod kyi 'gros bstan to //
T02TD1660E:425b-36: sil snyan gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni thun mong du gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:426a-0: kun snying ltar yi ge re me dang lha re re sbyor @426a * //
T02TD1660E:426a-2: rgyud yod pa yod ma yin la /
T02TD1660E:426a-3: ming mtshan gyi dang po dang tha ma bzung ba lta bu phan tshun mi 'gal ba'i lung gi 'thad pa yang med do //
T02TD1660E:426a-4: aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas glu 'di rnams kyis sil snyan brdungs la /
T02TD1660E:426a-5: sgra yi rdo rje nyams las gnas med dang //
T02TD1660E:426a-6: lhag mthong sgra yi de nyid shes pa yin //
T02TD1660E:426a-7: sil snyan sgra dang gzugs rnams la //
T02TD1660E:426a-8: gang gis stong nyid de shes pas //
T02TD1660E:426a-9: de yi mdzad pa 'dus pa yis //
T02TD1660E:426a-10: bde ba'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1660E:426a-12: de ltar sil snyan gyi phyag rgya ye shes bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:426a-13: ye shes bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:426a-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor bas //
T02TD1660E:426a-16: thal mo dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1660E:426a-17: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426a-18: bsdu ba byas pa'i rjes la glu dang sil snyan gar byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir nyams dgu byas te /
T02TD1660E:426a-19: dkyil 'khor re re la yang gar gyi nyams dgus mchod par bya ste zhes bstan pa yin te /
T02TD1660E:426a-20: sgeg pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1660E:426a-21: dpa' ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:426a-23: dgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02TD1660E:426a-24: khro ba rdo rje'i nyi ma'o //
T02TD1660E:426a-26: mi sdug pa ni mi gtsang ba'i rdzas bsgoms pa ste sh'akya thub po //
T02TD1660E:426a-27: ngo mtshar gyi dkyil 'khor bzhi'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02TD1660E:426a-28: zhi ba ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste /
T02TD1660E:426a-30: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa zhes pa 'khor lo drug gi lta'i gar byas pas 'khor lo bzhi'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:426a-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgeg ces pa la sogs pa rgyas par bshad pa ste /
T02TD1660E:426a-32: aom rdo rje sems dpa' sgeg pa la //
T02TD1660E:426a-33: dpa' la dpa' bo'i de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1660E:426a-35: mchog tu gyur pa'ang rab tu stsol //
T02TD1660E:426a-36: sv'a h'a zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje glu blangs pa bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:426a-37: de'i phan yon gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:426a-38: thams cad bdag nyid ces pa nas /
T02TD1660E:426a-39: dam pa ster bar 'gyur zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-0: bde mchog ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis phyag rgya'i @426b sbyor ba 'di dag gis zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:426b-1: mchod pa rab tu sbyar zhes pa'i bar gyis gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:426b-2: rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:426b-3: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02TD1660E:426b-6: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-7: de nas lan du slar yang ni //
T02TD1660E:426b-10: de nas lan yang tshul bzhin du //
T02TD1660E:426b-11: padma gar byung mchog tu sgyur //
T02TD1660E:426b-12: zhes pas padma gar dbang gi'o //
T02TD1660E:426b-13: de nas slar yang lan du ni //
T02TD1660E:426b-14: rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu sgyur //
T02TD1660E:426b-15: zhes pas rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02TD1660E:426b-16: de nas slar yang sgyur bas zhes pa rta mchog gi'i'o //
T02TD1660E:426b-18: bdag nyid byung bar rab tu 'grub //
T02TD1660E:426b-19: ces pas thun mong gi dngos grub bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-20: de ltar sil snyan med kyang gar gyi nyams dgu mchod par bsnan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:426b-21: de nas phyag rgya zhes pa yis //
T02TD1660E:426b-22: sdom pa thams cad rab ston pa //
T02TD1660E:426b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu //
T02TD1660E:426b-24: khyad par du ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1660E:426b-25: zhes pa dang bcas pas bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-27: la lar dri med ces bya bas rdo rje sems dpa' dang rnam snang gi glu bshad do //
T02TD1660E:426b-28: la lar rab tu 'jigs zhes pas he ru ka'i glu bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-29: la lar mdangs bzangs zhes pas padma gar dbang gi bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-30: la lar 'gro ba thams cad ches pas rdo rje nyi ma bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1660E:426b-32: zhes pas rta mchog gi bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-33: rnam pa mang po 'dul bar mdzod //
T02TD1660E:426b-34: ces pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor drug gi 'khor bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-35: 'di dag glu ni blangs pa yis //
T02TD1660E:426b-36: zhes pa la sogs pas phan yon bstan to //
T02TD1660E:426b-37: de ltar rab tu gar byas te //
T02TD1660E:426b-39: gar ma shes na pham pa dang ltung bar 'gyur ba yin pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i zas dang /
T02TD1660E:426b-40: g-yog dang bcas ba dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:426b-41: mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis //
T02TD1660E:426b-42: zhes pa sngar bshad pa'i rigs bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbang po dang rnal 'byor ma bkod la mchod pa'am /
T02TD1660E:426b-44: me tog gi tshom bu dang /
T02TD1660E:427a-0: yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya chen po @427a * //
T02TD1660E:427a-1: bkod la las dang po pas mchod pa byas nas /
T02TD1660E:427a-2: sdig ba kun las thar pa dang /
T02TD1660E:427a-3: bsod nams thams cad 'phel lo zhes nges brjod las kyang gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:427a-7: gar gyi phyag rgya zhes pa ste bcu gnyis so //
T02TD1660E:427a-8: phyag rgya bshad pa ni rab tu dga' ba zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:427a-9: aa la la ho zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu bshad do //
T02TD1660E:427a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro zhes pa nas gdon mi za ba zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam snang gi glu'o //
T02TD1660E:427a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na //
T02TD1660E:427a-13: rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'i bar gyis he ru ka'o //
T02TD1660E:427a-14: la lar rab tu dran zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:427a-15: grub pa ston zhes pa'i bar gyis padma gar dbang gi glu'o //
T02TD1660E:427a-16: thams cad dbang bskur zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:427a-17: grub par mdzod ces pa'i bar gyis rdo rje nyi ma'i glu'o //
T02TD1660E:427a-18: la lar mkhas pa'i zhes pa shloka gcig gis rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi glu'o //
T02TD1660E:427a-19: glu'i mchod pa'i ye shes bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:427a-20: me tog la sogs pa'i ye shes bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:427a-21: me tog dkar dang dmar ba la //
T02TD1660E:427a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:427a-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi me tog bdug pa mar me dri chab dri dang ldan pa'i zhal zas kyi gong bu bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:427a-24: me tog dmar po zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02TD1660E:427a-25: mchod pa'i phyag rgya bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:427a-26: tshogs 'khor gyi dus su gtor ma la sogs pa'i rdzas bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:427a-27: sgeg mo dang ni chu dang zhes pa la sogs pas ston te /
T02TD1660E:427a-28: phyis byung ba'i rdo rje'i ye shes dang sbyar nas sgeg mo dang ni chu la sogs pa ston te go sla'o //
T02TD1660E:427a-30: sangs rgyas rnams la bshos 'bul ba //
T02TD1660E:427a-31: zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD1660E:427a-32: rta dbul ba zhes pa'i bar gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i 'khor lo lnga'i mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1660E:427a-33: de ltar gtor ma'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:427a-34: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya ston pa ni /
T02TD1660E:427a-35: mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
T02TD1660E:427a-36: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:427b-0: mthe bong bsnol @427b nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo bkug / gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs mnyam par sbyar la /
T02TD1660E:427b-1: lhag ma rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas /
T02TD1660E:427b-2: spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas lngar gtugs nas /
T02TD1660E:427b-3: rigs lnga'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1660E:427b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la rin po che'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur pa dang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:427b-5: sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol //
T02TD1660E:427b-6: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:427b-7: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02TD1660E:427b-8: mdzub mo dang mthe bo rtse mor sbyar nas /
T02TD1660E:427b-9: thod pa skam po'i kha dang mig gi phug lta bur gzhag pa ni he ru ka padma gar dbang /
T02TD1660E:427b-10: rdo rje nyi ma rta mchog gi bdag po'i rigs bsdus pa'i gtso bo'i dbang bskur yin no //
T02TD1660E:427b-11: rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te //
T02TD1660E:427b-12: zhes pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:427b-13: lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yis //
T02TD1660E:427b-14: zhes pa la sogs pas he ru ka'i dbang bskur ba bstan to //
T02TD1660E:427b-15: mthe bong dpa' bo skyil mo krung //
T02TD1660E:427b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pas padma gar dbang gi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:427b-17: rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar ba //
T02TD1660E:427b-19: rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:427b-20: sangs rgyas rin chen padmo dang //
T02TD1660E:427b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rta mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:427b-22: de ltar dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:427b-23: da ni rdo rje thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:427b-24: sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni //
T02TD1660E:427b-25: rdo rje thams cad yin par bshad //
T02TD1660E:427b-26: ces bya ba la sogs pa thun mong gi phyag rgya dam tshig 'byung ba'i rgyu bshad do //
T02TD1660E:427b-27: thun mong gi spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:427b-28: de las gung mo lcags kyu zhes pa la sogs pa smos te //
T02TD1660E:427b-30: rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni //
T02TD1660E:427b-31: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:427b-33: rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las //
T02TD1660E:427b-34: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:427b-36: rdo rje'i snying po'i phyag rgya gnyis he ru ka'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02TD1660E:427b-37: rdo rje bsdams pa la sogs pa la gnas te zhes pa la sogs pas padma gar dbang gi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:428a-0: @428a * // rdo rje'i phyag rgya padmor byas pa las //
T02TD1660E:428a-1: zhes pas rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:428a-2: rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bcings nas zhes pa la sogs pas rta mchog gi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD1660E:428a-3: rdo rje thams cad kyi phyag rgya de shes pas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02TD1660E:428a-5: dngos grub len pa'i gang zag gis rdo rje thal mo bsdams pa dang /
T02TD1660E:428a-6: gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa dang /
T02TD1660E:428a-7: mthe bo mthe chung brkyang bas ye shes 'bebs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:428a-8: rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su sgyur bas lha'i skur bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1660E:428a-9: gung mo lcags kyu byas pas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba ni /
T02TD1660E:428a-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dang bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:428a-11: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa lnga la ye shes dbab pa dang /
T02TD1660E:428a-12: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas ltar bsgom par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:428a-13: de yang dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang dbus ma'i he ru ka dang /
T02TD1660E:428a-14: ye shes dbab pa ye shes sems dpa' zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:428a-15: bstod pa dang bcas pa'i yum gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1660E:428a-17: // a'a li k'a li mnyam byas nas //
T02TD1660E:428a-18: kha yi thad kar 'dud par bya //
T02TD1660E:428a-19: zhes pa dbyangs yig bcu drug dang /
T02TD1660E:428a-20: gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi las /
T02TD1660E:428a-21: dkyil 'khor drug lha gang rung bsgoms pa la snying gar nyi zla nyis brtsegs bsam pa ni /
T02TD1660E:428a-22: a'a li k'a li mnyam spyar nas //
T02TD1660E:428a-24: de la gzugs kyi rnam rtog yig 'bru dang /
T02TD1660E:428a-25: sgra'i rnam rtog gnyis las sgra'i rnam rtog gi dbang du byas nas /
T02TD1660E:428a-26: a'a li k'a li ni 'byung rngub po //
T02TD1660E:428a-27: mnyam par gnas pa ni lte ba'i dbus kyi gnas pa'i rlung ngo //
T02TD1660E:428a-28: kha yi thad kar 'dud par bya //
T02TD1660E:428a-30: lte ba snying ga lkog ma byed pa gsum gyis 'grib pa'i gling bur brdabs nas sgra'i gnas brgyad kyi byed pas phye ste /
T02TD1660E:428a-31: de'i 'og tu bzhi pas gzung du rung ba'i sgra'i ri mo rnams dpag bsam gyi shing gi sdong po ltar rtsa bar dgod par bya ba yin la dbyangs yig bcu drug gi gu gu lcug ma ltar byas la gsal byed kyi steng du yi ger bzhag pas mgo brtsegs mar gyur pa lcug ma las myu gu skyes pa bzhin no //
T02TD1660E:428b-0: de las me @428b tog byung ba ltar lha'i phyed chag gi zla ba tshes pa dang /
T02TD1660E:428b-1: 'bras bu sman pa ltar rjes 'jug gi dbyangs kyi thig le dang /
T02TD1660E:428b-2: lo 'dab 'brul pa bzhin tsheg drug gnyis kyis mtshams bcad pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:428b-3: gzugs kyi rnam rtog dbyangs dang gsal byed mnyam par byas nas thams cad thig gi ri mo las mi 'da' bar tshar du dkris pa ni kha'i thad kar zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:428b-4: dbyangs dang gsal byed thams cad snga ma la lta bas na 'dud pa bya zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:428b-5: de'i 'og tu ri mo rnams zhes pas dbyangs gsal byed /
T02TD1660E:428b-6: mtheb mdzub thabs shes rab kyi spu gus bzung nas mig gi ltar rung bar dgod do //
T02TD1660E:428b-7: gug skyed dag ges lcug mar bya //
T02TD1660E:428b-8: zhes pa la sogs pa gzugs kyi rnam rtog dang mtshungs te go sla'o //
T02TD1660E:428b-9: de yang rgyud 'bum pa las yi ge'i dbyibs gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:428b-10: aa ni khyim bya'i mgo yi gzugs //
T02TD1660E:428b-11: ai ni glang chen sna lta bu //
T02TD1660E:428b-12: a'i ni dbang phyug chen po 'dra /
T02TD1660E:428b-13: au ni rnga mo'i mgo ji bzhin //
T02TD1660E:428b-14: a'u ni sha ba'i kha 'dra ba //
T02TD1660E:428b-15: ri ni ri bong mgo bo 'dra //
T02TD1660E:428b-16: yi ge r'i ni seng ge bzhin //
T02TD1660E:428b-17: yi ge li ni glang chen kha //
T02TD1660E:428b-18: l'i ni dbang ldan zhal dang mtshungs //
T02TD1660E:428b-19: ae ni ma he'i kha 'dra ba //
T02TD1660E:428b-20: aee ni rma bya'i kha dang mtshungs //
T02TD1660E:428b-21: ao ni byi la'i kha bzhin no ;
T02TD1660E:428b-22: / aoo ni khyi yi kha bzhin no //
T02TD1660E:428b-23: aam ni chu srin mgo bo 'dra //
T02TD1660E:428b-24: tsheg drag aa: ni stag mgo bzhin //
T02TD1660E:428b-26: de bzhin du rus sbal dang /
T02TD1660E:428b-29: kang ka dag tsag sha / gdugs /
T02TD1660E:428b-44: khu byug / bya rog / ri bong /
T02TD1660E:428b-47: srin po'i mkha' 'gro ba dang 'dra bar gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:428b-48: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1660E:428b-49: zhes pa la sogs pas gzugs kyi rnam rtog dang /
T02TD1660E:429a-0: yi ge dag kyang mi 'gyur mchog / ces pa rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge badzra sb'a h'a zhes pa'i mtshan bris pas yongs su grub pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo mi 'gyur ba'i mchog mtshon pas na @429a * //
T02TD1660E:429a-1: sngags kyi yi ge aa na ha ste /
T02TD1660E:429a-3: de ji ltar mtshon zhe na /
T02TD1660E:429a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' brdar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1660E:429a-5: de yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i phyi ma las /
T02TD1660E:429a-6: yi ge lnga'i rang bzhin lus 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo nyid ces gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:429a-8: chags chen 'gro ba'i dpal zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan snying ga'i nyi zla'i steng du phyag mtshan gyi dbus su mtshan bris pas bstod na dngos grub thob po //
T02TD1660E:429a-9: de bzhin du he ru ka'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du khro bo'i rdo rje la /
T02TD1660E:429a-10: snying rje dri med khro bo'i dpal //
T02TD1660E:429a-11: zhes pa'i mtshan bris nas bstod do //
T02TD1660E:429a-12: padma gar dbang gi thugs kar nyi zla'i steng du /
T02TD1660E:429a-13: padma chags pa'i dpal dag pa //
T02TD1660E:429a-14: zhes pa'i mtshan bris la bstod do //
T02TD1660E:429a-15: rdo rje nyi ma'i thugs kar nyi zla'i steng rin po che'i dbus su //
T02TD1660E:429a-16: rdo rje nyi ma dpal gdangs pa //
T02TD1660E:429a-17: zhes pa bkod la bstod do //
T02TD1660E:429a-18: rta mchog gi thugs kar nyi zla'i steng gi sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su /
T02TD1660E:429a-19: rta mchog pha rol gnon po'i dpal //
T02TD1660E:429a-20: zhes pa bris la bstod do //
T02TD1660E:429a-21: dngos grub myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:429a-22: da ni lha gzhan dag la bsgre ba bstan pa ni //
T02TD1660E:429a-23: lhag pa'i lha ni gang dag gi /
T02TD1660E:429a-24: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:429a-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i bde mchog ma dang /
T02TD1660E:429a-26: rnam snang gi sangs rgyas dbyangs dang /
T02TD1660E:429a-27: he ru ka'i goo r'i ma dang /
T02TD1660E:429a-28: padma gar dbang gi rnam gzigs ma dang /
T02TD1660E:429a-29: rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang bskur ma dang /
T02TD1660E:429a-30: rta mchog gi zhi ba'i rta mgrin la sogs pa dkyil 'khor bzhi'i slob dpon gyis lha gang dang gang la me tog phog pa de dang de'i mtshan bris nas bstod par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:429a-31: gal te gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i tshe /
T02TD1660E:429a-33: dbang bskur ba'i tha mar ming gi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1660E:429a-34: ming de brtan par 'gyur ram zhe na /
T02TD1660E:429a-35: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba de dag gis //
T02TD1660E:429a-36: byang chub snying po'i bar du ni //
T02TD1660E:429a-37: rdo rje'i ming du rab tu gnas //
T02TD1660E:429a-38: de nas sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur //
T02TD1660E:429a-40: me tog phog pa'i phra se nas lha'i rigs su shes shing ming btags pa bzhin du dbyangs dang /
T02TD1660E:429b-0: gsal byed @429b kyi yi ge sde tshan bzhi dang /
T02TD1660E:429b-1: sha sha sa ha spangs pa'i sde tshan bzhi gsal byed dang /
T02TD1660E:429b-3: tha mar mnyam pa'i sde tshan bzhi ru bris la ka gnas pa'i bar gyi sde tshan bzhi la yi ge mtshang ba'i yi ge lnga lnga las sha sha sa ha bzhi dang /
T02TD1660E:429b-4: ri dang li ma ning gi yi ge rnams gnyis su brtsis pas kha bskangs nas brgyad tshan bzhi ru byas la /
T02TD1660E:429b-6: yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad bkod pa la rig pa'am /
T02TD1660E:429b-7: me tog 'dor bas de'i rigs su shes pa'am /
T02TD1660E:429b-9: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam gyi mtshan dang lus ngag yal lag gi brda shes pas kyang kyang sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma shes pas tshogs 'khor gyi lhar bya ba dang /
T02TD1660E:429b-10: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:429b-11: de skad du yang chos spyod bcu pa'i mdo las /
T02TD1660E:429b-12: du ba las ni mer shes shing //
T02TD1660E:429b-13: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:429b-14: brda'i phyag rgya ji ltar shes par 'gyur bsnyam nas /
T02TD1660E:429b-15: spyi bor byug pa gang yin pa //
T02TD1660E:429b-16: zhes pa la sogs pas tshogs 'khor byed pa'i tshe'am /
T02TD1660E:429b-17: rdul tshon la mtshan ma thob nas dngos grub len pa'i tshe na /
T02TD1660E:429b-18: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur pa yan lag dang nyid lag la lus kyi brdar gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:429b-19: tha mal pas mi brjod cing tha mas pa'i lus kyi brda yang mi bya bas dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i tha snyad du byed pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:429b-21: zag med kyi tshig gi brda'i phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:429b-22: aa pi pu la sogs pa gang gi brdar gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:429b-23: aa bi pu ta pra ti pu ta ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag 'tshal ba yi ni /
T02TD1660E:429b-24: zag med kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i brda dang tha snyad byas pa ni /
T02TD1660E:429b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog //
T02TD1660E:429b-26: ae ma ho bde ba thog mtha' med pa dang bzhi ni rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma yin no //
T02TD1660E:429b-27: bde mchog ma la rgyas 'debs ma dang mtshan gnyis so //
T02TD1660E:429b-28: ae ma ho bde ba la rmongs byed ma dang mtshan gnyis so //
T02TD1660E:430a-0: snang mdzad ma la zab mo dang @430a * //
T02TD1660E:430a-2: slob ma mo la tshe 'phel ma dang mtshan gnyis so //
T02TD1660E:430a-3: lhag ma lha mo bcu bzhi la mtshan re re'o //
T02TD1660E:430a-4: smin ma bskyod pas mda' bzhi 'dzin pa'i bde mchog ma mtshon te /
T02TD1660E:430a-5: bhaga lingga bstan pas ae ma'o bde ba mtshon /
T02TD1660E:430a-6: thod pa kha t'am gas rnam snang mtshon /
T02TD1660E:430a-7: sangs rgyas phyag rgya thod pa gnyis sa la nas gang bas slob ma mo mtshon to //
T02TD1660E:430a-8: 'khor los bstan pas dkyil 'khor mtshon to //
T02TD1660E:430a-9: sngon rgyan gon pa de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad do //
T02TD1660E:430a-10: lha thams cad kyi cha byad gyon nas skye bo dam pa rnams 'dus pa'i ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo yin no //
T02TD1660E:430a-11: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brda de dag ni /
T02TD1660E:430a-12: mdza' ba 'dus pa'i dus su bya ba yin par gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:430a-13: ci'i phyir dkyil 'khor yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:430a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:430a-15: dkyil 'khor thams cad yin par bshad //
T02TD1660E:430a-16: ces pas lus kyi dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02TD1660E:430a-17: lha mo thams cad skal ba bzang //
T02TD1660E:430a-18: zhes pas bha ga'i dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02TD1660E:430a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:430a-21: kun gyi slob dpon yin par bshad //
T02TD1660E:430a-22: ces pa'i bar gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bstan to ;
T02TD1660E:430a-24: dkyil 'khor lus zhes bya bar bshad //
T02TD1660E:430a-25: ces pa la sogs pas gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:430a-26: dkyil 'khor gsum la dbang pa'i slob dpon ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1660E:430a-27: kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas zhes pa la sogs pa shloka gcig gis mtshan nyid gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:430a-28: de'i slob ma sgrub pa'i grogs po ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1660E:430a-29: de yi slob ma grub na ni //
T02TD1660E:430a-30: zhes pa la sogs pa shloka gcig gis las kyi slob dpon rgyal tshab yin par bshad do //
T02TD1660E:430a-31: slob ma lhag ma rnams ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1660E:430a-32: de la gzhan pa'i slob ma kun //
T02TD1660E:430a-33: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis 'jig rten thun mong mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i tha ma dang 'bring dang rab byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad do //
T02TD1660E:430a-34: sangs rgyas thams cad rin po che //
T02TD1660E:430b-0: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du @430b mtshon to //
T02TD1660E:430b-1: thod pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi cod pan gyis tshogs 'khor gyi slob dpon du mtshon to //
T02TD1660E:430b-2: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin du grub pa gcig / padma'i 'dab ma bzhis dbang bskur bas padma'i rigs so //
T02TD1660E:430b-3: rin po che myu gu'i chod pan gyis nor bu rigs kyi slob dpon du mtshon to //
T02TD1660E:430b-4: rta mchog rigs la snying po lnga brjod nas /
T02TD1660E:430b-5: nor gyi mchog phreng ba lngas bcings pas rta mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon du mtshon to //
T02TD1660E:430b-6: ga phur tsandan dmar po dang //
T02TD1660E:430b-7: zhes pa la sogs pas gsang ba'i dbang bskur gyi bdud rtsi lnga brda yin no //
T02TD1660E:430b-8: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD1660E:430b-9: dang po mna' bsgrags la dam tshig bsgrags la dbang bskur ba ni go rims yin pas /
T02TD1660E:430b-10: dang po bag zan las go ku nga ha na'i gzugs byas /
T02TD1660E:430b-11: de'i nang khrag gis bkang nas /
T02TD1660E:430b-12: phyi rol tsandan dmar pos byugs te /
T02TD1660E:430b-13: mar la btsos pa'i rgyal po'i zan //
T02TD1660E:430b-15: de dang mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma btang la slob ma'i lce la sha lnga'am sha lnga med na /
T02TD1660E:430b-16: de'i khrag gi thig le byin la mna' bsgag go //
T02TD1660E:430b-17: de'i phyir rgyud thams cad las phyugs gsod pa'i sbyor ba zhes bag zan gyi gzugs la zer ro //
T02TD1660E:430b-18: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i lha mo la ming ji skad gdags she na /
T02TD1660E:430b-19: bde mchog ma dang ae ma bde ma la sogs pa'i ming bzhi gdags so //
T02TD1660E:430b-20: lha mo de rnams sngags skyes yin no //
T02TD1660E:430b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i ye shes phob la sangs rgyas kyi brda btags nas phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1660E:430b-22: dga' bzhi sbyor ba thams cad rtog bral sangs rgyas kyi zhi gnas dang /
T02TD1660E:430b-23: lhag mthong ye shes yin par bshad do //
T02TD1660E:430b-24: reg bya rdo rje ma de rtogs na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur bas phyis ye shes las skyes pa'i lha mo de nyi bar longs spyod pas khams gsum ma lus pa'i stong pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:430b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i brdas las kyi phyag rgya'i gzugs gdong rgyan gyon nas ri mo bris pas mtshon no //
T02TD1660E:430b-28: ros ni de'i lce dang mchu 'jib pa'o //
T02TD1660E:431a-1: pa ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i dga' ba bzhi'i bde ba'o //
T02TD1660E:431a-2: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la phyag rgya gang gi brdas gdags she na /
T02TD1660E:431a-3: sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1660E:431a-4: chos kyi mu dra yin par bshad //
T02TD1660E:431a-5: ces gsungs pas chos kyi phyag rgya la bya'o //
T02TD1660E:431a-6: gal te rtog med du ma song nas dga' bral du song na ji ltar bya snyam na /
T02TD1660E:431a-7: sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis //
T02TD1660E:431a-8: zhes pa'i shlo ka gcig gis mchod par bya bar bstan to //
T02TD1660E:431a-10: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
T02TD1660E:431a-11: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgom par bya//
T02TD1660E:431a-12: rang rdzas thig le mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1660E:431a-13: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mchod //
T02TD1660E:431a-15: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin de rnal 'byor du yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:431a-16: rjes su sbyor bas mchod na ni //
T02TD1660E:431a-17: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis lha mo dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i mchog dga' la rjes su rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:431a-19: sems tsam la ni snyoms zhugs pa //
T02TD1660E:431a-20: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis rnal 'byor zhes pa'i dga' ba bshad do //
T02TD1660E:431a-21: shin tu sbyor ba gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:431a-22: lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1660E:431a-23: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang sbyar bas lhan cig skyes dga' bstan to //
T02TD1660E:431a-25: mchog dga' la rjes su sbyor ba /
T02TD1660E:431a-26: bde ba chen po zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:431a-27: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rab tu sbyor ba bshad do //
T02TD1660E:431a-28: lhan cig skyes dga' la sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:431a-29: gal te yid nang du chud nas dga' bral du song ba'i tshe ji ltar bya snyam na /
T02TD1660E:431a-30: dga' ba'i spyod pa sgrub pa bshad de zhes pa la sogs pa la gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:431a-31: rjes su sbyor ba'i rjes su sgrub pa ni shes rab bde bar 'gyur bas na mchog dga'o //
T02TD1660E:431a-32: skyes pa ltar byed dga' spyod ces pa thabs kyi bde ba ste dga' ba'o //
T02TD1660E:431a-33: slar yang rjes su sgrub pa bshad //
T02TD1660E:431a-34: ces pa yid bde ba ste lhan cig skyes dga'o //
T02TD1660E:431a-35: lha mo kun la bde blugs pas //
T02TD1660E:431a-36: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis dga' bral gyi bcud kyis len gyi bde ba ste dga' bral bshad do //
T02TD1660E:431b-0: de dus nam gyi dga' bral @431b zhes gdags she na //
T02TD1660E:431b-1: thams cad ldang ba kun 'gro ba //
T02TD1660E:431b-2: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis dga' bral zhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi brda bshad do //
T02TD1660E:431b-3: gal te dga' bral du ma song na mchog dga' lhan cig skyes dga'i rjes la ci zhig sgom snyam na /
T02TD1660E:431b-4: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / ces pa'i shloka gnyis kyis bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brdas dngos grub chen po dang /
T02TD1660E:431b-11: bla na med pa zhes pa'i ming brgyad kyis bstan to //
T02TD1660E:431b-12: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas yid nang du chud pa'i dga' ba bzhi dang /
T02TD1660E:431b-13: yid phyir byung ba'i tshe longs spyod pa'i dga' ba bzhi bsgom pa yin par rgyud 'di nyid dang /
T02TD1660E:431b-16: rdo rje mkha' 'gro he ru ka 'byung ba /
T02TD1660E:431b-17: mkha' 'gro ma kun spyod gdan bzhi las gsal bar gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:431b-18: kun snying ni ma rtogs nas bskyed rim gyis lha bskyed par bshad /
T02TD1660E:431b-19: longs spyod pa'i dga' ba bzhi sgom pa yin par rgyud 'di nyid dang /
T02TD1660E:431b-20: 'phro ba 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:431b-21: da ni de rnams kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1660E:431b-23: pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i p'u dza'i rdzas 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la 'jig rten na grags pa'i brda'i steng du zag med kyi brda dngos grub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa ni /
T02TD1660E:431b-24: 'jig rten na grags pa'i khrag la sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD1660E:431b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i brdas me tog bshad do //
T02TD1660E:431b-26: mdangs la bdug pa zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:431b-27: lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:431b-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yi //
T02TD1660E:431b-29: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu dang /
T02TD1660E:431b-30: gang la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa zhes brdar btags so //
T02TD1660E:431b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i glu gar la zhi ba'i sprul ba zhes btags so //
T02TD1660E:431b-32: rdo rje nyi ma'i glu gsal ma'i dbang po'i sprul pa zhes btags so //
T02TD1660E:431b-33: he ru ka'i glu gar la dur khrod kyi sprul pa zhes btags so //
T02TD1660E:431b-34: padma gar dbang gi glu gar la chags pa sprul pa zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-0: rta mchog gi glu gar la rab tu dga' @432a * //
T02TD1660E:432a-1: ba'i sprul pa zhes btags so //
T02TD1660E:432a-2: de ltar ngag gi brda gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:432a-3: ti zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1660E:432a-4: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i brda yin no //
T02TD1660E:432a-5: he ru ka'i lha mo la aa ralli zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-6: padma gar dbang gi la dam tshig mchog ces bshad /
T02TD1660E:432a-7: rdo rje nyi ma'i badzra aa ralli zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-8: rta mchog la yang de nyid do //
T02TD1660E:432a-9: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi'i rnal 'byor pa sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa'i brda ni /
T02TD1660E:432a-10: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:432a-11: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:432a-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa la /
T02TD1660E:432a-13: skal ba bzang po zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la ta ki zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-15: he ru ka'i la ki li ki la zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-16: padma gar dbang gi la byis pa chu srin rgyal mtshan zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-17: rdo rje nyi ma la 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mchog ces bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-18: rta mchog gi la dbang phyug mchog ces bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-19: rdo rje dril bu drug la dam tshig ces bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-20: lus ngag yid gsum la aom bhu kham zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-21: dgug gzhug bzhi la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-23: phar bzhud pa ni aa hi'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-24: au ti ta ni longs shig pa'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-25: sv'a h'a ni drongs shig pa'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-26: kh'a hi ni zo shig pa'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-28: bde mchog la rgyas 'debs ma zhes pa nas /
T02TD1660E:432a-29: cher bstan ma zhes pa'i bar gyis bde mchog ma la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad kyi brda yin no //
T02TD1660E:432a-30: rdo rje 'dzin dang sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1660E:432a-31: zhes pa la sogs pas rdo rje sems dpa' la ni shes 'gyur zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-32: 'jig rten dbang phyug dga' 'gyur zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432a-36: mkha' skyes la aam aam aam aam aam zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-37: thams cad mkhyen pa la sarba bid ces bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-38: sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags ni ru ru 'khor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-40: lo tsa na ni don dam nye bar zhi ba'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-41: sangs rgyas rang byung bha ga w'an ni sarba aartha'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-42: ki ta sa ni mig sa snying ngo //
T02TD1660E:432a-43: ko ta ba ni rna ba phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD1660E:432a-44: ko ta ba ni lce spyan ras gzigs so //
T02TD1660E:432b-0: ka ti ra ka ni @432b lus sgrib pa rnam sel lo //
T02TD1660E:432b-1: ko la sha ni gzugs sangs rgyas spyan no //
T02TD1660E:432b-2: ko la ba ni sgra m'a ma k'i'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-3: ko la ni dri sgrol ma'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-4: ko la ba ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-5: ko la ma ni reg kun du bzang mo'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-6: phyag na rdo rje rang gi mtshan 'di rnams gang brjod par bya ba ni mi gnas reg bya'i bar gyi yul rnams rnam shes kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-7: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1660E:432b-8: zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis kyis phan yon no //
T02TD1660E:432b-9: mig dang zhes pa tshigs bcad gcig gis sngar gyi rang don gyi brda'i ming yin no //
T02TD1660E:432b-10: yid kyi rnam shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mtshon cha dang bi ti dang dgra bo dang lag na rdo rje zhes kyang bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-11: gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa dang dgra rnams zad pa dang /
T02TD1660E:432b-12: phyag na rdo rje zhes kyang bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-13: rdo rje 'chang chen po la he ru ka dang /
T02TD1660E:432b-14: thal bar 'jig dang mchog dang sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo zhes btags so //
T02TD1660E:432b-15: de'i phyir mtshan rdo rje 'bar ba la rab tu 'jig ces bshad do //
T02TD1660E:432b-16: kha tv'am ga la rgyal mtshan che //
T02TD1660E:432b-18: thod pa la kham phor zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-19: khrag chen po la sbrang rtsi zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-20: skreg [?] mo la sogs pa brgyad pa la dkar mo rkun mo zhes bya bar grags so //
T02TD1660E:432b-21: sgom bzhi la srungs shig dang /
T02TD1660E:432b-22: myur du dang rnam rgyal dpal dang /
T02TD1660E:432b-23: thal bzhi dang glog ces bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-24: yang na rta gdong ma ni ham ;
T02TD1660E:432b-26: thal byed ma la h'um zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-27: phat ces pa rol cig pa'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-28: rang zhes pa dgongs shig pa'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-29: phat ces pa rol cig pa'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-30: phat ces pa sod cig pa ste he ru ka'i brda'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-31: padma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi brda ni /
T02TD1660E:432b-32: padma spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so ;
T02TD1660E:432b-33: / rnam gzigs ma la dga' ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-34: sgrol ma la grub pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-35: rgyan ldan ma la blo zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-36: khro gnyer ma la rdzu 'phrul zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-37: na bza' ma la 'phel ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-38: padma'i dbang phyug ma la sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-39: sna tshogs padma la padma'i rin chen zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-40: nam mkha' snying po la thams cad re re ma dang rdzogs mdzad dang /
T02TD1660E:432b-42: rdo rje nyi ma nor bu che //
T02TD1660E:432b-44: de'i 'khor ni tram gis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-45: ba ba ma ni gter ldan ma'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-46: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan ma'i'o //
T02TD1660E:432b-47: tra ta tra ta ni mchod chen ma'o //
T02TD1660E:433a-2: / zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:433a-3: sna tshogs padmo sangs rgyas spyan //
T02TD1660E:433a-4: 'jig rten dbang phyug byang chub kun //
T02TD1660E:433a-5: sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs rdo rje bla na med pa thams cad mos /
T02TD1660E:433a-7: rta mchog ma dpal ldan dang mtshan bcu gnyis dang ldan pa ni rta mchog gi brda'o //
T02TD1660E:433a-8: de bas na phyag rgya nyi shu yin no //
T02TD1660E:433a-9: de ltar dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:433a-10: da ni gdong rgyan gon la mtshan ma byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni rjes su chags par bya'o zhes /
T02TD1660E:433a-11: cha lugs chags pa bzhin byed cing //
T02TD1660E:433a-12: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:433a-13: shloka gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs gyon la bsam gtan dang po mtshan ma 'byin pa bstan to //
T02TD1660E:433a-14: shloka re res ni rnam snang la sogs pa dkyil 'khor lnga'i cha lugs bya ba bstan to //
T02TD1660E:433a-15: de ltar mthong ba dang thos pa dang reg pa'i mtshan ma'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:433a-16: mngon shes kyi phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:433a-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal 'byor pa //
T02TD1660E:433a-18: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:433a-19: yun ring du goms par byas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon shes skyed pa'am /
T02TD1660E:433a-21: thabs bstan pa ni gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:433a-22: thabs kyi phyag rgya lha mor sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1660E:433a-23: lha'i sku mi 'gyur ba dam pa 'grub par yul kun la dngos po kun la thams cad kyi bye brag kun gyis bdag nyid la shes pa'i rnam pa kun rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02TD1660E:433a-24: de ltar thun mong gi mngon shes bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:433a-25: bye brag tu rdo rje sems dpa' bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:433a-26: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas sa phyogs ba ko tsam du byugs la bdud rtsi lnga'i thig ler byas nas mchod pa lngas mchod la /
T02TD1660E:433a-27: bu mo'am khye'u gzhon nu ma grong pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa sdom pa byin la /
T02TD1660E:433a-28: gnas bzhi ru rigs bzhi'i snying po bkod la dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thod lo kor gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris te /
T02TD1660E:433a-29: yig 'brul bkod la mtshams bzhir bde mchog ma la sogs pa yum bzhi bzlas pa'i bum pa la sman lnga 'brul lnga /
T02TD1660E:433a-30: rin po che lnga bcug la ras sar pas mgul pa bcings te /
T02TD1660E:433b-0: ldum chags @433b lcug mas kha brgyan la /
T02TD1660E:433b-1: rnam rgyal gyi bum pa la gtso bo bkod la sngags 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:433b-2: de nas bdag gam gzhan la mngon shes bskyed par 'dod pa de la rnam rgyal gyi chus dbang bskur zhing bsrung ba byas la dkyil 'khor de'i thog tu lha gang yin pa de'i yi ge la reg tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:433b-3: de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang /
T02TD1660E:433b-4: bden pa chen po'i byin rlabs dang /
T02TD1660E:433b-5: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i bden pa dang /
T02TD1660E:433b-6: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ji lta ba bzhin ston par gyur cig ces byas la reg par gzhug go //
T02TD1660E:433b-7: de bzhin du ma reg par me tog dor ba'am /
T02TD1660E:433b-9: me rong dam shing leb bam /
T02TD1660E:433b-10: chu dang ba dang ba chu'am /
T02TD1660E:433b-12: gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i khyim 'jam po dag la mig byin gyis brlabs la bltar gzhug go //
T02TD1660E:433b-13: rna ba byin gyis brlabs la nyan du gzhug go//
T02TD1660E:433b-14: sems byin gyis brlabs la gzhan gyi sems brtag par bya'o /
T02TD1660E:433b-15: 'gro ba'i rigs bzhi'i 'khor lo snying gar bkod la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba brtag par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:433b-16: zad par dang zil gnon bsgoms la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:433b-17: des 'jig rten gyi bya ba blang bya dor bya dang /
T02TD1660E:433b-20: chom pos 'phrogs pa dang ma 'phrogs pa /
T02TD1660E:433b-21: rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa /
T02TD1660E:433b-23: don yod pa dang med pa /
T02TD1660E:433b-24: grub pa dang mi grub pa /
T02TD1660E:433b-25: bde ba dang mi bde ba /
T02TD1660E:433b-28: sangs rgyas kyi don thams cad kyang 'khrul 'khor gyi stobs kyis mngon shes lnga bskyed nas sems can gyi don byed do //
T02TD1660E:433b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i mngon shes bskyed nas rnam snang gi rnal 'byor pas sa chu me rlung nam mkha' la mngon shes bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:433b-30: he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas 'dod yon thams cad la bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:433b-31: rta mchog gi rnal 'byor pas reg pa'am ma reg pa la sogs pa pra dbab pa'i yul bcu la snga ma ltar mngon shes bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:433b-32: de ltar ji snyed mkhyen pa'i rnam shes kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:434a-0: da ni lha'i bu'i bdud 'joms pa'i @434a * //
T02TD1660E:434a-1: bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1660E:434a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor ba /
T02TD1660E:434a-3: ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs ldan pas rdul tshon slob dpon bsnyen sgrub bzhis lhar bskyed pa'am /
T02TD1660E:434a-4: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i slob dpon cha byad dang /
T02TD1660E:434a-6: dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i thal ba'am /
T02TD1660E:434a-7: ma mo'i gnas su keng rus yun ring po lon pa'i phye ma bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pas bsgrub pa'i dpral bar thig le bya ba'am /
T02TD1660E:434a-8: yang na snying ga lkog ma dpral ba gsum du sor mo gsum pa'i ri mo byas pa bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:434a-10: des phyogs bzhi dang mtshams bzhi dang nam mkha' dang sa la gtor na bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:434a-11: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor lnga yang bsrung ba de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:434a-12: thal ba de ji lta bu yin snyam na /
T02TD1660E:434a-13: bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i thal ba la bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD1660E:434a-16: 'phar ba la sogs pa'i rtags byung nas bsrung ba'i rdo rje thal ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bsrung ba'o //
T02TD1660E:434a-17: rigs bzhi'i thal ba'i bsrung ba bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:434a-18: chu'i bsrung ba bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:434a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:434a-20: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te bsgom pa gdong rgyan gyon pa'i lha bzhi'i rgya mtsho'am 'bab chu'i 'gram du chu la dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas /
T02TD1660E:434a-21: chu gyen du 'gro ba dang mi g-yo ba mthong ba de'i tshe /
T02TD1660E:434a-22: lha thams cad zhu ba'i lha rdzas kyi zhi ba'i chu'i mchog gis bdag dang gzhan la gtor ba dang /
T02TD1660E:434a-23: spyi bor blugs pa dang khrus bya ba dang /
T02TD1660E:434a-24: chu der 'bogs shing rgal nas bcud kyi 'jig rten bsrung ba dang /
T02TD1660E:434a-25: snod kyi 'jig rten kyang snga ma bzhin du bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:434a-26: rigs bzhi'i chu'i bsrung ba bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:434a-27: yungs kar bskyed nas bsrung ba ni /
T02TD1660E:434a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:434a-29: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:434a-31: lha rnams kyi cha byad gyon pa bskyed pa nas mi'i thod pa dur khrod kyi sas bkang pa la sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags kyis gzugs dang /
T02TD1660E:434a-32: m'a ma k'i'i sngags kyis bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chu blugs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:434a-33: gos dkar mo'i sngags kyis yur ma bya ba dang /
T02TD1660E:434a-34: sgrol ba'i sngags kyis bsrung ba byas la /
T02TD1660E:434b-0: smin pa'i tshe dmangs @434b rigs kyi bu mo'i lag par sprul nas /
T02TD1660E:434b-1: lus sam mgul du gdags pa dang /
T02TD1660E:434b-2: lo mas tshod ma bya zhing yungs mar gyis mgo la bsku ba dang /
T02TD1660E:434b-3: phyogs mtshams kyang snga ma bzhin bsrung ba bya'o //
T02TD1660E:434b-4: de ltar rigs rnams kyi yungs kar gyi bsrung ba bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:434b-5: rigs rnams kyi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bsrung ba bshad pa ni //
T02TD1660E:434b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:434b-7: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:434b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas mig tu ma dang ta las nyi zla bskyed la mig 'bras la h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed de /
T02TD1660E:434b-9: glog lta bu'i rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar smra bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:434b-10: rdo rje phra mo'i mthong ba mtshan ma thob pa'i tshe ma mchu sos mnan la rdo rje dril bu bzung nas g-yon du 'gyings pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyis 'gro zhing gsal ba'i lta bas phyogs bcur bskor zhing /
T02TD1660E:434b-11: steng 'og byin gyis brlabs la sa 'og sa bla sa stengs gsum rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:434b-12: de bzhin du gdul bya dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rkang ba'i rang bzhin ngan pa rnams kyang snod du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:434b-13: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bzhi la yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:434b-14: thun mong gi phyag rgya gsungs nas bye brag gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:434b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02TD1660E:434b-17: bud med bcu bzhi lha mo'i cha byad du byas la de'i dbus su bar ti nas 'byung ba bzhin du bdag kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i cha byad du byas nas bsnyen sgrub bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms te /
T02TD1660E:434b-18: lha mo'i phyag rgya lta ba 'dug stangs dang phyag rgya'i gar dang sngags zlos shing che ge mo raksha raksha byas nas bdag dang gzhan phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:434b-19: rnam snang gi rnal 'byor pas rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi kha'i cha byad byas /
T02TD1660E:434b-20: bud med bcu bdun gyis bar ti nas 'byung ba ltar lha'i cha byad byas nas lta ba dang /
T02TD1660E:434b-21: lag pa rkang pa sngags 'don pa dang bcas pas snga ma ltar bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:434b-23: he ru ka'i rnam par 'phrul pas bar ti nas 'byung ba bzhin byas na bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:434b-24: padma gar dbang gi rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1660E:434b-25: ji lta ba'i gzugs dang dbyibs dang zhing padma kha 'byed pas bar ti nas 'byung ba ltar cha byad byas nas snga ma bzhin du bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435a-0: @435a * // rdo rje nyi ma'i rnal 'byor pas 'bar ba'i rdo rje lta ba'i tshul bzhin bzhugs /
T02TD1660E:435a-1: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i cha byad par ti ltar byas nas snga ma ltar bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435a-2: rta mchog gi rnal 'byor pas ji lta ba'i rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul bzhin byas la rta mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te ham kham las go cha bskyed de /
T02TD1660E:435a-3: snying gar mdud pa lan gsum nu ma dang lkog mar lan gnyis gnyis mdud la /
T02TD1660E:435a-5: lan cig rna ba gnyis kyi ltag par ze ka bcings nas lhag ma sbyangs pa ni go cha'i tshul du zhes bya'o //
T02TD1660E:435a-6: de nas spyi bo dang dpral ba dang glo g-yas g-yon dang rgyab tu rdo rje phreng ba bcings la dar 'ching ba bzhin du phreng ba yang bcings nas bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba dang phyogs bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435a-7: de ltar dngos grub len pa'i bsrung ba'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:435a-8: da ni nad zhi bar byas nas tshe 'phel ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad pa ni //
T02TD1660E:435a-9: ches sems dpa' yi tshul ston cing //
T02TD1660E:435a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:435a-11: bsnyen sgrub gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i bskur bskyed la /
T02TD1660E:435a-12: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la nad pa'i lus las rims mig gsum pa lag pa gsum pa rkang pa gsum pa kha dog nag pa ste ;
T02TD1660E:435a-14: sprul pa dang sdig pa la sogs pa'i gzugs bsams te /
T02TD1660E:435a-15: khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi phyag rgya bcings la mdzub mo lcags kyur byas pas nad dang dug bsal ba de nyid smin mtshams su bzhag na bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435a-16: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo bkug la sbrum ma'i gsum pa la btsugs na bu 'byung ba dang /
T02TD1660E:435a-19: dmu rdzing la sogs pa la btsugs nas sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na zug rngu sos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435a-20: mig gso ba ni dpal grub pa'i spyan zhes bya ba mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtsa bar bkug nas mthe bong dang gung mo rtse sbyar ba ni dpal grub pa'i spyan zhes bya ste /
T02TD1660E:435a-21: sngags 'bum bzlas nas mig phyis na long bas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435a-22: klad nad gso ba ni bdag nyid lha rnams kyi sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1660E:435a-26: padma'i dang rin po che dang /
T02TD1660E:435b-0: las kyi khu tshur @435b gyis glad pa'i nad drangs nas kha'i phyogs su byung ba ltar byas na klad nad sos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435b-1: rna ba gso ba ni h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po gnyis rna ba bskyed la bdag nyid kyi lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams la de rna ba ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes 'bum bzlas la rna bar phus gdab par bya'o//
T02TD1660E:435b-3: rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis brkyang la mthe bo mthe chung so sor brkyang nas lag pa g-yas pa'i gung mo byis pa'i spyi bor bzhag nas su mbhas gtsug tor bcings na byis pa'i nad sos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435b-4: dug gso ba ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD1660E:435b-5: de las byung ba'i sor mo lnga sprul mgo'i gdengs ka bsams nas sgrub pa'i rkang par yam las rlung /
T02TD1660E:435b-7: de'i steng du ra nag po la zhon pa'i skyes bu'i gzugs can nag po bsams nas me 'bar bas bsregs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:435b-8: dug bkug nas gdul ba dang /
T02TD1660E:435b-9: dug 'od zer gyi lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang mi lhas zos par bsams la /
T02TD1660E:435b-10: gdug pa'i mche ba la sogs pas zin pa'i 'dug stangs stag dang gos kyi dgon zan gyi dug ste brtson pa rnams sos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435b-12: khro bo'i sdigs mdzub kyis g-yas pa'i mthe bo dang /
T02TD1660E:435b-13: gung mo gnyis mig lta bur byas nas g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis yang de bzhin du byas te /
T02TD1660E:435b-14: g-yas g-yon gyi gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i rgyab sbyar te /
T02TD1660E:435b-15: mthe bo dang mdzub mo so sor bcad pas mdzub mo dang gung mo bar du gru gsum dang /
T02TD1660E:435b-16: gung mo gnyis mthe bo'i tshigs dang por bzhag pas mdzub mo gung mo mthe bo gnyis kyi bar gru bzhi byas nas zhi rgyas mngon spyod kyi phyag rgya bcings la gdon dang dug sel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:435b-17: shi ba slong ba'i phyag rgya ni he ru ka'i phyag rgya 'dzin byas la ba dan gsum pa gnyis bcings te /
T02TD1660E:435b-18: nang zlog pa gung mo gnyis mdud nas /
T02TD1660E:435b-20: mthe chung gnyis so sor mdud de /
T02TD1660E:435b-23: g-yas pa'i mthe bong rtse mo sbyor bas rtse mo lnga pa zhes bya ba smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu ru bzhag pas ma mo thams cad 'dul ba dang /
T02TD1660E:436a-2: rmongs pa dang thal bar byas pas slar 'tsho bar byed do //
T02TD1660E:436a-3: rta gso ba'i mu dra ni /
T02TD1660E:436a-4: tram las rta rnams bskyed la /
T02TD1660E:436a-5: hr'i las stan padmar bskyed la /
T02TD1660E:436a-6: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD1660E:436a-7: h'um las rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'am rta mchog tu bskyed na nad med cing nyams skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:436a-9: h'um ga h'um zhes pa las glang po bskyed la padma'i gdan dang zla ba'i gdan bskyed de /
T02TD1660E:436a-10: rigs bzhi'i lha bskyed nas bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsams na glang po'i nyams stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:436a-12: hri mam hri zhes pas bya bskyed la shr'i badzra satva stvam aa gi ho zhes pas rna bar bzlas na nad med pa dang mi skad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:436a-13: ljon shing bskyed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi'i rnal 'byor byas la h'um mam h'um zhes pa las skar ma rgyal gza' phur bu'i zhing thams cad sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags kyis bskyed la /
T02TD1660E:436a-14: m'a ma k'i'i sngags kyis bcu ba dang /
T02TD1660E:436a-15: sgrol ma'i sngags kyis bsrung ba dang /
T02TD1660E:436a-16: gos dkar mo'i sngags kyis yur ma bya ba dang /
T02TD1660E:436a-17: gnod mdzes la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs na nad med cing me tog dang 'bras bu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1660E:436a-18: de ltar gso ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs nas mtshon cha'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436a-19: 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:436a-22: lag pas 'phangs pa ni 'khor lo 'phangs nas slar bzung ba ni mda' mdung dang zhags pa'o //
T02TD1660E:436a-24: de nyid rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436a-25: dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dag / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:436a-26: de la 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1660E:436a-31: de dag gi bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436a-32: rkang pa gshibs nas mnyam pa'i stang stabs bya ba dang /
T02TD1660E:436a-33: rkang pa 'gyes pas sa ga bya ba dang /
T02TD1660E:436a-34: dkyil 'khor de dag kyang zhes pa zlum pos sa gnon dang /
T02TD1660E:436a-35: brkyang bskum gyis kyang zhes g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum pa'o //
T02TD1660E:436a-36: g-yas brkyang ni dbyibs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:436a-37: de la bde blag gi rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436b-0: @436b dpung pa g-yon pa mi lhod par bsgoms pa dang /
T02TD1660E:436b-1: 'ben la gtad na sran gzugs pa dang /
T02TD1660E:436b-2: lag pa g-yas pa bskum pas brten pa dang /
T02TD1660E:436b-3: rna ltag tu 'phen pas yan lag brten pa ste /
T02TD1660E:436b-4: 'di ni lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can //
T02TD1660E:436b-5: zhes bya ste lhag ma ni phan yon no //
T02TD1660E:436b-6: de la sbyor ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436b-7: rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du //
T02TD1660E:436b-8: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis kun du sbyor ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436b-9: lag pa g-yon pa legs bsrang pa //
T02TD1660E:436b-10: zhes pa shlo ka gcig gis 'dren pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o //
T02TD1660E:436b-11: rna drung bar du zlum por ni //
T02TD1660E:436b-12: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis 'gengs pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436b-13: ji ltar rig pa drangs nas ni //
T02TD1660E:436b-14: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis myur ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436b-17: 'phen pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436b-18: de gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1660E:436b-19: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1660E:436b-20: g-yas phyogs mda' bskor nas 'gengs nas sa la smad pa dang 'ben nam sa la gtod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:436b-21: rkang pa g-yon pa'i pus mo bkug g-yas pa'i brang bas sa la btsugs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436b-23: 'bigs pa bcu yi rgyal mchog gis //
T02TD1660E:436b-24: zhes pa g-yas pa'i sor mo sangs rgyas lngar bskyed de /
T02TD1660E:436b-25: phyag rgya'i mchog des phung po lnga dang /
T02TD1660E:436b-26: dbang po lnga la mda' phog par bsam mo //
T02TD1660E:436b-27: gsal ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436b-28: mtshon cha lnga po thun mong gi cho ga bstan pa yin te /
T02TD1660E:436b-30: mnyam pa dang rab tu 'phangs pa la sogs pa lnga thabs kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1660E:436b-31: nyam nga la gams dang bde sogs //
T02TD1660E:436b-32: zhes pa ni zlos pa'i phyag rgyal dang ;
T02TD1660E:436b-34: zhes pa phreng ba'i phyag rgya lnga dang /
T02TD1660E:436b-35: kun du kun nas thams cad du //
T02TD1660E:436b-36: zhes pa rus pa la sogs pa phyag rgya lnga dang /
T02TD1660E:436b-37: nyi shu ni dgra cha thams cad gsal bar rtog pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1660E:436b-38: mtshon cha de rnams ni dngos grub len pa'i tshe mdun gyi lha dang bar chad kyi bdud la 'phen pa dang /
T02TD1660E:436b-39: phrin las byed pa'i tshe g-yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1660E:436b-40: de ltar mtshon cha'i phyag rgya bstan nas las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:436b-41: srin lag gnyis kyi nang du ni //
T02TD1660E:436b-42: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje khu tshur dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo'i padma'i rin @437a * //
T02TD1660E:437a-1: po che'i las kyi khu tshur rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-2: mtshan ma thob nas las rnams bya'o //
T02TD1660E:437a-3: de ltar lag pa'i mu dra'i ye shes bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:437a-4: dpal ldan rdo rje las kyi rkang pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:437a-5: rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang //
T02TD1660E:437a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:437a-7: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la dngos grub len pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-9: tshogs kyi 'khor lo spyod pa'i brtul zhugs byed pa'i tshig rkang pa brgyad pa g-yas kyi phyed krung dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-10: gnon pa g-yon gyi phyed krung bskums nas 'degs pa'i rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gzugs brnyan mnan nas skad phyung ba'i tshe bka' bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD1660E:437a-11: de bzhin du rnam snang rnal 'byor pas dpal mnan pa rdo rje skyil mo krung dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-12: rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru kas g-yon brkyang pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-13: padma gar dbang gi padma'i skyil krung gis mnan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-14: rdo rje nyi ma'i rin po che'i skyil krung gis mnan pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-15: rta mchig gi las kyi skyil mo krung gis mnan pa'o //
T02TD1660E:437a-16: mnan nas su dag longs spyod snyam nas /
T02TD1660E:437a-17: dbang phyug mnan nas dngos grub gsum ma bkug pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-18: khyab 'jug mnan nas dpa' mo bkug pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-19: tshangs pa mnan nas grol ma bkug pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-20: 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas dga' ma bkug pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-22: mkha' 'gro ma rnams longs spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:437a-23: de bzhin du ku be ra mnan nas rig pa 'grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bkug pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437a-24: mi'i rgyal po mnan nas btsun mo bkug la longs spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:437a-25: de ltar rkang pa'i phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:437a-26: sgrub pa'i yan lag sngags skyes zhing skyes ye shes las skyes pa kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam shes nas yan lag dang nyid lag gi brda bya ste /
T02TD1660E:437a-27: sgrub pa'i yan lag tu shes nas /
T02TD1660E:437a-28: dgug pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:437a-29: rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bcings //
T02TD1660E:437a-30: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1660E:437a-31: thun mong gi phyag rgya bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:437a-32: bye brag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo dgug pa ni /
T02TD1660E:437a-33: g-yon 'gying tshul shloka gcig gis so //
T02TD1660E:437a-34: rnam snang gi ni dpal ldan sna tshogs 'dzin zhes pa gcig go //
T02TD1660E:437a-36: g-yon pa'i dril bu sgra sgrogs shing //
T02TD1660E:437b-0: g-yon pa'i brla la gzhag ces @437b pa gcig go //
T02TD1660E:437b-2: bdag snying gar 'dren pa'i tshul du zhes pa gcig go //
T02TD1660E:437b-4: bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du zhes pa'i shloka gcig go //
T02TD1660E:437b-5: de ltar rtog pa dgu pa ni phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bsgrub pa'i yan lag nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas na /
T02TD1660E:437b-6: las dang po pa bsgrub pa'i tshe dang /
T02TD1660E:437b-7: mtshan ma thob pa'i tshe dang /
T02TD1660E:437b-8: (dpe gnyis la) mtshan ma thob pa'i tshe mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa dngos grub len pa'i tshe dang /
T02TD1660E:437b-9: dngos grub thob pas ye shes la dbang pa'i rnal 'byor bas sems can gyi don du las rnams byed pa'i tshe dag cing rigs par yan lag tu gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1660E:437b-12: // / de ltar brtag pa dgu bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:437b-13: da ni phyag rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la mos pa bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang mnyam par sbyor nas /
T02TD1660E:437b-14: mngon sum gyi lam bsgom pa bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:437b-15: de nas sna tshogs kun du ni lha drug tu bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa drug go //
T02TD1660E:437b-16: phyag rgya zhes pa'i sgrub pa 'di //
T02TD1660E:437b-17: zhes pa rigs drug phyag rgya bzhi'i bye brag go //
T02TD1660E:437b-18: kun du sna tshogs sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1660E:437b-19: zhes pa phyag rgya bzhi la dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1660E:437b-20: kun du sna tshogs bshad par bya //
T02TD1660E:437b-21: zhes pa rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi la sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1660E:437b-22: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD1660E:437b-23: smin ma mig dang sna dang mchu //
T02TD1660E:437b-24: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:437b-25: rang dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya drug yum gyi smin ma dang mig dang so la sogs pa cha lugs su byas la phyag rgya thams cad kyis 'khyud pa dang /
T02TD1660E:437b-26: 'o bya ba la sogs pa rnam par smin pa bkrol nas rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T02TD1660E:437b-27: rnam par smin pa bkrol nas mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1660E:437b-28: de yang rnam par shes pa bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'i lha mo drug gi dbang du byas nas /
T02TD1660E:437b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1660E:437b-30: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bshad do //
T02TD1660E:437b-31: phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni //
T02TD1660E:437b-32: zhes pas mchog dga'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1660E:437b-33: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1660E:437b-34: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis lhan cig skyes dga'i lha mo'i mtshan nyid du bstan to //
T02TD1660E:437b-35: de ltar zhi gnas kyi bde ba bstan nas /
T02TD1660E:437b-36: lhag mthong gi bde ba bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:438a-2: zhes pa shloka gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen po 'od gsal ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1660E:438a-3: lta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku //
T02TD1660E:438a-4: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis rnam snang gi bde ba chen po bstan to //
T02TD1660E:438a-5: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1660E:438a-6: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis he ru ka'i bde ba chen po bstan to //
T02TD1660E:438a-7: dbang po kun las byung ba yi //
T02TD1660E:438a-8: zhes pa'i shloka gcig gis rdo rje nyi ma'i bde ba bstan to //
T02TD1660E:438a-9: dpal ldan yon tan 'gying dang bcas //
T02TD1660E:438a-10: zhes pa'i tshig rkang drug gis padma gar dbang gi bde ba chen po bstan to //
T02TD1660E:438a-11: gyen du 'phar ba'i dngos grub dang //
T02TD1660E:438a-12: zhes pa'i tshig rkang drug gis rta mchog gi bde ba chen po 'od gsal bstan to /
T02TD1660E:438a-13: lha mo rnams kyis ji ltar phyag rgya bya zhe na //
T02TD1660E:438a-14: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02TD1660E:438a-15: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs tge /
T02TD1660E:438a-17: aa wa dh'u t'i kha sbyar na dpal rdo rje padmo gyen du 'phar ba'i spyan zhes bya ba /
T02TD1660E:438a-18: rigs bzhi'i srog aa wa dh'u t'ir 'jug ba'i thabs kyi phyag rgya drug la shes rab kyi phyag rgya drug gi lan du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1660E:438a-19: de ltar rtog pa bcu pa'i don bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:438a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi //
T02TD1660E:438a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:438a-23: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku dpag tu med pa dang ldan zhing nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i dus su bden pa'i tshig tu gsungs kyang /
T02TD1660E:438a-24: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa mu med pa na rgyud sde bzhi'i rtog pa thams cad dang /
T02TD1660E:438a-25: rtogs pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pa'i mthu dang /
T02TD1660E:438a-26: sgra'i rnam rtog gi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gang du yang gsung bar mi nus so //
T02TD1660E:438a-28: byin rlabs kyi lam gyi mthu dang /
T02TD1660E:438a-29: mngon sum lam gyi rang bzhin dag 'grub pa dang /
T02TD1660E:438a-30: sems 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu 'grub pa dang /
T02TD1660E:438a-31: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sa sor grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1660E:438a-33: ci'i phyir gsung bar mi nus she na /
T02TD1660E:438a-34: 'di ni gsang ba mchog gi mchog //
T02TD1660E:438a-35: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:438a-36: don rang gi mtshan nyid ni sgra'i brjod bya ma yin pas mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i don dga' ba ni gsang ba dang /
T02TD1660E:438a-38: lhan cig skyes dga' yin pas mchog gi dang /
T02TD1660E:438b-0: @438b bde ba chen po yin pas bde mchog go //
T02TD1660E:438b-1: sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la longs sku dang sprul skus ji ltar chos bstan zhe na /
T02TD1660E:438b-2: sems can don phyir lam rnams sbyong ba dang //
T02TD1660E:438b-3: rnam par dag pa rgyal bas yod mi mdzad //
T02TD1660E:438b-5: nyan thos ltar phung po lhag med kyi mya ngan las 'das par mi mdzad pas sangs rgyas rnams la ye shes kyi rnam pa dang /
T02TD1660E:438b-6: byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi sku'i rnam pa dang /
T02TD1660E:438b-7: las dang po pa'i so so'i skye bo la gsung gi rnam par snang ba yin no //
T02TD1660E:438b-8: don dam par mnyam par spyod pa'i don la gsum mi mnga'o //
T02TD1660E:438b-9: ci'i phyir mnyam par sbyor ba'i don la bar chad med pa yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:438b-10: 'di la bgegs byed bdud kyang yod ma yin //
T02TD1660E:438b-12: dri ma dag pa dang ma dag pa ci'i phyir med snyam na /
T02TD1660E:438b-13: rtog pas mi 'grub brdar bas yod mi 'gyur //
T02TD1660E:438b-15: ci'i phyir glo bur dang 'dres pa ma yin zhe na /
T02TD1660E:438b-16: mi brtan pa dang bdud du nga mi 'gyur //
T02TD1660E:438b-18: rtsa ba'i chos kyi sku sems rang rig 'od gsal ci'i phyir mi ston zhe na /
T02TD1660E:438b-19: brtan pa'i phyir yang nga mi 'doms //
T02TD1660E:438b-21: don dam par mkhyen pa med kyang kun rdzob tu ji ltar lam rtogs she na /
T02TD1660E:438b-22: gang zhig rang gi bde bas bde grub pa //
T02TD1660E:438b-23: dngos grub mchog ni rten par mdzad //
T02TD1660E:438b-24: de ltar 'bras bu'i rgyud gsungs nas /
T02TD1660E:438b-25: rjes su yi rang bzhing bstod pa ni /
T02TD1660E:438b-26: sna tshogs zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1660E:438b-27: sna tshogs pas de skad gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1660E:438b-28: rigs drug gi ston pa drug go //
T02TD1660E:438b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dgyes //
T02TD1660E:438b-31: zhes pa nyan pa po'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rtag tu dgyes pa'o //
T02TD1660E:438b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi ril gsungs pa zhes pa rigs drug gi gzugs kyi rtog pa bshad nas /
T02TD1660E:438b-33: sgra'i rnam par rtog pa drug ni /
T02TD1660E:438b-34: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1660E:438b-35: rnam par rtog cing rab tu dgyes par 'gyur zhes pa gzugs kyi rnam rtog bsdus pa la bstod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:438b-36: sgra'i rnam rtog bshad zin pa la sogs bstod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:438b-37: 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i sngags pa gsangs sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa rnams dkyil 'khor bsdus pa la bstod pa dang ches bshad pa'i rjes la rjes su yi rang zhing bstod pa'o //
T02TD1660E:439a-1: rjes su yi rang bstod pa'i rjes la dbang po rnon po rnams kyis rtog pa bcu'i don cig car rtogs par bya'o zhes bstan pa ni /
T02TD1660E:439a-2: rnam mang rjes chags dga' bas mchod pa dang /
T02TD1660E:439a-3: zhes pa dga' ba gsum gyi zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1660E:439a-4: rta mchog gi rnal 'byor bde bas gsal bar rjes su gsal bar mchod na ni /
T02TD1660E:439a-5: bde ba chen po grub par mngon sum du bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don yin no //
T02TD1660E:439a-6: rab tu bde ba rnal 'byor dam pa skal bzangs dga' ba'i mchog / ces bya ba rang lhag par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor bas bde ba chen po cig car sgoms shig ces pa'i don to //
T02TD1660E:439a-7: rab mchog bde ba'i rang bzhin dam tshig rjes su grub par 'gyur //
T02TD1660E:439a-8: zhes pa bde ba chen po sku gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do //
T02TD1660E:439a-9: de ltar cig car bsgom pa'i don bstan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nye bar bsdu ba byas pa'i rjes la /
T02TD1660E:439a-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar gyis zhes ba'o //
T02TD1660E:439a-11: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de skad gsungs so zhes pa lag na rod rje'i tshig yin no //
T02TD1660E:439a-12: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad ye shes kyi yul dang /
T02TD1660E:439a-13: mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyu rkyen gyi tshogs pa /
T02TD1660E:439a-14: mngon sum lam gyis sgyu ma yis //
T02TD1660E:439a-15: zag pa med pa bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba rtog pa bcu'i mtshan yin no //
T02TD1660E:439a-16: rtog pa bcu pa 'dis ni rtog pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba dbang bzhi pa chen po bsgom pa rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1660E:439a-18: 'grel pa dag gis mnyam sbyor ni /
T02TD1660E:439a-19: ma lus gsal bar ma 'grol zhes //
T02TD1660E:439a-20: mnyam sbyor rgyud las bdag gis ni //
T02TD1660E:439a-21: gtam du dris pa bzhin du thos //
T02TD1660E:439a-22: bdag gis rtogs dka' yin na yang //
T02TD1660E:439a-23: bla ma'i zhabs kyis byin brlabs pas //
T02TD1660E:439a-24: de don rtsom phyir nyes pa med //
T02TD1660E:439a-25: de phyir rgyud rgyal rtog pa'i don //
T02TD1660E:439a-27: 'phags pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD1660E:439a-28: dge ba cung zad gang bsags pa //
T02TD1660E:439a-29: de yis kun mkhyen thob par shog / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog gi 'grel pa mnyam sbyor gyi rgyan zhes bya ba rab dga' rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
